  4. Classic A1-style fixed carry handle

Interior Features:

  1. Reinforced CNC Gearbox: Durable steel gears, Full steel teeth piston, CNC copper high-durability cylinder head, CNC 7075 alluminum alloy piston head, stainless steel cylinder, CNC 7075 aluminum alloy & Copper nozzle, CNC aluminum alloy bearing shaft motor and Programmable electronic trigger unit mosfet
  2. Mosfet: Programmable ESHOOTER v2 basic mosfet (not compatible with the Eshooter app)

products.body_html:
Description

E&C KS-3 Ultra+ AEG Gel Blaster Replica

The E&C KS-3 Gel Blaster delivers a compact CQB-focused platform with outstanding realism and modern performance. Inspired by the KS military rifle platform, it features a full metal external build paired with an Ultra+ gearbox, combining a brushless motor system, bluetooth Mosfet, Carbon steel gears, and reinforced internals for serious players and collectors alike.

KS-3 rifle was originally developed by Knight’s Armament Company.

The KS-1 was adopted by the British military under the service designation L403A1 and is currently in service with the UK Royal Marines. The KS-3 is the CQB-focused variant, used by South Korean military units.

Exterior Features:

• Full metal construction for realistic weight and durability

• Clean, deep engraved markings for an authentic military-style appearance

• New fully ambidextrous receiver, supporting both left- and right-handed operation

• URX6 M-LOK handguard system – lightweight, modular, and optimized for CQB accessory mounting

• Military-style configuration, closely matching real-world proportions

• Compact KS-3 CQB layout, designed for maneuverability in close-quarters environments

• Adjustable stock – adjustable length for a personalized fit

• Bolt Release – a functional bolt release that disengages the bolt after the charging handle has been pulled, locking the bolt in the drawn-back position

Interior Features (Ultra+ Gearbox):

• 35K Solink brushless motor for fast response and high efficiency

• Eshooter Bluetooth V2 SE MOSFET, offering advanced electronic control and tuning, support APP control.

• SHS carbon steel gears for enhanced strength and durability

• Stainless steel bushings for smooth and reliable gear rotation

• Reinforced steel piston rack for long-term reliability

• Upgraded Ultra Line air compression components for consistent performance and improved efficiency

products.title: Colt MK16 URGI AEG Gel Blaster | E&C Value Plus
products.body_html:
Description

Colt 9.5 inch MK16 URGI AEG Gel Blaster Replica | E&C Value Plus:

The Value Plus series shares the same external setup as our Value Line, featuring a reinforced nylon receiver paired with metal external parts. This keeps the blaster lightweight, durable, and affordable.

Where the Value Plus really stands out is on the inside.

Internally, the Value Plus series uses the same gearbox as the Ultra Line. It comes with a pre-installed MOSFET, providing faster trigger response with a smoother, more consistent feel and less delay between trigger pulls.

The MOSFET also supports burst and binary fire modes, as well as pre-cocking, giving players a more responsive and modern shooting experience.

In addition, the air compression components have been upgraded, making the blaster stronger, more consistent, and more durable for regular field use.

E&C MK16 URGI Gel Blaster is a lightweight, affordable blaster that keeps the Value Line’s nylon and metal exterior while delivering Ultra Line level internal performance — perfect for entry-level players, budget buyers, or anyone wanting a lighter, high-performance setup.

Exterior Features:

• 9.5 Inch M-LOK CNC Aluminium alloy Handguard

• Adjustable stock – adjustable length for a personalized fit

• Bolt Release – a functional bolt release that disengages the bolt after the charging handle has been pulled, locking the bolt in the drawn-back position

Interior Features:

• Upgraded Gearbox: Full steel teeth piston, CNC copper high-durability cylinder head, CNC 7075 aluminum alloy piston head, stainless steel cylinder, CNC 7075 aluminum alloy & Copper nozzle, Casting metal gears, CNC aluminum alloy bearing shaft for motor and Programmable electronic trigger unit mosfet.

products.title: SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster — Compact PDW-Style Gel-Ball SMG (Sub Machine Gun)

The SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster brings compact, PDW-style firepower to your kit with an aggressive modern profile and user-focused ergonomics. Built for CQB and close-quarters gameplay, this gel-blaster replica typically features a short barrel, integrated foregrip area (battery Compartment) and a smooth feeding double stack style magazine system. Lightweight yet robust, the SPECTRE M4 is ideal as a primary SMG for tight CQB play or as a fast, manoeuvrable secondary for urban scenarios.

Designed for players who prioritise handling and speed, the SPECTRE M4 offers responsive trigger feel, reliable feeding and easy battery/magazine access — making it a popular choice for club nights and backyard skirmishes alike. With upgrade potential for hop-up, inner barrel and gearbox components, it’s a versatile base for performance tuning or cosmetic customisation to match your style on the field.

Brief Real-World History

The real Spectre M4 is an Italian submachine gun designed in the 1980s by Roberto Teppa and Claudio Gritti and produced by SITES (later by Greco Sport). It is a compact, high-rate-of-fire SMG known for its distinctive casket (four-column) magazines and top-folding stock. Production in Italy ran through the 1980s and 1990s, with small runs continuing into the early 2000s; the weapon was used in several regional conflicts and sold in both military and civilian (semi-automatic) variants.

SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster Key Features:

  • Compact PDW/SMG silhouette ideal for CQB and close-quarters play
  • Reliable feeding system — hopper or mid-cap compatible (variant dependant)
  • Folding or telescopic stock for fast manoeuvrability and storage
  • Robust polymer and metal external options depending on model
  • User-serviceable internals with upgrade paths for hop-up, inner barrel and gearbox
  • Quick access battery compartment and tool-free maintenance points
  • Lightweight handling for fast target acquisition and quick transitions
  • Suitable for beginners and seasoned players seeking a compact primary or agile secondary

SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster Specifications:

  • Model: SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG (gel-blaster variant)
  • Construction: Polymer externals with V3 metal gearbox and gears
  • Feed System: Mid-cap dual stack style magazine
  • Ammo: 7–8 mm gel-balls
  • Power: Electric (AEG)
  • Length: Compact PDW length of 365 mm
  • Weight : Lightweight 1620 g, without battery or Gels
  • Upgrades: Hop-up, inner barrel, motor and gearbox upgrades supported on many builds
  • Intended Use: CQB, backyard skirmish, club play, secondary sidearm for field use

SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster Performance:

  • Velocity: 210–220 FPS
  • Rate of Fire (RPS): Roughly 9 Gels per second (running on the recommended 7.4v Battery)
  • Effective Range: 20–25m

SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster Package Includes:

  • 1x SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster
  • 1x SPECTRA Double Stack Magazine
  • 1x 7.4v Mini Tamiya Plug LiPo Battery
  • 1x USB Charger

Why Choose the SPECTRE M4 PDW SMG Gel Blaster?

The SPECTRE M4 is built for players who demand realism, performance, and reliability. Its aggresive stunning looks, compact PDW style size makes it perfect for CQB (close quarters battle), while the metal-reinforced internals and blowback system give it a premium feel unmatched by standard gel blasters.

Whether you’re a serious gel blaster enthusiast, a collector, or just love the legendary MP5K design, this model is a must-have.

Add the SPECTRE M4 to your load-out for a compact, highly manoeuvrable SMG replica that performs in tight spaces and looks the part on the field.

products.body_html:
Specifications

JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun AEG Gel Blaster — With bonus Magazine Coupler

Compact, punchy and built for close-quarters skirmishes, the JM MP5K PDW AEG Gel Blaster from JinMing takes the classic MP5K PDW silhouette and rigs it for modern gameplay. The short-barrel MP5K style body is highly manoeuvrable for CQB and urban fields yet still delivers dependable, repeatable fire thanks to a robust AEG gearbox. Supplied with a magazine coupler and an included 7.4V rechargeable battery, this package is ready to go straight into action — ideal for players who want quick reload options and plug-and-play convenience.

Precision-engineered for hobbyists and skirmishers, the JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun is also a great option for collectors who appreciate authentic styling and realistic controls. Lightweight, ambidextrous-friendly controls and a full metal (or specified alloy/plastic mix — check model variant) receiver ensure solid handling while retaining a pleasing price-to-performance ratio

JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun AEG Gel Blaster Key Features:

  • Official JinMing (JM) manufactured MP5K PDW replica AEG gel blaster.
  • Supplied with a bonus magazine coupler — allowing you to join two spare mags together for faster reloads and extended capacity out on the skirmish field.
  • Includes 7.4V rechargeable battery and charger — ready to run out of the box.
  • Compact PDW form factor — superb for CQB and close-quarter scenarios.
  • Reliable AEG gearbox for consistent cyclic rate and repeatable performance.
  • Ambidextrous controls and ergonomic grip for comfortable handling.
  • Durable construction with realistic external detail for collectors and role-players.
  • Compatible with OEM JinMIng MP5-style magazines.
  • Ideal balance of playability and collector appeal.
  • Threaded 14mm CCW muzzle for attachments

JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun AEG Gel Blaster Specifications:

Manufacturer JinMing (JM)
Model JM MP5K PDW AEG
Power System Electric AEG (motor & gearbox)
Battery (included) 7.4V Li-ion / LiPo (included)
Magazine Coupler Included — couples two compatible mags side-by-side (Spare mags sold separately)
Compatibility JinMing OEM MP5-style AEG magazines; spare mags sold separately
Typical FPS Approx. 200–210 FPS (varies by Gel ammo type)
Material Polycarbonate/nylon & metal components
Uses Skirmish / CQB / Collecting / U.S. Secret Service Presidential Protection Detail. (lol)

JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun AEG Gel Blaster Performance:

  • Velocity: 200–210 FPS
  • Rate of Fire (RPS): Roughly 9 Gels per second (running on the recommended 7.4v Battery)
  • Effective Range: 20–25m

JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun AEG Gel Blaster Package Includes:

  • 1x JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun AEG Gel Blaster
  • 1x JM Magazine
  • 1x JM Magazine Coupler
  • 1x 7.4v Mini Tamiya Plug LiPo Battery
  • 1x USB Charger
  • 1x Pack of Gel Balls (These are generally fairly poor quality, and we recomend using the free Gels in a grenade, or similar device. 
  • 1x Metal Outer Barrel Thread Protector
  • 1 x Instruction leaflet (Chinese and English)

Why Choose the JM MP5K PDW Sub Machinegun AEG Gel Blaster?

Ready-to-run JM MP5K PDW AEG — compact CQB performance with magazine coupler and included 7.4V battery for instant skirmish action.

We chose to stock the JM MP5K PDW for its blend of authentic MP5K PDW styling, compact CQB performance, value for money and the practical magazine-coupler system — a smart pick for skirmishers who prize mobility and fast reloads

Remember, one mag is never enough. Why not add a spare mag, or two, to your order and make use 0f the combined shipping.

products.title: TG Magazine for H&K G36C AEG Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Specifications

TG Magazine for H&K G36C AEG Gel Blaster

Upgrade your loadout with the TG (TianGong) Magazine for H&K G36C AEG Gel Blaster — a rugged, reliable spare magazine built for high-tempo skirmishes. Engineered to match the dimensions and feed angle of TG’s (TianGong’s) G36C-style AEG CQB Gel Blaster, this magazine offers consistent feeding, quick reloads and durable construction so you can stay in the fight.

Designed for ease of use in CQB and outdoor play, the TG magazine clips cleanly into standard G36C AEG receivers and is finished to resist wear and impact from rough handling. Keep a pair or three on hand for sustained skirmish sessions or as a practical spare for training and collection displays.

TG Magazine for H&K G36C AEG Gel Blaster Features:

  • Compatible with TG’s H&K G36C AEG gel blasters.
  • Precision feed lips for reliable gel ball feeding.
  • Durable polymer construction for impact resistance.
  • Easy-to-grip exterior for fast magazine changes under pressure.
  • Lightweight design to reduce carry weight when loaded.
  • Standard fit for drop-in replacement with most TG’s G36C AEG Gel Blaster.

Why Choose The TG Magazine for H&K G36C

Selected by X-Force Tactical for its dependable fitment and rugged build, the TG G36C magazine is a smart and affordable spare for serious players and collectors.

products.title: TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Specifications

TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Gel Blaster – Best Value Entry-Level Rifle

The HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Gel Blaster from TG (TianGong) is a compact, high-fun CQB-ready replica build of the classic Heckler & Koch G36C (“C” for Compact), suitable for skirmish play and collectors who value authentic ergonomics. Internationally, in the real-world, the HK G36C is used by tier one operators, such as Genmany’s GSG-9 and Frances’ G.I.G.N. and R.A.I.D.

Compact and manoeuvrable, the G36C silhouette reproduces the HK aesthetic while offering practical gel-blaster features: an AEG nylon gearbox with metal gears for reliable semi/auto operation, a folding butt stock for tight environments, and a magazine-priming system activated using the charging handle for rapid, intuitive reload prep on the field.

Designed for close-quarters battles and backyard target practice alike, the TG G36C balances realistic handling with user-friendly maintenance. Picatinny accessory compatibility offer great accessory mounting options, the unit has a robust polymer receiver, and an easy-to-service gearbox, making it a great choice for players who want a durable, easily upgradeable platform. Whether you’re starting out or rounding out your roster of CQB kit, the TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Gel Blaster delivers reliable performance and that signature HK look.

TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Gel Blaster Features:

  • TG (TianGong) G36C replica profile for authentic handling and appearance.
  • Nylon AEG gearbox: with Metal gears, give reliable semi- and full-auto firing modes.
  • Magazine priming via the charging handle — fast, intuitive mag-prep without fiddly tools.
  • Folding butt stock for compact storage and superior CQB manoeuvrability.
  • Durable polymer receiver with metal-reinforced mounting points for upgrades.
  • Mag Coupling: Out of the box, these magazines are desigend to couple together. So if you get extra mags, the click together, to give you lighterning fast reloads.
  • Tool-free quick-access forward battery compartment tray for fast battery swaps.
  • Picatinny compatible top rail and handguard mounting options for optics and accessories.
  • Ergonomic HK-style pistol grip .
  • Compatible with the OEM TG G36-style spare magazines.
  • Inner Barrel: Metal inner barrels, with a basic rubber tounge hop-up.
  • Ideal platform for hop-ups, inner-barrel upgrades, and AEG performance tuning.

TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Gel Blaster Specs:

  • Manufacturer: TG (TianGong)
  • Model: HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle (TG)
  • Power Type: Electric AEG (battery powered)
  • Performance: 280 to 290 FPS
  • ROF: Approx 9 rps with the standard 7.4 battery. Metal gear will support the use of 11.1v battery, which ups the ROF to approx 16 rps.
  • Magazine Type: TG G36-style AEG magazine
  • Magazine Priming: Charging handle activated mag prime (magazine primed by cocking/charging handle)
  • Stock: Folding butt stock (folds to the side for compact carry/storage)
  • Material: Polymer receiver with metal internal components, metal gears, inner barrel and flash hider
  • Rails: Top Picatinny rail; handguard mounting (M-LOK/Picatinny dependent on variant)
  • Dimensions: 76 cm full length (53 cms with buttstock folded down)
  • Weight: Medium-weight (depends on fitted battery & accessories)
  • Firing Modes: Semi-Auto / Full-Auto (AEG gearbox)
  • Battery: Supplied with common 7.4V Li-Po rechargeable battery
  • Blowback: Yes: The blaster has simulated electic (gear driven) blowback, with the bolt and charging handle cylcing as the blaster fires.
  • Chargin Handle: Ambidextrous operation, plus it cycles with the blaster, so watch your fingers lol!
  • Recommended Use: CQB, skirmish play, target practice, collection display

Please note: The fire select switch only opeartes on the left side of the receiver (as viewed from above) the right side switch is just decorative.

TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Included in the box:

  • 1 x TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle
  • 1 xTG HK G36C AEG Magazinne
  • 1 x 7.4v rechargeable battery with XT30 style plug
  • 1 x Basic USB Charger
  • 1 x Pack sample gels (Generally these are really poor quality, and we suggest using them in a grenade or other such mass dispersal devices). 
  • 1 x Small phillips head screw driver
  • 2 x Allen Keys
  • 1 x Instruction Leaflet

Gel Ammo Size:

  • 7 – 8 mm

Why choose the TG HK G36C AEG CQB Assault Rifle Gel Blaster?

At such a pocket friendly price, this is one heck of a Blaster, straight out of the box. We chose to stock it for its authentic HK styling and user-focused CQB features, the TG HK G36C is an excellent, upgrade-friendly platform for players who want a compact, practical AEG that looks the part, and perform really well as-is.

products.title: Electronic Gel Blaster Target with Catch Net
products.body_html:
Specifications

3564A Electronic Gel Blaster Target with Catch Net – Auto Reset + LED Score Counter

The 3564A Electronic Gel Blaster Target with Catch Net brings fun and feedback to every practice session. Perfect for Gel Blasters, Nerf guns and toy projectile shooters, this interactive target system auto-resets once all three targets have been knocked down, ready for the next round. Each hit triggers realistic sound effects and flashing lights, while a round of applause celebrates your perfect score.

The built-in LED digital counter scores each successful round (three targets down = one point) so you can track accuracy and progress. An easy-assemble plastic tube frame keeps the catch net open to collect spent gel balls or Nerf darts — keeping the house clean and the family happy. Compact, fun and versatile, it’s an ideal target for indoor or backyard practice sessions.

3564A Electronic Gel Blaster Target with Catch Net features:

  • Auto Reset System – targets pop back up automatically after all three are knocked down.
  • Audio & Light Effects – sound feedback for each hit and applause when you clear the board.
  • LED Digital Counter – adds a score each time you down all three targets (3 hits = 1 point).
  • Catch Net Design – catches spent gel balls or Nerf darts for easy cleanup, keeps either Mum or the misses happy, as there’s no mess LOL.
  • Easy Assembly – plastic tube frame clips together in minutes; no tools required.
  • Compatible with Gel Blasters, Nerf guns, and soft-projectile toys.
  • Compact and portable – use indoors or outdoors for skill training and family fun.
  • Improves accuracy & reaction time while keeping the play area tidy.

3564A Electronic Gel Blaster Target with Catch Net Tech Specs:

  • Model: 3564A Electronic Target with Catch Net
  • Target Count: 3 auto-reset knock-down targets
  • Scoring System: LED digital counter (3 targets down = 1 score)
  • Sound Effects: Hit sound + applause for all targets down
  • Lighting: Flashing LED indicators on hit
  • Power: Battery operated (requires 3 x standard AA batteries – not included)
  • Frame Material: Lightweight plastic tubes and poly net
  • Suitable Ammo: Gel balls, Nerf foam darts, soft projectiles
  • Assembly: Tool-free clip-fit frame (Note, a small phillips head screwwdriver is needed to open and close the battery compartment, not supplied)
  • Recommended Use: Indoor practice / backyard play / children and family target games
  • Material: Safe Eco- friendly ABS
  • Assembeled Length: 19 cm (7.49 in)
  • Assembeled Width: 31 cm (12.21 in)
  • Assembeled Height: 25cm (9.85 in)
  • Weight: 472 g (16.65 lbs)
  • Colour: Black machine, with Blue target paddles. Orange frame, blue collection tray and a black elasticated catch net.
The 3564A Electronic Target with Catch Net makes practice sessions exciting, rewarding and mess-free — ideal for Gel Blaster and Nerf fans of all ages.

Description

3564A Electronic Gel Blaster Target with Catch Net

Type: Electronic Auto-Reset Gel Blaster Target System.
Style: Catch net enclosed shooting gallery
Scoring: LED digital counter (3 targets down = 1 score)
Audio: Hit sound for each target + applause for all targets down
Power: Battery operated (requires 3 x standard AA batteries – not included)

products.title: Electronic Gel Blaster Single Target with Suction Feet
products.body_html:
Specifications

3568A Electronic Gel Blaster Single Target with Suction Feet – Auto Reset + LED Score Counter

Compact, smart, and endlessly fun — the 3568A Electronic Gel Blaster Single Target with Suction Feet brings interactive scoring to your Gel Blaster or Nerf setup. Designed with a single pop-up paddle target, it features a responsive LED counter and sound effects that make every hit satisfying. Each strike is registered with an audible tone, while every third hit rewards you with applause or a glass-breaking sound effect, adding variety and excitement to your training or competitions.

Equipped with suction cup feet, this target can mount securely to almost any smooth surface — tabletop, window, tile, or floor — and can even be positioned horizontally, vertically, or at creative angles for challenge setups. Multiple units can slot together to form a custom range as short or as long as you like, perfect for practice drills or competitive play. Compact, simple, and expandable, the 3568A is ideal for Gel Blaster, Nerf, or any soft-projectile enthusiasts looking to level up their accuracy and reflex training.

For the truly competetive Gel Shooters, two target can be set close to each other, with one shooter for each target. Who can then play a “First to 30” style shooting match, as the LED counter resets after 30 hits.

3568A Electronic Gel Blaster Single Target with Suction Feet features:

  • Single-target electronic design with instant hit feedback and LED counter display.
  • Sound effects for each hit – every third hit plays applause or breaking-glass sound.
  • Auto counter reset – score resets after 30 hits, ideal for competitions or time trials.
  • Suction cup feet for solid mounting to smooth surfaces – can be used in any orientation.
  • Modular connection system allows multiple targets to link together to form a custom range.
  • Compatible with Gel Blasters, Nerf Guns, and other soft projectile launchers.
  • Compact and lightweight – easy to mount, move, and store.
  • Perfect for competitive head-to-head matches (first to 30 wins).

3568A Electronic Gel Blaster Single Target with Suction Feet Tech Specs:

  • Model: 3568A Electronic Gel Blaster Single Target
  • Target Type: Single paddle, electronic scoring
  • Score Counter: LED digital counter (resets after 30 hits)
  • Sound Effects: Tone on hit; applause or glass-breaking every third hit
  • Mounting Type: Suction feet – adheres to smooth surfaces (horizontal or vertical)
  • Expandability: Slot multiple targets together to build a larger range
  • Power: Battery operated (2 x Standard AA batteries)
  • Material: Durable ABS plastic housing with integrated LED module
  • Suitable: For Gel Blasters, Nerf Guns, and soft projectile toys
  • Dimensions: Compact design, easily connectable for multi-target setups (Single dimensions 15 cm High, 9.5cm wide, 9cm deep)
  • Weight: 96 g
  • Recommended Use: Indoor practice, skill drills, competitions, and friendly shootouts
Perfect for solo practice or competitive matches, the 3568A Electronic Target delivers feedback, flexibility, and endless fun — mount it, link it, and challenge your accuracy..

Description

3568A Electronic Gel Blaster Single Target with Suction Feet

Type: Electronic Auto-Reset Gel Blaster Target System.
Style: Multiple mounting options due to it’s suction cup feet, mount flat, on a smooth wall or on a window.
Scoring: LED digital counter (1 targets down = 1 score), resets to zero once the counter reaches 30 hits.
Audio: Hit sound for each target, then random sound (either applause or bottles smashing) on every 3rd target.
Power: Battery operated (requires 2 x standard AA batteries – not included)

products.title: UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol
products.body_html:
Specifications

UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol

The UDL SIG P320 (M17) Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol, a truly exceptional electric blowback Gel Blaster Pistol! Great performance and look straight out of the box.

Unlock the power of precision and versatility with this Tan varaint of the UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol. This gel blaster pistol is not your ordinary sidearm; it’s a game-changer that brings excitement and innovation to your tactical adventures, and improved accuracy courtesy of the integrated hop-up on the inner barrel.

UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol Key Features:

  1. Electric Firepower: The UDL SIG P320 (M17) Semi-Auto boasts great performance with its electric slide cycling mechanism and spring powered Gel Firing, ensuring rapid and consistent firing and improved accuracy, courtesy of the integrated inner barrel hop-up. Say goodbye to manual cocking and hello to lightning-fast shooting! (Can also be used in manual cocking mode, if no battery is installed in the magazine)
  2. Three-direction Integrated Hop-up: The Tan version of the UDL SIG P320 (M17) Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol, comes with an integrated inner barrel hop-up feature. Allowing for fine tuning of the Blaster’s accuracy. The system in the UDL P320 in quite impressive, giving 3 individual position of adjustment for the hop-up tongue, with grub screws at the 12, 2 and 10 o’clock position on the inner barrel.
  3. Gel Ball Compatibility: Equipped with a standard Gel Ball barrel, this blaster pistol fires safe, ec0-friendly, gel balls, providing a thrilling and safe gaming experience. Experience the excitement of realistic shooting without the risk.
  4. Realistic Design: The UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto boasts a very realistic design, making it a true collector’s item. It replicates the iconic SigSauer P320, also known by it’s military designation as the M17. Providing an authentic feel and appearance for enthusiasts and collectors.
  5. Durable Construction: Crafted from high-quality nylon polymer materials, this blaster pistol is built to withstand the rigors of intense gameplay. It’s both sturdy and reliable, ensuring longevity and hours of fun.
  6. Adjustable Accessories: Customize your blaster to fit your unique playing style with the under-barrel picatinny tactical rail. Attach laser sights, torches, or any Picatinny style accessory to “Pimp” your blaster.
  7. Easy Operation: Thanks to its user-friendly design, this gel blaster pistol is suitable for all players. The ergonomic grip ensures a comfortable and secure hold during gameplay.

Discover the Tan UDL SIG P320 (M17) Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol’s impressive power and adaptability. Whether you’re battling opponents in close quarters or taking precise long-range shots, this pistol has got you covered.

Experience the thrill of gel blasting like never before and the added bonus of a laser conversion for unbeatable versatility. The UDL SIG P320 (M17) Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol is your gateway to hours of fun and excitement.

UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol Key Specs:

  • FPS: Averaging around 200 fps out of the box.
  • Ammo Capacity: Approximately 20 Gels
  • Range: Approx. 20 meters
  • Inclusions: Integral inner barrel hop-up, with 3 angles of adjustment.
  • Weight: 603g (including Mag and Battery)

UDL Tan SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol Pack contains:

  • 1 x UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistoll with integral Hop-up System
  • UDL SIG M17 Semi-Auto Electric Gel Blaster Pistol Magazine/battery pack
  • 1 x 7.4v battery
  • 1 x USB Charger

products.title: Grey Wolf Integrated Hop-up Stainless Steel Inner Barrel
products.body_html:
Specifications

Grey Wolf  Integrated Hop-up Stainless Steel Inner Barrel

Upgrade your Gel Blaster’s performance with the Grey Wolf  Integrated Hop-up Stainless Steel Inner Barrel. Precision-crafted from polished stainless steel, this  tight-bore barrel delivers exceptional durability, improved accuracy, and consistent flight paths — perfect for players wanting better range and tighter shot grouping in every game.

Featuring an integrated hop-up unit, this barrel streamlines tuning adjustments and reduces setup complexity, providing a smooth and reliable hop-up experience. Its polished internal surface minimises drag for stable gel pellet travel, while the robust stainless-steel build resists wear, corrosion, and impact from regular use.

Whether you’re upgrading a stock AEG, modifying a custom build, or optimising a tracer setup, the Grey Wolf Integrated Hop-up Barrel is engineered for enhanced precision and reliability on the field. Easy to install and compatible with a range of gel blaster platforms, it’s the ideal internal upgrade for serious players and hobbyists alike.

The Grey Wolf Adjustable Hop-up Inner Barrel showcases cutting-edge integrated design, simplifying hop-up adjustments with a single grub screw. The length of this masterpiece is painstakingly matched to the outer barrel, guaranteeing a seamless fit for tracer units right at the barrel’s forefront.

While originally designed for WM GBBR rifles, its versatility knows no bounds. This exceptional inner barrel can also be effortlessly integrated into other platforms, such as directly fitting into an AEG’s T-piece. Elevate your precision and versatility with our Adjustable Hop-up Inner Barrel today.

Grey Wolf Integrated Hop-up Stainless Steel Inner Barrel Features:

  • Precision stainless steel inner barrel for greater accuracy and longevity.
  • Manufactured by WM (Western Manufacturing)
  • Integrated hop-up system simplifies tuning and reduces alignment issues.
  • Highly polished internal bore promotes consistent gel pellet flight.
  • Tight-bore design improves range and shot grouping for competitive play.
  • 250/350/450 mm length ideal for all builds and tracer unit compatibility.
  • Durable against scratches, dirt, and regular use on the field.
  • Includes grub screws for precise adjustent of your hop-up toungue.

Grey Wolf Integrated Hop-up Stainless Steel Inner Barrel Tech Specs:

  • Brand: Grey Wolf
  • Manufactured by: Western Manufacturing
  • Barrel Type: Integrated Hop-up Stainless Steel Inner Barrel
  • Length: 250/350/450 mm
  • Inner Bore: 7.3 mm (tight bore)
  • Outer Diameter: 9.5 mm
  • Material: Stainless Steel with integrated hop-up assembly
  • Compatibility: Fits most AEG Gel Blasters and spcifically designed for compatability with Western Manufacturing GBBRs.

The Grey Wolf integrated hop-up barrel stands out for its blend of durability and precision. Whether you’re fine-tuning a competitive build or upgrading for improved consistency, this barrel delivers performance improvements you can notice on the field.

Technical Note – Prior to installing any new barrel, a crucial step is to thoroughly clean it. Utilize a cleaning rod and apply silicon oil to ensure the barrel is in pristine condition, laying the foundation for top-tier performance.

Description

Grey Wolf Integrated Hop-up Stainless Steel Inner Barrel

Style: Grey Wolf stainless steel integrated H0p-up barrel
Type: Stainless Steel Inner Barrel with integrated Hop-up
Colour: Silver
Material: Stainless Steel
External Product Dimensions: 250/350/450 x 10 x 10 mm
Internal Bore: 7.3mm
Product Weight: 55 g
Package Dimensions: 25/35/45 x 1.2 x 1.2 cm
Additional Specs: 2 Notches and a ring, cut into the back end of the barrel to marry up with the barrel housing, on the MWS brand of GBBR rifles.

products.title: G-Series Padded Pistol Case
products.body_html:
Specifications

G-Series Padded Pistol Case – 4 Colours

Protect and transport your gel blaster pistol with confidence using the G-Series Padded Pistol Case, a compact and durable storage solution designed for G-Series–style gel blaster pistols and similarly sized models. Built with internal padding and a structured outer shell, this case helps protect your blaster from knocks, scratches, and general wear during transport or storage.

The padded interior cushions your pistol securely, while the full dual latch closure keeps everything safely contained. Its slim, low-profile design makes it ideal for range bags, backpacks, or vehicle storage, offering reliable protection without adding unnecessary bulk. Whether you’re heading to a skirmish, travelling to a field, or storing your blaster at home, this case provides practical peace of mind.

Available in four colour options — Black, Hot Pink, Ranger Green, and Flat Dark Earth (Tan) — the G-Series Padded Pistol Case allows you to match your gear setup or easily identify multiple cases at a glance. It’s a simple yet essential accessory for any gel blaster owner looking to keep their pistol protected between games.

G-Series Padded Pistol Case Features:

  • Branded for G-Series Gel Blaster Pistols but will fit all similar-sized models

  • Foam-padded internal lining helps protect against impacts and scratches

  • Durable outer construction for everyday transport and storage

  • Double Latch closure keeps contents secure

  • Compact, low-profile design fits easily in gear bags or backpacks

  • Ideal for skirmish days, transport, or home storage

IWI UZI MP2A1 SMG AEG Gel Blaster – Drum Magazine & Stick Magazine Bundle

The Israel Weapon Industries Replica UZI MP2A1 SMG Gel Blaster features classic submachine gun styling in a compact, skirmish-ready electric platform. Inspired by the iconic UZI design, this AEG Gel Blaster combines rugged construction with reliable performance, making it a standout option for CQB games, backyard play, and collectors alike.

Built around a durable electric gearbox, the MP2A1 offers smooth semi-auto and full-auto firing modes, while its compact frame makes it easy to manoeuvre in tight spaces. The solid polymer body keeps weight manageable without sacrificing toughness, and the distinctive UZI profile delivers instant visual appeal on and off the field.

What truly sets this package apart is exceptional value. Supplied with both a standard stick magazine and a high-capacity 400-round drum magazine, this bundle gives players extended firing time straight out of the box — something many competitors do not include. Whether you’re laying down sustained fire in CQB or simply want fewer reloads during casual play, the included drum mag makes this one of the best-value UZI gel blaster packages available in Australia.

products.title: VFC US SOCOM Gustaf M3 MAAWS Grenade Launcher
products.body_html:
• Faithful Replica of the M3 Recoilless Rifle
  • Lightweight Nylon Fiber Reinforced Polymer Construction
  • Aluminum Reinforced Inner Tube
  • Able to Take Different Ammunition Types Made by VFC
  • Realistic Operation
  • Dummy Rifling
  • Picatinny Optic Rail

The Carl Gustaf M3 Recoilless Rifle is a current issue recoilless rifle produce by Saab Bofors Dynamics, yes the same SAAB that produces cars and Jets.

The M3 MAAWS is a standard issue recoilless rifle for the United States Special Operations Command. Its users includes top tier units such as the 75th Rangers Regiment and the Navy SEALs. The VFC US SOCOM M3 MAAWS gel blaster grenade launcher is a faithful replica of recoilless rifle used by USSOCOM.

This gel blaster grenade launcher is made of lightweight nylon fiber reinforced polymer construction. This is done intentionally by VFC as the real recoilless rifle weights more than 10 KGs while this gel blaster replica is able to keep its weight at around 4 KGs when loaded. This is done so this gel blaster replica can be fielded on the gel blaster field however, major moving components and the inner tube is reinforced by metals.

The operation of the gel blaster replica is realistic and using the hardest gel balls is recommended. It also features a picatinny optics rail, giving you the option of running different optics with this airsoft grenade launcher.

Shell Compatibility:

  • VFC 84mm Shells

Included:

  • 1x VFC US SOCOM M3 MAAWS Grenade Launcher
  • 1x VFC Simulated 84mm Ammunition
  • 1x VFC 40mm gel ball Grenade

products.body_html:
Product Description

  • Built-in front & rear sling attachment points
  • Fixed front and adjustable rear sights

The King Arms M2 Carbine replica is a beautiful reproduction of this classic firearm. Made with real wood and aluminum alloy, this gel blaster looks and feels authentic. Adding to the realism is a CO2 powered gas recoil system which helps to imitate the bolt cycling action.

Although the M1 Carbine was famously known for it's capability, few know that originally the Carbine was meant to be select-fire capable, however during World War 2 it was easier to produce semi-auto M1s at the time. Towards the end the M2 was introduced, with a bayonet lug, and the select-fire capability added afterwards. During the Korean conflict, the M2 carbine saw more wider use and an experimental 30-round magazine was also issued along with it.

products.title: Polarstar 7.5" Wire Harness
TTI™ / EMG - 2011 COMBAT MASTER (ISLAND BARREL) GEL BLASTER
products.body_html:
"Taran Tactical Innovations™ 2011 Combat Master is the culmination of the ultimate competition pistol platform combined with master levels of tuning to create a handgun like no other.

This is a Prototype Variant of the pistol featured in the 2019 film John Wick 3: Parabellum, currently only being in Taran's hands in the real steel world , but now one can own the gel blaster version!

The Island barrel version with a large milled rib on top, and a corresponding area milled out of the slide. This rib contains the front sight. Since the front sight doesn’t move, it’s easier to track through recoil. It also means there’s less slide mass, which means less reciprocating weight, which reduces felt recoil.

The slide has also been “tri-topped”, which means it has a trapezoidal top cross section instead of the usual round one. This reduces weight and looks good. There are also aggressive looking front and rear slide cocking serrations,
plus some slide windows to show off the barrel finish, reduce weight, and looks cool.

DESCRIPTION

products.title: SRC M4 SR4 PI-Alpha Sportline Polymer AEG
products.body_html:
SRC M4 SR4 PI-Alpha Sportline Polymer AEG - Desert Tan

SRC Sportline Series - the perfect rifles for ambitious Gelsoft beginners!


This rifle is based on the well-known SRC Sport Line series and ensures a very good price-performance ratio. A product line that is primarily intended for ambitious newcomers to the gelsoft world. 

In addition to a particularly robust main housing made of polymer composite plastic, there are also important external attachments and the gearbox made of aluminium. In combination, this results in a very reliable rifle that does not have to shy away from use. 

All gel blaster rifles in the series are true-to-scale reproductions of the American M4 rifle design have a fully and semi-automatic shooting function. The shot drive runs reliably via an electrically driven metal gearbox in the classic V2 design. 

The front of this gel blaster rifle is equipped with a one-piece approx. 13.6 inch outer barrel with standard M4 sights and M4-style flash hider. The parts mentioned, including the delta ring, are made entirely of metal and thus ensure very good stability. 

This gel blaster model has a handguard with a tactical design and comes with a 21mm rail attached below. The shape of the polymer handguard is very easy to grip and thus ensures that the rifle can be guided very well.

Like other gelsoft rifles with a housing design in M4 / M16 or AR15 optics, the main housing of this rifle consists of an upper and a lower part. Both housing parts of this gelsoft gun are made of durable polymer composite plastic and are made to fit very precisely. This ensures a play-free, tight fit of the housing halves to each other and makes the rifle very valuable. The polymer composite plastic material used was also very well chosen by SRC. 

The lower case features laser engraved SRC markings as well as cast fire selector decals. As with a real rifle, the upper part of the housing has an approx. 155 mm long 21mm rail on which a target device can be mounted. The gel blaster rifle includes the typical M4A1 carbine carrying handle with integrated sight. The visor is laterally and vertically adjustable and has two reticles. The ergonomically shaped handle with a structured surface in combat design is made of nylon-reinforced plastic.

The aluminium stock tube at the rear end, with its 6 locking positions, ensures that the rifle can be perfectly adjusted to the shooter. The shaft running on it is a special variant of SRC. The stock is equipped with a structured cheek rest and butt plate, which allows the rifle to be guided very well in position. 

Inside is a stable Reinforced Version 2 metal gearbox in 6mm design. The metal bearings ensure that the gear wheel set, which is also made of metal, runs with little friction inside the gearbox and tensions the built-in spring over the composite plastic piston. To ensure that this happens reliably, SRC relies on a high-torque variant in a long-type design for the built-in motor. The rifle is of course not only equipped with a semi-automatic, but also with a fully automatic shooting function.

This is a standard version in one-piece design made of aluminium. As with all other M4 / M16 gelsoft replicas, the unit is located under the deco sleeve ejection window. To adjust, simply pull the clamping lever.

When you purchase products from Tactical Edge Hobbies, you can be sure that you are purchasing a high quality, reliable product with a 30 day warranty and a dedicated team of technicians to assist you with what you need.

FEATURES:

  • Color: Desert Tan
  • Gel Type : Gelsoft Ultra Hard
  • System: AEG - Automatic Electric Gun / fully and semi-automatic 
  • Material: polymer / aluminium / steel

  • Length: approx. 802 mm - 882 mm (in 6 steps)
  • Weight: approx. 2,760 g
  • Scale: 1/1
  • FPS :
  • Gearbox: Reinforced metal version 2 
  • Suitable battery: 
  • Battery Connector: Mini Tam
  • Manufacturer: SRC 

**Orange tip shown for illustration purposes**


IN THE BOX:

  • SRC M4 SR4 ST-Alpha Sportline Polymer AEG - Desert Tan
  • SRC M4 / M16 Combat-Style Polymer Magazine Hi-Cap 300 rounds black
  • cleaning rod

Tactical Edge Hobbies is the largest supplier for all your Gelsoft needs! 

Always use the appropriate eye wear and take all reasonable safety precautions when using our products.

Charging Batteries

When charging the batteries, we recommend charging them between 1-4 hours.

When they are charging the light/s will flash and once it is fully charged, the light/s will turn a solid red or green.

Also once you start to hear the battery getting flat, please recharge it as running it flat can damage the cells.

 

Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in warm water from the tap for a minimum of 4-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain off any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

 

DISCLAIMER

Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

products.title: LEVIATHAN V3 OPTICAL MOSFET GEL BLASTER READY
products.body_html:
The Leviathan - V3 optical is one of the most advanced ETU (electronic trigger unit) on the market now made specifically for gel blaster with electronic magazines thanks to the all new power output feature.

It combines optical and switch sensors for better handling and durability

Build-in wireless communication for quick setup using iOS or Android smartphones!

Tactile trigger switch has travel only 0,13mm long for ultimate hair trigger feeling

Unique Real feel trigger system (RFTS) with integrated spring simulates trigger resistance like in the real rifle. It adds secondary resistance with release after the fire. RFTS was designed by professional gunsmith for more realistic feel from shooting

External output and input port serves for custom accessories

Real time response for change settings -> immediately test result

Easy installation into the gearbox (fully integrated inside the gearbox instead of the original trigger contacts)

- Optical sensors are used for detection the selector plate and the sector gear
- Tactile trigger switch makes short click for great hair trigger mod.
- Unique real feel trigger system (RFTS) simulates trigger feeling like in the real firearm. It adds secondary resistance with release after the fire. 

 

MAIN FUNCTIONS:
- Adds new shooting modes independent for every position on the fire selector (SAFE - SEMI - AUTO)
- Three adjustable bursts (range 2 - 20 shots)
- It preserves empty magazine detection like the original rifle
- Rate of fire can be reduce to 40%. It add breaks between shots to reduce RoF. It gives fast trigger response even with very low rate of fire, just like in a real one
- Adjustable strength active braking (can be disabled)
- Pre-cocking function for instant shot on SEMI fire
- Delay between shots adds time in which isn't possible to shoot, it simulates the delay from reload or recoil (range 0,1 - 4,0 seconds)
- Electronic fuse set sensitivity for high current detection to avoid any damage if something goes wrong
- Low battery indication for 2S - 4S li-po and 3S - 4S li-fe
- Virtual magazine simulates low capacity magazines, it will force the blaster to stop shooting when it reach 0. There can be set warning after shot before empty magazine and how it will be reloaded
- On the board are input and output ports for controlling external devices or Leviathan
- Statistics screen shows shooting output with cycle timing, motor current consumption, rate of fire and temperatures. It allows you to do fine-tune gearbox upgrade
- Application shows actual battery voltage value. Color lines indicates battery charge status where green is OK, orange will warn after each shot and red will not allow to shoot
- User can save multiple settings under profiles
- Update function fixes bugs and adds new features to the device
- There are three shot counters. Total count every shot during the device lifetime. User counter can be reset by user anytime. Power-up counter is reset by battery connection
- Error log shows errors made during the device life also can be erased by user
- For better security wireless connection can be disable by the selector switch (can be deactivated)
- Leviathan monitors current, voltage and temperature to avoid any damage when something go wrong.
- Motor vibrates and beeps as a feedback for user
- Programmed settings are saved in the Leviathan memory immediately after their change, so you can immediately test it and settings aren't lost when is battery disconnected or lost connection with smartphone
- New functions are for free for every user via online update function

FIRE MODES:
Independent for every position on the fire selector (SAFE - SEMI - AUTO)
- SAFE: no responding on the trigger pull.
- Semi: it fires single shot per trigger pull.
- Semi/Burst X: short trigger pull fires single shot, long trigger pull fires burst.
- Binary trigger: it fires single shot when trigger is pulled and another single shot when is released.
- Burst X: shoot burst per trigger pull.
- Burst X+Burst Y: short trigger press fires burst X, long trigger press makes burs tX+burst Y fire.
- Burst X/Full: short trigger press fires burst X, long trigger press makes auto fire.
- Full: makes auto fire until releasing trigger.
- Virtual reload: pull trigger to reload virtual magazine

 

EXTERNAL INPUT:
Works with Input terminal

- OFF: Every signal to Input terminal is ignored.
- External trigger: trigger is disabled and replaced by micro switch connected to Input (SIG and GND)
- Burst-3 trigger: micro switch connected to Input (SIG and GND) make 3 burst fire when it is pressed. Trigger is still functional.
- AUG trigger: selector plate detection is disabled. Trigger is set to selector on semi. Micro switch connected to Input (SIG, GND) is set to selector on auto.
- Empty mag (NO): Micro switch activates empty magazine detection, when is connected SIG with GND.
- Empty mag (NC): Micro switch activates empty magazine detection, when is disconnected SIG with GND.
- Virtual reload: Micro switch activates virtual magazine reload, when is connected SIG with GND.


EXTERNAL OUTPUT:
Works with Output terminal:

- OFF: output terminal works only if the Input terminal activates it.
- Motor: output terminal is ON with motor + with IN activation.
- Motor + Xs: output terminal is ON with motor with time delay after motor is deactivated + with IN activation.
- Always on: the output terminal is constantly activated.

New functions are for free for every user via online update

The Leviathan - V3 optical brings endless possibilities for your blaster!

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
- Easy installation inside the gearbox version 2, compatible with Tokyo Marui standard

       
- It uses optical sensor actuated by sector gear cam for perfect semi and burst fire timing
- For fire selector position is used optical sensor too - it works with sticker provided with Leviathan
       
- Tactile trigger switch makes short click for great hair trigger mod.

- The wire length between the gearbox and the battery connector is 290mm
- There are high quality power wires 1,5 qmm (AWG16) with thin and hard MPPE insulation and signal blue wire 0.34 qmm (AWG24) with MPPE insulation
- Power wires outer diameter is only 2,06 mm and blue wire 1,24 mm
- Board covered by conformal coating, it protect Leviathan against damage from water
- On the board is input port for controlling output port, 3rd burst, external trigger, magazine reload, etc. and output port for powering electric magazine, flashlight, laser, etc.
    
- For right pre-cocking function is necessary to have in the gearbox functional anti reverse latch. WARNING: it increases wear and tear on the gearbox.
- Specified for common batteries up to 17V (Ni-xx 8.4 - 12V, lipo 7.4 - 14.8V)
- Device increases rate of fire and battery holds longer, than with basic wiring
- With active braking ON piston isn't partially stretched, spring is fully released, parts in mechabox aren't under strain and nozzle locks hop-up chamber in greater part (depends on ROF)
- In weapons with very high rate of fire (ROF) active brake solves multiple shots in semi mode
- The braking effect is the most powerful with high torque motor. Note: Lower braking intensity spares the motor coils.
- Remove from the gearbox: cut off lever, trigger, trigger contacts and trigger block, you will not need them with the Leviathan - V2 optical

USE WITH BRUSHLESS MOTOR:
- Leviathan can be used with brushless motor (Warhead, Option No. 1, etc.)
- The following functions in the Leviathan must be set to:

  • Active brake = Off
  • Rate of fire = 100%

PACKING:
- Leviathan - V3 optical drop-in electronic module with wiring to stock, T-plug connector, 40A mini fuse and faston connectors to the motor
- CNC trigger with zero path adjustment screw (different variants)
- Screw with washer for securing device in the gearbox
- Black Leviathan sticker 40 mm
- Foam to keep device in place

SAFETY WARNING:
- Installation of this device into the gearbox requires advanced technician skills!
- Please read these information's before installing your device to prevent any damage.
- Short circuit or incorrectly connected battery will cause immediate damage to the device which is not covered by the warranty. It can lead to fire or even battery explosion.
- Disconnect battery, when you aren't using the blaster! Otherwise you will fully discharge the battery. Because the device drains small amount of current from the bettery all the time.
- Do not connect battery when blaster pointing towards you, another person or an animal.
- Do not modify, repair and put into any kind of liquids or thermal shock the Leviathan - V3 optical.

products.title: Double Bell Winchester M1894 Metal/Wood CO2 Gel blaster Rifle
products.body_html:
The Winchester Model 1894 rifle (also known as the Winchester 94 or Model 94) is a lever-action repeating rifle that became one of the most famous and popular hunting rifles of all time. It was designed by John Browning in 1894.

The 1894 was produced by the Winchester Repeating Arms Company through 1980 and then by U.S. Repeating Arms under the Winchester brand until they ceased manufacturing rifles in 2006. Reproductions are being made by the Miroku company of Japan and imported into the United States by the Browning Arms company of Morgan, Utah.

The Model 1894 has been referred to as the “ultimate lever-action design” by firearms historians such as R. L. Wilson and Hal Herring. The Model 1894 is the rifle credited with the name “Winchester” being used to refer to all rifles of this type and was the first commercial sporting rifle to sell over 7,000,000 units.

The gel ball variant is just a beautiful replica with imitation wood and metal body, using 2 x c02 bulbs to power the blaster.  If you ever wanted one and loved playing cowboys and Indians as a kid then these is every big boys dream.

  • Brand: DOUBLE BELL
  • Model: 103A
  • Released: Dec. 2021
  • Type: Gas Powered
  • Gas Type: CO2 12g CARTRIDGE
  • Color: Black
  • Material: Full Metal + Imitation Wood
  • Metal Trigger
  • Metal Inner and Outer Barrels
  • Inner Barrel inner diameter size: 7.5mm
  • TYPE : Shell Injecting
  • INNER BARREL LENGTH : 480mm
  • TYPE OF FIRE : Single
  • MAGAZINE CAPACITY : 10 rounds 
  • HOP-UP : Adjustable
  • Performance: 
  • Up to 300 Feet per Second

Specs:

  • Total length (approx.-): 960mm
  • Weight: 2490g

Package Includes:

  • 1 x M1894 Gas-Powered Gel Blaster
  • CO2 gas powered
  • 10 x Bullet shell
  • 1 x Carry box

It also works with the SRC revolver shells we found.

DESCRIPTION

Type: Leaver action rifle Gel Blaster

Material: Wood/Metal

Uses: 7 – 8 mm

Powered: C02

products.title: Bosli-po Arena Version 11.1 v Mini Taniya Battery
products.body_html:
Bosli-po Arena Version 11.1 v Mini Taniya Battery Features:

  • High discharge lithium polymer battery
  • International universal 4P charging port
  • Surface: PVC; wear-resistant, anti-oxidation, high temperature
  • Standard voltage: 11.1v

Package Includes:

  • 1 x Battery

Please Note: 

11.1v Batteries cannot be charged with the 7.4v USB charger supplied with Gel Blasters.

A separate charger is required to charge 11v batteries. We advise the B3 Battery Charger as it charges each cell independently.

When charging batteries, we recommend charging them between 1-3 hours.

To preserve battery and maintain a long battery life please ensure your battery is charged regularly. Running the battery completely flat shortens it’s life span. The more complete discharge cycles the shorter the life span.

Bosli-po Arena Version 11.1 v Mini Taniya Battery Specifications:

  • Brand: BosLi-Po
  • Item type: Li-po battery
  • Capacity: 1300mAh
  • Continuous Discharge Rate: 25C
  • Voltage: 11.1V
  • Charge: 4 pin balance connector
  • Discharge Connector: Mini Tamiya female
  • Working temperature: 0-40 ℃
  • Battery Size: 13.6 * 2 * 1.6cm
  • Battery Weight: 91g

products.title: Dao Zhifei 7.4v Li-Po Battery 1100mAh
products.body_html:
Dao Zhifei 7.4v Li-Po Battery 1100mAh MT

Built for Endurance

The Dao Zhifei 7.4v Li-Po Battery 1100mAh MT is designed to keep you in the game longer. With its larger capacity, stable output, and secure Mini Tamiya connector, it delivers reliable energy for extended matches and competitive play.

High Capacity, Reliable Power

With a 1100mAh capacity, this battery offers significantly longer runtime compared to smaller packs. The Dao Zhifei 7.4v Li-Po Battery 1100mAh MT 7.4V output provides smooth, dependable firing, while the 30C discharge rate ensures steady power flow under load. As a result, you get consistent performance without power dips, even in longer sessions.

Secure Mini Tamiya Connector

Equipped with a Mini Tamiya connector, this battery guarantees a solid and efficient connection with compatible gel blasters. The connector is designed to prevent loose connections, ensuring your blaster receives stable power with every trigger pull.

Balanced Design for Extended Play

Even with its larger capacity, this Li-Po remains compact enough to fit comfortably in most blasters. Its lightweight build reduces bulk, keeping your setup balanced and easy to handle. This makes it ideal for players who value both extended runtime and mobility on the field.

Simple Care, Longer Life

Maintaining this battery is straightforward. Always use a balance charger designed for Li-Po batteries to ensure safe and even charging. In addition, store it in a cool, dry place when not in use and avoid over-discharging to protect the cells. With proper care, this battery provides long-term reliability and dependable performance.

Why Choose the Dao Zhifei 7.4v Li-Po Battery 1100mAh MT ?

  • 1100mAh capacity for extended playtime
  • 7.4V output for smooth, reliable firing
  • 30C discharge for steady power delivery
  • Mini Tamiya connector for secure compatibility
  • Compact design despite higher capacity
  • Built for durability and long-lasting performance
  • Final Advantage

In short, the Dao Zhifei 7.4v Li-Po Battery 1100mAh with Mini Tamiya connector is the ideal choice for players who need more runtime without sacrificing handling. With its high capacity, strong discharge rate, and secure connection, it keeps your blaster firing smoothly throughout every battle.

products.title: WE Tech Sig P226 Classic Gas Blowback Gel Blaster Pistol
products.body_html:
WE Tech SIG P226 Classic GBB Pistol 

The WE Tech P226 Classic pre accessory rail design, it is a full metal construction version of the world famous Sig P226 Tactical as seen in use by the british military, the SAS and various other police and armed forces the world over.

With a full metal body and slide with plastic grips and a 15 gel ball capacity magazine, this pistol has a great action with the classic 226 style decocker and slide release lever (and yes it does lock back on empty!).

This double action gas blowback pistol strips like the real thing and has a full functional de-cocking lever. Pistol has front and rear sights for quick target acquisition.

These new pistols from WE feel a lot nicer to use than a lot of other GBB pistols and they are very solidly built. As this has a metal top slide we recommend using high quality gel blaster gas with this pistol.

Great sound and impressive recoil, this full scale replica is ideal as a secondary and also for training use. 
The magazines use a gelball specific injection moulded ABS plastic feed lips and magazine follower designed and made my Aztech Innovations and gelball specific spring.

We recomened using Ausgel Elite Gels as they are the most resiliant to high power gas

-Velocity Feet Per Second (FPS): 280fps 

(Gel Blaster gas on Ausgel Elites)
-Length: 195mm
-Weight (with Magazine): 1000g
-Inner Barrel Length: 97mm

-Barrel: 7.25mm stainless
-Chamber: CNC Alloy Barrel holder and Silicon chamber seal
-Metal Slide
-Heavy Recoil Springs Fitted
-Blow Back: Yes
-Trigger type: Double Action Single Action
-Shooting Mode: Semi-Automatic
-Magazine Capacity: 15 Rounds
-Bullet Type: 7-8mm Gel balls
-Pistol Power Source:

Gel Blaster Gas

Note: Gas blow-back magazines do cool down after each usage and should be allowed to return to room temperature between usage for best performance. For heavy usage, rotate between a few mags.


Reminder: Keeping all gas blow-back blasters well lubricated will resolve 90% of performance issues.

  • South Australian Buyers:
    As SAPOL now has the class A section 4 gel blaster specific license, we can only ship gel blasters to firearms dealerships in SA who must apply a serial number using form PD306 an engrave to the blaster before you can collect it.
  • Please email a copy of your license to support@azraelsarmoury.com and at the point of sale please add you license number in the notes to ensure the order doesn’t get automatically cancelled.
  • Our most regular firearms dealer in SA to send to are:
        -Safari Zoomer in Salisbury South,
        -The Gunnery in Christies Beach
        -Gawler fishing and outdoors in Gawler
  • For more information on how to get your Section A class 4 license please follow this link:

products.title: Golden Eagle Strike Industries Gas Powered Shotgun Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Product Description

Features

  • Durable full aluminum alloy body, barrel and pump handguard.
  • Strike industries licensed handguard, Picatinny attachment and ejection port cover with authentic roll marks and logos
  • Valor of Action CNC M-LOK handguard with mounting points around the length of the pump for grips, lights, lasers, or other accessories
  • Equipped with a Strike Industries Barrel Clamp which gives an additional 3 o'clock Picatinny rail for lasers and lights w/ a QD sling point on the 9 o'clock
  • Pre-installed picatinny top rail for optics and metal heat shield
  • Gas powered 3 burst and 6 burst firing modes 
  • Pre-installed CNC aluminum alloy 6 shell caddy
  • Lightweight reinforced polymer stock

The EMG Strike Industries Licensed M870 gas operated pump action shotgun combines realism with convenience for those looking to utilize a shotgun for CQB skirmishing. This innovative shotgun is built on a reliable system maximizing BB to gas usage output for the most amount of game play. The shotgun has multi-shot capability allowing 3 to 6 shot bursts with the ease of a flip of a switch under the ejection port cover and a pull of the trigger. Additionally, the shotgun is compatible with most standard 30 round shotgun shells and can be held by the pre-installed shotgun caddy for easy access and quick reloading.

In close collaboration with Strike Industries, EMG has utilized some of the best licensed accessories into this M870 shotgun! Starting with the gel blaster  version of the heavy duty "Valor of Action" M-LOK handguard built with durable aluminum provides easier pump action, introduces an aggressive look, and allows the user to maximize customization with 10 M-LOK slots for grips and accessories. On the front end attached is an aluminum barrel clamp providing a Picatinny rail on the 3 o'clock for lasers and light along with a QD sling point on the 9 o'clock. Lastly, the ejection port is equipped with a dust cover to protect internals, shot selector and laser engraved with authentic Strike Industries logos.

Manufacturer: EMG / Golden Eagle (Licensed by Strike Industries)

products.title: KELe Beretta 93R Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol – Black
products.body_html:
In the real world, The Beretta 93R is an Italian selective-fire machine pistol, designed and manufactured by Beretta in the late 1970s for police and military use, that is derived from their semi-automatic Beretta 92. The “R” stands for Raffica, which is Italian for “volley”, “flurry”, or “burst” (sometimes spoken “R” as “Rapid” in English).

The Beretta 93R was designed to be used by the Italian counter-terrorism forces of the National Police and Carabineri (both formed in the late 1970s in response to terrorism) but was also adopted by other police and military forces who required a concealable weapon with rapid fire capabilities. The pistol is a development of the Beretta 92 design. The 93R has also been seen a lot in popular culture, in films like Virtuosity (Denzel Washington 1995), Broken Arrow (John Travolta 1996) and was the basis for Robocop’s Auto 9 gun in the film Robocop (1987)

The KELe Beretta 93R Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol is an incredibly authentic looking replica of the Beretta 93R, the obvious differences being that it is a single shot, spring powered Gel Blaster, and doesn’t have semi auto of full auto functions. In the hand the The KELe Beretta 93R Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol feels suitably weighty, making it a very realistic replica of the original. The firing selection is single shot, per rack of the slide. The Blaster can also be “stripped down” just like it’s rear world counterpart, with the slide being removable from the lower. The fold down fore grip is sturdy and well constructed. Though this blaster does come with 10 mini foam nerf darts, it operated best using Gel balls.

KELe Beretta 93R Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol Features:

  • Model: KELe Beretta 93R Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol
  • Type: Manual, Mechanical, Spring-Powered (Single shot, rack the slide for each re-load)
  • Single-Shot Pull-Back Type
  • 1:1 Ratio
  • Full Metal Construction
  • Screw in Flash Hider (Muzzle Break)
  • Mag Fed
  • Magazine Capacity: Approx. 15 Gel Balls (Even though this looks like an extended magazine, due to the position of the Gel feeding hole, it only hold the same number of gels as a standard magazine would)
  • Uses 7-8mm Gel Balls (sold Separately)
  • Comes with 10 Foam mini Nerf darts

Performance:

  • Up to 140 Feet per Second
  • Up to 20m Firing Distance
  • 1 Shot per Pull Back of Slide

products.title: KELe Kimber Ultra Carry II Manual Springer Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
We’re proud to introduce this awesome replica, of the Kimber Ultra Carry II.

This full metal and beautifully weighted replica feels great in the hand. It’s weight gives it the sense of being something more that just a simple toy, but more of an authentic replica of the real Kimber Ultra Carry II. KELe Kimber Ultra Carry II is constructed with a full metal, aluminium alloy, body with imitation wood (Nylon) grips. Some of the really cool attention to detail touches on this blaster, are the etched “Kimber” logo on the handle, plus the Kimber Model Number, engraved just above the trigger. Looking at this Manual Springer replica, against the real steel counterpart and it is hard to spot any differences. This is a must for collectors, who are looking for authenticity in their replicas. The only slight deviation from the real deal, is the inclusion of the word “stainless” on the black version, whereas this only appears on the silver version in real life. Other feature that definitely make this such a great replica, is the functioning beaver tail (grip) safety, and a thumb safety that prevents the slide from being racked.

The KELe Kimber Ultra Carry II is a manual “springer” style blaster, which means the slide needs to be racked for each shot, and make the firing configuration technically a single shot manual device. And, as a couple of our competitive staff members often say, the look of amazement on the face of a player at a Gel Soft skirmish, who has spent thousands on an HPA super gun set up, that shoot 25+ gels per second, at over 300 fps, then you creep up on them and take them out with a single shot from a springer, is priceless. Well, there’s no feeling quiet like that!!!

Features:

  • Model: KELe Kimber Ultra Carry II Manual Springer Gel Blaster
  • Type: Manual, Mechanical, Spring-Powered (Single shot, rack the slide for each re-load)
  • Single-Shot Pull-Back Type.
  • 1:1 Ratio
  • Full Metal (aluminium Alloy) with Imitation wood grips.
  • Built in Hop-up
  • Spring fed, single stack, Magazine.
  • Magazine Capacity: Approx. 9 to 10 Gel Balls (dependant on Gel brand and variance in grown size)
  • Uses 7-8mm Gel Balls

Performance:

  • Up to 140 Feet per Second (Dependant on Gels)
  • Up to 15m Firing Distance
  • 1 Shot per Pull Back of the Slide, then to load the next gel the slide needs to be racked again.

products.body_html:
Step up your collection with the King Arms Python 357 Evil Gel Blaster Revolver – Steel.
Crafted with full-metal construction, a tactical design, and gas-powered realism, this revolver is the perfect piece for collectors and enthusiasts who want performance, durability, and authenticity.

Whether you’re displaying it, using it for training, or enjoying backyard target shooting, the Python Evil Edition is designed to impress.

Key Features:

Full-Metal Construction & Finish

  • Built entirely from aluminum alloy with tactical design for durability and realistic weight.

  • Finished with EDP (Electro Deposit Primer) coating for improved surface quality and long-lasting finish.

  • Designed by Japanese engineers, with upgraded internal gas flow for more lifelike realism.

Precision Barrel & Rails

  • Rifled-style barrel for a realistic look and feel.

  • Brass inner barrel (6.05mm ID) with fixed hop-up for stable and accurate shooting.

  • Integrated Picatinny rails on top and bottom of barrel – ready for optics, flashlights, or tactical accessories.

Grip & Handling

  • Ergonomic, wood-textured polymer grip for comfort and control.

  • Features a striking golden grip plate for a premium finish.

Cylinder & Reloading

  • Solid metal cylinder with fast swing-out reloading design.

  • Extractor rod for quick shell removal.

  • Accepts 6 heavy brass-style shells, included in the package.

Hammer & Trigger

  • Full-metal hammer for reliable single-action operation.

  • Smooth and responsive trigger system.

Sights & Safety

  • Fixed front sight and adjustable rear sight for quick target acquisition.

  • Easy-access safety button to lock the hammer and prevent accidental firing.

products.title: SRC python 6 Inch Revolver Gel Blaster – Black Version
products.body_html:
Python 6’ Revolver

A solid revolver by SRC made almost entirely of metal. Elements of the mechanism such as the hammer, trigger or the drum are also made of metal. The only polymer part is the pistol grip. The gel blaster has a realistic mock shell-feeding system into the rotary drum – exactly as in the case of a live revolver. Each shell carries a single gel. The set includes 6 shells and a dedicated speed loader that enables with a single motion place 6 shells in the drum.

The set also includes two metal RIS / Picatinny rails for attachment under the barrel or on top of it. Rails enable equipping the revolver with additional accessories such as optics or tactical lighting.

Drum release fulfils at the same time the role of safety, blocking the trigger and hammer from firing an accidental shot. Inside the pistol grip is room for a standard, 12 g CO2 capsule. In order to open the grip and install the capsule, no tools are necessary. Aiming is made easier by luminescent points on the revolver’s rear sight.

FEATURES

products.title: CGS/T8 EMG Noveske Licensed N4 Gen 3 MWS GBBR Gel Blaster-Tan (Steel parts)
products.body_html:
Features

  • High quality aluminum alloy external construction
  • Licensed Noveske N4 Gen 3 replica with deep engraved trademarks
  • Brand new CGS (CYMA Gas System) provides reliable performance and durability
  • Cross-compatible with most standard Tokyo Marui MWS-spec parts
  • Short 10.5" outer barrel is ideal for anything from CQB to mid-range engagements
  • Noveske NSR-9 handguard features M-LOK mounting surfaces on the 3, 6, and 9 o'clock positions
  • Full-length top 20mm RIS for mounting optics, iron sights, lights, lasers, and other standard 1913 Picatinny accessories
  • Adjustable CRANE style battery storage stock
  • Ergonomic pistol grip allows for a better, more comfortable grip angle
  • Rear QD sling swivel mounting point for use with a sling
  • 30 round Lancer Systems L5 AWM magazine with realistic "300 Blackout" markings

NOVESKE, in the firearms world, is a name synonymous with quality and precision. From their complete rifles to their rifle parts and accessories, every piece is manufactured to exact specifications and thoroughly inspected to ensure the highest quality product is being offered. Every design follows the concept of making improvements where necessary but keeping the design uncomplicated and simple while adhering to precision craftsmanship and attention to detail for a winning combination that cannot be beaten. Most recently, Noveske rifles have been spotted in the hands of Navy SEALs and SWCC in training exercises.

The CGS (CYMA Gas System) Series is a brand-new design featuring all of the greatest new tech in gas blowback rifles. Fully cross-compatible with the Tokyo Marui MWS system, it provides an excellent base gun with an ever-growing variety of aftermarket upgrades and options. More reliable and more efficient than alternative systems, the CGS provides a base platform that you can pull out of the box and have ready to play that night!

products.title: HEL E4A Gel Blasters Suppressor Replica for M16-Series
products.body_html:
Originally developed during the late stages of the Vietnam War era, the real HEL E4A was one of the early military-issued rifle suppressors.

It was designed to reduce muzzle flash and report on 5.56×45 mm rifles, allowing special units to operate with improved stealth in dense jungle and night-time operations.

 Historic Background:

  • The HEL E4A suppressor was field-tested by elements of the U.S. Army Special Forces (Green Berets), MACV-SOG teams, and some SEAL detachments during the Vietnam conflict.
  • It was primarily paired with early-pattern M16 and CAR-15/XM177-type rifles, as well as occasionally with starlight-scope-equipped marksman rifles for ambush and reconnaissance missions.
  • Although later replaced by more modern designs such as the XM-style and OPS/SSS suppressors, the E4A represents one of the pioneering steps in practical military rifle suppression.

Product Features:

  • Durable Alloy Construction: Provides a solid, long-lasting build ideal for field use with gel blasters.
  • Easy Installation: Compatible with standard M16-series gel blaster outer barrels (14 mm CCW thread).
  • Lightweight Design: Adds historical style without affecting your blaster’s balance.
  • For Display or Gameplay: A must-have accessory for collectors, historical reenactors, or players who want their M16-style gel blaster to stand out.

products.title: Sig Sauer ROMEO-X Pro 1×24 Red Dot Pistol Sight- Black
products.body_html:
Experience precision shooting like never before with the Sig Sauer ROMEO-X Pro 1×24 Red Dot Pistol Sight, designed to elevate your gel blaster gameplay. Engineered to mirror Sig Sauer’s renowned expertise, this replica red dot sight delivers unmatched performance, durability, and style. (Please note, a red dot sight, will not improve the accuracy of Gel Balls. But it will give you a defined central point, for your Gel Ball grouping to centre around)

Sig Sauer ROMEO-X Pro 1×24 Red Dot Pistol Sight- Black Key Features:

Crystal-Clear Optics: Enjoy rapid target acquisition with a 1×24 lens, offering a wide field of view and parallax-free accuracy.

Durable Construction: Made from high-quality, aircraft-grade aluminium, this sight is built to withstand rigorous use while maintaining its sleek black finish.

Precision Targeting: The illuminated red dot offers adjustable brightness settings, ensuring optimal visibility in all lighting conditions.

Quick and Secure Mounting: Compatible with many gel blaster pistols, the ROMEO-X Pro mounts come supplied with both a Picatinny mounting adaptor and a Glock Style Mounting Plate, staying securely in place during intense action.

Enhanced Battery Life: Advanced energy-saving technology ensures long-lasting performance so you stay focused on the field.

Battery Saving option: The Romeo-X has a timed auto-off function to save battery life, plus has a motion sensor that gives you a “shake to wake” on feature.

Fibre Optic Iron Sights: The ingenious guys at Sig, though of everything. The Romeo-X also comes equipped with fibre optic “Iron Sight” style sighting mechanism. So that the Romeo-X can be used like a normal sight system, lining the rear fibre optic dots, with the barrel sight, for a “Battery-Free” aiming solution.

Ideal for both casual players and serious competitors, the Sig Sauer ROMEO-X Pro 1×24 Red Dot Pistol Sight combines cutting-edge optics with robust design, giving you the edge in every gel blaster match. Gain that Tactical Edge, with the Sig Sauer ROMEO-X Pro 1×24 Red Dot Pistol Sight. 

Take your gel blaster precision to the next level with the Sig Sauer ROMEO-X Pro—where innovation meets reliability.

featured_image.alt: Sig Sauer ROMEO-X Pro 1x24 Red Dot Pistol Sight in black, featuring advanced optics for precision gameplay.
