products.title: SOLINK Digital Programming Board For Solink V5 Motor
products.body_html:
• Motor speed can be adjusted between 10k-46k rpm with 1k rpm increments with this digital programming card (Default value: 46k rpm ,11.1v)Please Note: Digital programming board  only work with v5 motor, not workable for our other models either other brands motor.
• The starting torque of the motor can be adjusted by current change. (Default value:60%)
• It can also be used to check the health of the battery, and automatically detects the battery voltage and percentage of remaining charge after the battery is linked

Button Description:

• M Button: Short press to select the item to be set, long press to quickly reconnect when disconnected from the motor.

• –  Button: Short press to decrease the value of the selected item, long press to quickly decrease the value of the selected item.

• + Button: Short press to increase the value of the selected item, long press to quickly increase the value of the selected item.

• S Button: Long press to save the settings to the motor.

Attention:

1) Some malfunctions, poor contact, or unexpected situations may cause the motor to rotate unexpectedly. Therefore, the motor must be securely fixed before using this product.

2) The motor must be reliably connected to the cable of the board before the board can be powered on, otherwise it may cause accidental rotation of the motor.

3) The battery voltage used to power the programming board must be higher than 7.4V, otherwise it may cause the motor to rotate unexpectedly.

4) After the settings are saved, the programming board will self-disconnect and disconnect from the motor. If you want to reset it, you must power it on again or press and hold the M button to reconnect.

5) While in the setting menu, do not disconnect the motor wires, otherwise it may cause the motor to rotate unexpectedly.

6) If the maximum current rating of the ETU is lower than the defined starting current of the motor,we are NOT responsible for the damage it might caused.

7) Please confirm the correct polarity before installation. Do not reverse the positive and negative connections. Damage caused by incorrect polarity is not covered under warranty.

products.title: SOLINK V5 51000RPM Long Axis Brushless Motor For AEG Gel Blaster
products.body_html:

The SOLINK V5 51000RPM Brushless Long Axis Motor is the only motor on the market that allows precise speed adjustment in 1,000 RPM increments, giving you full control over performance. With an impressive operating range from 1,000 to 51,000 RPM, it’s built to suit everything from low-speed precision builds to high-speed competitive setups.

This Barrel is a real game changer. It’s one of the few available on the market, that has an integrated Hop-up system built in, that’s super streamlined and will fit inside

Immerse yourself in the world of unparalleled precision with the MW Adjustable Hop-up Inner Barrel, meticulously fashioned from top-tier stainless steel. Crafted to perfection, this barrel stands as a testament to exceptional durability and an impeccably polished finish, making it virtually impervious to scratches and dirt.

The MW Adjustable Hop-up Inner Barrel showcases cutting-edge integrated design, simplifying hop-up adjustments with a single grub screw. The length of this masterpiece is painstakingly matched to the outer barrel, guaranteeing a seamless fit for tracer units right at the barrel’s forefront.

While originally designed for MWS GBBRs, its versatility knows no bounds. This exceptional inner barrel can also be effortlessly integrated into other platforms, such as directly fitting into an AEG’s T-piece. Elevate your precision and versatility with our Adjustable Hop-up Inner Barrel today.

WM 11.5 inch Hop-up integrated Stainless Steel Inner Gel Blaster Barrel Features:

products.title: LeHui Beretta 1301 Tactical Shell Ejecting Shotgun – Black
products.body_html:
Introducing the LeHui Beretta Shell Ejecting Foam Dart Shotgun – a thrilling and high-performance addition to your foam dart arsenal. This cutting-edge foam blaster brings the excitement of tactical play to a whole new level, promising an exhilarating gaming experience for enthusiasts of all ages.

Equipped with exceptional attention to detail, this foam dart shotgun boasts a striking resemblance to the real Beretta firearm, making it a standout choice for cosplay or simulation enthusiasts. Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip, allowing you to handle intense battles with ease.

The LeHui Beretta Shell Ejecting Foam Dart Shotgun is supplied with 10 foam darts. Whether you’re engaging in close-quarters combat or backyard skirmishes, this shotgun empowers you to adapt to any battlefield scenario.

The LeHui Beretta Shell Ejecting Shotgun can operate in two modes

  1. Single shot manual when no battery is installed. Where the user draws the bolt to load the first shell and compress the spring. Once the trigger is pulled the user the draws the bolt again, to eject the spent shell and load the next.
  2. Semi Auto: when the battery is installed. The user draws the bolt to load the first shell and compress the spring. Once the trigger is pulled and the dart fired, then the electric motor cycles the bolt, ejecting the spent shell and loading the next, till all shells are fired.

The Beretta 1301 TACTICAL Shotgun was made famous, or perhaps infamous, in movies such as John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum, Sicario: Day of the Soldado (2018) and Mile 22 (2018). This Soft Dart firing replica is very true to the look and feel of the real world item, making it a must for collectors of movie replica.

LeHui Beretta Shell Ejecting Shotgun Features:

  • Make: LeHui
  • Model: Beretta 1301 Tactical
  • Released: Oct. 2023
  • Type: Spring Powered firing, with electric cycling to reload the next shell.
  • Colour: Black
  • Material: Tough Nylon Polymer with Metal internals.
  • TYPE : Shell Ejecting
  • TYPE OF FIRE : Single (if no battery is fitted, with manual reload) or Semi (with battery providing the recycle of the bolt and ejecting/reloading of the shells)
  • Ammo: Soft darts
LeHui Beretta Shell Ejecting Shotgun Specs:
  • Total length (approx.-): 960mm
  • Weight: 1611g
LeHui Beretta Shell Ejecting Shotgun Dart Blaster Package Includes:

products.title: SW Aliens M41A Pulse Rifle AEG Gel Blaster - OD
products.body_html:
Meet the Snow Wolf M41A Pulse Rifle Airsoft AEG. This weapon is a beautiful replica of the service rifle carried by the 22nd Century Colonial Marines in James Cameron’s iconic and Oscar winning big screen movies ‘Aliens and Aline3’. True to the screen model, this fabulous replica is based on a Metal Thompson AEG Gel Blaster, with Nylon Polymer Furniture and replica under-barrel launcher. The Digital countdown LED is fully functional, counting your shots down from 95 to zero, obviously this is a nice touch and purely a cosmetic feature. As the Gel Magazine will hold approximately 180-200 gels, depending on Gel Size.

The ammo counter on the gun is an operational unit that works with 9V batteries. The ammo counter starts off at 95 rounds, and will reset when you change magazines. If you wish to not use this function, you could remove the battery or switch it off. The gun also features a mock under barrel pump shotgun, but it is just for aesthetics, this is the battery compartment where you can insert your battery to power the rifle.

SW Aliens M41A1 Pulse Rifle AEG Gel Blaster Features:

Nylon Polymer / Metal Construction

Semi & Fully Automatic Shooting Mode

Full metal Magazine

Digital countdown LED display function for count your rifle shooting (LED counter starts from 95 to zero)

Retractable Stock

products.body_html:
Classic Army MP5SD Gel Blaster

This Classic Army Gel Blaster version of the MP5SD is a beautiful rendition in 1 to 1 scale of a model specifically developed to meet the requirements of many Special Operations Forces around the world!

The MP5 is a submachine gun, developed by a German manufacturer in the 1960s. A typical MP5 fires 9mm Luger ammunition from a curved detachable box-type magazine. The MP5's accuracy, reliability, and wide range of accessories and variants have made it the submachine gun (SMG) of choice for military and law enforcement agencies worldwide.

The Classic Army MP5SD has a metal suppressor, cocking tube and receiver. The short barrel provides good accuracy up to medium to long range.
This model is fantastic out of the box and includes a metal magazine to get the job done, swiftly, efficiently and without fault.

FEATURES

  • High strength polymer Stock & Pistol Grip
  • Metal Dummy Suppressor and Quick Dis-assembly Metal Body
  • Version 2 Gearbox
  • High Quality Cast Steel Gears, Gearbox Shell, and a Nylon Piston
  • Movable Cocking Lever 
  • Metal barrel assembly
  • 300 FPS on 11.1v Battery Using AKA / Gelsoft Ultra Hard Gels

**Orange tip shown for illustration purposes**

SPECS

Gel Type:  AKA / Ultra Elites / Gelsoft Ultra Hard Gels Battery Source: Mini Tamiya 7.4v 1100mah 
Inner Barrel Length: 22.5cm Mosfet: No
Inner Barrel ID: 7.2mm Fire Select: Single/Semi/Full Auto
Inner Barrel Type: Alloy Blaster Body: Polymer/Metal
Gearbox Type: Metal Version 2 Gearbox Velocity: 300 FPS
Bushing/Bearing: 8mm Bushings Magazine Type: Classic Army MP5 Metal Magazine
Spring: 1.4 Spring Magazine Capacity: Approx 110 Gel Rounds
Motor Type: 480 Long Suitable Hopup: Inner Barrel Hopup (UBand/Rizer/DK16/DK13 Hopup)


** Battery and charger not included.

PACKAGE INCLUDES

1x Classic Army MP5 SD2 Gel Blaster
1x Magazine
1x Safety Glasses

Charging Batteries

Do not leave batteries unattended whilst charging and take off charge when they have completed charging.

When charging the batteries, we recommend charging them between 1-4 hours.
When they are charging the light/s will flash and once it is fully charged, the light/s will turn a solid red or green.

Also once you start to hear the battery getting flat, please recharge it as running it flat can damage the cells.

 Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in water from the tap for a minimum of 5-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain of any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

You can store gel balls in a bucket of water with a lid for up to 3 months before they start to go super soft. We recommend if you do this to change the water every couple of weeks.

DISCLAIMER
Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

The John Wick 3 STI Combat Master is the culmination of the ultimate competition pistol platform combined with master levels of tuning to create a handgun like no other. Wielded by Baba Yaga himself, this is the pistol used by John Wick in the 2019 film John Wick 3: Parabellum.  Based on an STI 2011, the JW3 STI Combat Master is expertly crafted with slide lightening cuts to improve the cyclic speed and reduce perceived recoil. The forward swept front and rear slide serrations give a solid purchase for weapon manipulation. The extended magazine release helps with dropping the magazine without breaking your grip for faster reloads. The double undercut trigger guard lets you choke up higher on the gun for better recoil control. The large flared magwell assists with magazine insertion, helping to guide the magazine into the pistol. The grip stippling helps the shooter get a good grip on the pistol and maintain a solid hold.

products.title: Double Bell Winchester M1894 Metal/imitation Wood CO2 Gel blaster Rifle
products.body_html:
The Winchester Model 1894 rifle (also known as the Winchester 94 or Model 94) is a lever-action repeating rifle that became one of the most famous and popular hunting rifles of all time. It was designed by John Browning in 1894.

The 1894 was produced by the Winchester Repeating Arms Company through 1980 and then by U.S. Repeating Arms under the Winchester brand until they ceased manufacturing rifles in 2006. Reproductions are being made by the Miroku company of Japan and imported into the United States by the Browning Arms company of Morgan, Utah.

The Model 1894 has been referred to as the “ultimate lever-action design” by firearms historians such as R. L. Wilson and Hal Herring. The Model 1894 is the rifle credited with the name “Winchester” being used to refer to all rifles of this type and was the first commercial sporting rifle to sell over 7,000,000 units.

The gel ball variant is just a beautiful replica with a full wood and metal body, using 2 x c02 bulbs to power the blaster.  If you ever wanted one and loved playing cowboys and Indians as a kid then these is every big boys dream.

products.title: KELe Nylon Colt 1873 Peacemaker Manual Revolver – Black
products.body_html:
The Colt Single Action Army (also known as the SAA, Model P, Peacemaker, or M1873) is a single-action revolver handgun. It was designed for the U.S. government service revolver trials of 1872 by Colt’s Patent Firearms Manufacturing Company (today known as Colt’s Manufacturing Company) and was adopted as the standard-issued pistol of the U.S. Army from 1873 until 1892.

 

Its overall appearance has remained consistent since 1873. Colt has cancelled its production twice, but brought it back due to popular demand. The revolver was dubbed the “Peacemaker”, and is a famous piece of Americana and the American Wild West era, due to its popularity with ranchers, lawmen, and outlaws alike. Today, they are mainly bought as memorabilia by collectors and re-enactors. Its design has influenced the production of numerous other models from other companies.

 

The KELe Colt Peacemaker Manual Revolver pistols are next level in quality and these are no exception. A solid metal and nylon built will definitely please any collector. These shoot gels and small foam darts, so you can really get into the spirit of gun slinging and target shooting. The The KELe Colt Peacemaker Manual Revolver pistols are a single action trigger, meaning the hammer has to be cocked back, for each shot.

 

KELe Colt Peacemaker Manual Revolver Features:

  • Nylon body
  • Realistic Single Action Revolver

  • Smooth Cylinder Cycling

products.title: Aztech Xtreme Adjustable V2 Speed Trigger
products.body_html:
Aztech V2 AEG CNC Aluminum Speed Trigger designed in house to increase trigger response with adjustable angle, pre-travel and over travel.  Suits Ver. 2 electric gel blaster gear boxes with switch blocks or Mosfets*.

Our 4th gen adjustable Speed Trigger has multiple grub screw adjustment points to adjust pre-travel, over-travel and angle of the trigger it self.  We have a separate version specific to Gate Aster optical mosfets for further gains on the Aster listed separately.

Our 2 piece design trigger is CNC machined out of a solid block of 6061 Aluminum. The CNC construction makes this trigger very light and durable. The machine work is finished with sandblasting (on the gen 3 only) and anodizing, the trigger is carefully finished with chamfered edges and textured flat face. 

The adjustment is via 2 set grub screws, a 1.3mm allen key to set pre travel and a 1.3mm allen key to adjust the trigger angle which allows you to tune the pre travel.  Once set in position you will need to remove and apply a medium grade lock tight to ensure the screws do not self adjust and come loose.

Available anodized in satin black, silver, shimmery red and metallic gold.

Aztech light weight trigger spring included.
Allen key is supplied with the trigger

**This is not a drop in for Leviathan Mosfets due the proprietary design of the Leviathan trigger design. They can be modified to suit with some material removed from the front of the upper half of the trigger.

products.title: Polarstar MRS Regulator with 42" Line
products.body_html:
This compact regulator stands just 3 inches tall and threads directly onto the HPA tank. In so doing it eliminates the need for a separate UFA and keeps your air rig profile to a minimum. What sets this regulator apart from competing models is its integral on/off valve. This enables you to depressurize the system prior to unscrewing it from the tank to elevate wear and possible damage on the tank threads and o-ring.

  • Adjustable output pressure from 40psi to 145psi (standard configuration).
  • Optional High Pressure Spring boots maximum pressure to ~200psi.
  • Oversized 4mm piston bore for extremely high flow and refresh rate even at only 40psi.
  • Integral tournament lock can be secured with a standard zip-tie. Compatible with standard HPA as well as SLP tanks.
  • HP Spring Not Include

products.title: TACTICAL UNITY FAST MICRO MOUNT
products.body_html:
• FAST™ is a series of optic mounts and platforms that provide end users with a quicker sight picture than standard height mounts. A 2.26” optical centerline height provides faster/easier reticle acquisition while wearing electronic earpro/communications headsets, night vision goggles and gas masks and allows for more rapid visual processing of the battlefield by promoting a heads-up posture. A heads-up posture also helps users maintain a neutral spine position which is more comfortable while wearing helmets, plate carriers, and other heavy gear.

    The FAST™ Micro Mount features built-in standard height back up iron sights that keep weapons uncluttered, without reducing capability. Both front and rear BUIS are completely adjustable for windage and elevation. The front sight post can be removed so that the rear BUIS aperture can be used with a traditional front sight such as our FUSION fixed or folding sights (if present), creating a more conventional sight radius. However, the built in front/rear BUIS is perfect for backup on super short PDW/SMG platforms where rail space is critical for mounting lights and lasers.

    Designed for Aimpoint® Micro (H1, H2, T1, T2, CompM5) and other optics with Aimpoint® Micro footprint, such as those found on many Sig Sauer®, Holosun®, Primary Arms®, and Vortex Optics® platforms.

    The FAST™ Micro Mount comes with a standard rail-grabber clamp mount, but is designed to readily accept a drop-in American Defense Manufacturing® patented QD Auto-Lock™ Lever (sold separately). This mounting option will provide quick detach capability.

    The FAST™ Micro Mount is built from 7075-T6 Aluminum and Type III Hardcoat Anodized Black or FDE*

products.body_html:
E&C – Hi-Capa 5.1 GBB Pistol

The Full Metal, semi-auto EC Hi-Capa 5.1 has a metal slide, a metal frame, and a textured polymer grip. It is essentially a double stacked 1911 – the breakdown and the operation remain about the same as the standard 1911. The functional grip safety and ambidextrous slide safety make it safe for all users. The rear sight is adjustable for improved accuracy and personal preference.

The blow back action is operated by airsoft green gas or red gas. The reinforced metal parts include outer barrel, chamber, recoil spring rod, slide stop, safety, hammer, and trigger. The internal upgrade parts include reinforced recoil spring, hammer spring, firing pin, extreme high flow valve. This airsoft gun has the well established operation of the 1911 with the advantages of a double stacked magazine, it features sharp, crisp recoil and is extremely accurate.

An ideal pistol for any Airsofter from beginner to experienced.

products.title: E&C Glock 22/G22 Gas Blowback Gel Blaster Pistol
products.body_html:
Description

The E&C Glock 22 Gel Blaster features an ultra-realistic exterior and ergonomic grip, delivering authentic looks and comfortable handling.

  • Authentic Glock 22 Design
    The E&C Glock 22 Gel Blaster offers a highly realistic replica with a CNC-machined slide, .40 caliber markings, and ergonomic design—perfect for players seeking authentic feel and looks.
  • Powerful Blowback – Realistic Recoil
    This Gel Blaster delivers a strong blowback effect with every shot. The gas blowback system ensures realistic recoil, enhancing the immersive shooting experience for gel blaster enthusiasts.
  • Durable Aluminum & Nylon Construction
    Built for durability, the E&C Glock 22 Gel Blaster combines a precision CNC-machined aluminum slide with a tough nylon polymer frame. This sturdy yet lightweight construction ensures reliable performance in fast-paced, demanding environments.
  • Difference Between G17 and G22
    The Glock G22 and G17 share the same frame, dimensions, and external features, making them compatible with the same accessories like flashlights, lasers, red dot mounts. The main difference lies in the caliber: the G17 is chambered in 9x19mm, while the G22 uses .40 caliber rounds, which have a larger bore and heavier projectile. Visually, they are nearly identical, with only the caliber markings on the slide distinguishing them.

PACKAGING DIMENSIONS & WEIGHT

  • Dimensions: 186 x 32 x 139 mm
  • Weight (With Magazine) : 735 g
  • Packaging Dimensions: 220 x 160 x 45 mm
  • Packaging Weight: 850 g

Welcome to the world of gel blasting excitement with the E&C G17 Gel Blaster Pistol! If you’re looking for an authentic, high-performance gel blaster that offers precision shooting and a realistic experience, you’ve come to the right place. In this listing, we’ll dive into the features, benefits, and all the reasons why the E&C is a must-have for gel blaster enthusiasts.

E&C G17 Gas Blowback Gel Blaster Pistol Highlights:

  1. Unmatched Realism: The E&C G17 Gel Blaster Pistol is designed to mimic the real G17, providing an unparalleled sense of authenticity. From its weight and feel to its functional controls, you’ll feel like you’re holding the genuine firearm.
  2. Precision Shooting: This gel blaster delivers exceptional accuracy, making it perfect for competitive battles or target practice.
  3. Durable Construction: Crafted from robust materials, the E&C G17 is built to withstand the rigors of intense gel blasting action. It’s designed to be reliable, ensuring that it will be your trusty companion during countless skirmishes.
  4. Designed specifically for Gel Balls: The E&C G17 is compatible with standard gel blaster gel balls, providing an affordable and easy-to-find ammunition source for your adventures, which is non-toxic and biodegradable.
  5. Easy to Use: Whether you’re a seasoned gel blaster pro or a beginner, you’ll appreciate the user-friendly design of this pistol. It’s easy to load, shoot, and maintain.

Why Choose the E&C G17 Gel Blaster Pistol?

  • Quality Assurance: WE-Tech is known for its commitment to quality and performance, ensuring that you get the best value for your investment.
  • Immersive Gameplay: Experience gel blasting like never before with a blaster that closely resembles the real thing, enhancing your overall gaming experience.
  • Great for Collectors: This gel blaster is also a fantastic addition to any collection of firearm replicas or gel blasters.

Get Ready for Gel Blasting Adventures: Whether you’re a gel blasting enthusiast or someone looking to try it for the first time, the WE-Tech G17 Gel Blaster Pistol is the perfect choice. Get your hands on one today and step into a world of thrilling and safe gel blasting action.

E&C G17 Gel Blaster Pistol Features:

products.title: A&K M1 Garand Gel Blaster AEG with Real Wood
products.body_html:
Features

  • Full size replica of the trusted M1 Garand battle rifle w/ beautifully stained real wood furniture
  • Metal receiver and barrel assembly
  • Adjustable rear sight
  • Front and rear sling rings; Stacking swivel
  • Version 7 gearbox
  • Functioning trigger guard safety
  • Drop free magazine feeds from the bottom of the rifle; Low profile magazine release on the left side of the receiver maintains traditional M1 styling

The first standard issue semi-automatic rifle issued to the US Armed Forces, the M1 Garand was referred to as "the greatest battle implement ever devised" by General George S. Patton. Replacing the venerable Springfield M1903 in 1936, the M1 Garand quickly displayed its huge advantage on the battlefield. During World War II, the M1 Garand saw extensive use and gave US forces a major advantage in firefights against Axis soldiers who were usually issued slower bolt-action rifles. The M1 Garand remained in service throughout the Korean War and even had limited deployment in the early years of the Vietnam War. The rifle still continues to be used even in the modern day by drill teams and military honor guards as well as in the civilian market long after it was retired from active service.

A&K has faithfully reproduced the venerable M1 Garand in an AEG that everyone can afford. Striving to offer the most realism and reliability for your dollar, the A&K M1 Garand features a stained wood stock and a metal alloy receiver and barrel assembly giving this M1 a realistic look and feel that will have you believing you are pushing through the hedgerows in the south of France. Internally the A&K M1 Garand is powered by a version 7 gearbox allowing a level of customization and upgradeability not found in other M1 AEG replicas on the market. While all the major features of a good M1 Garand replica are there, A&K did not skimp on the details including a period correct safety, bayonet lug, sling rings stacking swivel and an authentic sight picture. Whether you are a WWII re-enactor or an gel blaster player looking to field a unique rifle, the A&K M1 Garand delivers on looks, performance, realism and usability that puts it at the front of the pack.

Manufacturer: A&K

Specifications:

Length: 1120mm
Weight: 8.25lbs
Inner Barrel: ~445mm
Magazine Capacity: 20 round A&K M1 Garand magazines
Gearbox: Ver 7br>Motor: Short Type
Fire Modes: Semi-Auto, Safety
Package Includes: Gun, Magazine,

Seeing over 100 years of service, John Browning's self-loading semi-automatic pistol design is arguably the most popular sidearm amongst Military, Law Enforcement, and Civilian circles. There is good reason why the 1911 is the longest running Military sidearm in the world; even today some of Americas most elite fighting units still choose to carry the venerable 1911 by their side. Its simple design made the sidearm easy to use and maintain making it a very rugged and reliable weapon. The success of the weapon has prompted many firearms manufacturers to borrow from the 1911 design; to this day the 1911 is still widely used as a benchmark when comparing sidearms.

products.title: F2 Polarstar HPA engine for gel blaster toy
products.body_html:
Bite Sized Fusion Engine

Winner of the "Best HPA Engine" in the 9th Airsoft Players Choice Awards, the dual solenoid design of the F2™ provides the same functionality as the legendary Fusion Engine™ but in a more compact, efficient and flexible design. Dual solenoids allow for the nozzle and the poppet valve to be adjusted independently of each other for unparalleled control over both the loading time and air volume used. Additionally, this makes it possible to change the firing sequence giving it the ability to operate in both true closed bolt as well as "AEG" mode.

The F2™ incorporates a new one-piece, lightweight poppet valve design yet still operates on the same principle as the Fusion Engine™ poppet. This valve is able to operate at lower pressures and uses less air volume to function which optimizes air efficiency.

A robust design allows for an operating pressure range of 45psi to 145psi which enables the F2™ to achieve velocities from CQB to DMR while employing only one nozzle for the entire velocity adjustment range.

Additionally, its nozzle is spring biased forward which provides a consistent loading force regardless of operating pressure. It shares the same spring as the Fusion Engine™ with both light and heavy spring options available to adjust the loading force.

Gel Blaster Compatible

﻿F2 HPA conversion kits can also be configured for use in gel blasters.

Please contact us for information on ordering F2 systems for gel blaster use.

 Velocity: 480fps w/ .20g @ 145psi
The F2™ allows for easy velocity adjustment just by changing input pressure and does not require different nozzles to reach its full velocity range. Using a standard M4 as an example, velocity can be adjusted from below 280fps and up to approximately 480fps with a .20g BB. Velocity can vary per model as longer barrels will increase the maximum velocity while shorter barrels will decrease it. 
ROF: 30rps
The maximum cyclic rate of the F2™ is affected by several factors such as the operating pressure as well as quality of the magazine and BB's used. However, 30 rounds per second is achievable in most standard configurations.
Air Efficiency: 1000+ shots from 13/3000 @ 1.5J  w/ .28g
The standard F2™ poppet valve is equivalent to the Red Low-Flow poppet of the Fusion Engine™. However, this valve responds faster and requires less air volume to operate so the F2™ is able to achieve greater air efficiency than even a finely tuned Fusion Engine™.
(Test Configuration: Red Poppet / 6.05x375mm Barrel)

 

**All kits come with an FCU, Switchboard, Wire Harness and any additional components needed to convert the specific airsoft rifle model for which the kit is configured. The HPA Tank, Air Rig (regulator/line/QD fitting) and Battery needed to operate the system are purchased separately.

products.title: WE Tech 1911 Hex Cut Gelsoft Gas Blowback Gel Blaster - Silver
products.body_html:
Description

WE Tech 1911 Hex Cut Gelsoft Gas Blowback Gel Blaster - Silver

WE Tech is well known for producing beautiful authentic replicas that function at a level for hardcore Gelsoft players.

The 1911 Gas Blowback Gel Blaster Pistol is no exception and has many included features to mimic the original M1911 models.

Built with a full metal hex cut slide and frame along with high quality internals, this pistol is capable of withstanding even the harshest Gelsoft conditions.

The full metal hex cut top slide reacts with every trigger pull, and leaves the user feeling satisfied with the sound and kickback being offered. The integrated beavertail safety effectively prevents misfiring during quick movements and offers a more comfortable platform for players with larger hands.

Serrations along the front and rear of the slide give players a solid grip when cocking it back.

Front and rear tri-dot combat sights are perfect for zeroing your target quickly and accurately, making this a perfect sidearm for layers. The specially designed hex-cut metal grip panels offer optimal grip and comfort during long excursions. 

The WE Tech 1911 gel blaster pistol is powered by Green Gas which is filled directly into the 13-round magazine. Coming in at a hot 290-305 FPS right out of the package. The semi-auto design allows you to fire as fast as you can pull the trigger with no delay or having to manually cock back the hammer between each shot.

The overall compact design of this 1911 replica gel blaster makes it the perfect choice for tight CQB scenarios. This is a great pistol for those looking for a reliable, versatile sidearm that packs a serious punch.

Always use the appropriate eye wear and take all reasonable safety precautions when using our products.

 

Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in warm water from the tap for a minimum of 4-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain off any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

 

DISCLAIMER

Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

Built to race, and run fast!!  This WE Tech Hi Cap has a match hammer and trigger, Extended mag well and lightened slide. If you want the Ultimate bang for buck out of the box 2011, this is the one for you.

The REX line features a more ergonomic, redesigned grip with simulated stippling, improving the shooters grip. The REX line utilizes CNC finishing to ensure reliable fitment and improved performance. With a variety of designs and barrel lengths, the REX line has a pistol that will appeal to any gel baller.

  • South Australian Buyers:

products.title: WE Tech G-Series Gen 4 G34 GBB Pistol Gel Blaster (Black)
products.body_html:
Description 

WE TECH G-Series Gen 4 G34 GBB Pistol Gel Blaster (Black) is Here!

The G-Series 34 gel blaster is a competition version of G-Series 17 which fires the same round as G-Series 17 and was introduced in 1998 in order to meet the maximum size requirement for many sanctioned action gelsoft pistol sporting events.

It features a longer barrel and slide (0.8 inch more) of G-Series 17 and the top of the slide and parts of its inside are milled out, creating a conspicuous hole at the top designed to reduce front-end muzzle weight to better balance the pistol and reduce the overall weight of the slide.

Although the G-Series 34 is mainly for sport shooting, some law enforcement uses the G-Series 34 as their sidearm based on its high accuracy.

The WE TECH G-Series 34 gel blaster features a Metal Slide with a “G-Series v34 Tactical” marking, a discrete ejector and outer barrel, a fixed front sight with white dots on the outer barrel, and tactical rear sight with white dots.

It also features a Polymer Gen 4 Lower Frame with “Gen 4” marking, an extended slide stop, and 2 pcs of changeable grip with extended pin and Realistic trigger function, the same as real steel.

WE TECH gas blowback gel blaster pistols represent some of the best value and best bang for buck pistols proven worldwide as high performers and reliability above their price tag, these gelsoft versions are no different!

Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in warm water from the tap for a minimum of 4-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain off any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

 

DISCLAIMER

Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

products.title: "Skeletor" We Tech Full Metal Hyper Speed Hi-Capa Gas Blowback Gel Blaster - Black
products.body_html:
Description

"Skeletor" WE TECH Full Metal Hyper Speed Hi-CAPA Gas Blowback Gel Blaster - Black

Based on competitive race pistols used by IPSC participants, the WE Full Metal 5.1 Hi-Capa Hyper Speed is a highly customized, high-performance gas blowback gel blaster pistol.

The pistol features a full metal slide and frame that gives the gel blaster a realistic weight and feel. This model of the 5.1 sports a few unique features that will make it stand out on the field. Notably, the frame and slide will feature cut-outs to help reduce the weight of the gel blaster pistol without sacrificing durability. The cuts in the slide will also allow the pistol to cycle a lot faster and have a snappier blowback when firing.

The frame is slightly larger, as it is designed to hold a double stack WE M1911 style magazine, and is very comfortable to hold. The side grip panels are lightly textured and help maintain a more positive grip. The magazine release and magazine well are larger to facilitate faster reloading.

Just like standard M1911s, the Hyper Speed features an ambidextrous slide safety and beavertail grip safety. They included tactical rail giving gelsoft players the option to add flashlights, lasers, and more to the underside of the pistol.

WE TECH gas blowback gel blaster pistols represent some of the best value and best bang-for-buck pistols proven worldwide as high performers and reliable above their price tag, and these Gelsoft versions are no different!

Features 

  • M12 CCW THREAD OUTER BARREL
  • Full metal aluminium ported slide that reduces overall weight and adds aggressive design
  • Realistic blowback action with each shot and beavertail helps prevent slide bite
  • Integrated metal Picatinny accessory rail allows you to mount tactical flashlights and lasers with ease
  • The skeletonized hammer has a light trigger pull and the upgraded hammer gives this 1911 a modern look
  • Frame features a lightweight polymer build with thanks to lightning ports on the front of the pistol grip
  • Textured grip panels with WE Tech insignia provide a non-slip grip

products.title: Classic Army CAXM177 E2 Gelsoft Blaster
products.body_html:
Classic Army CAXM177 E2 Gelsoft Blaster


The Classic Army XM177 E2 X Series Gelsoft Blaster is one of the most ruggedly constructed XM177 E2 AEGs on the market, with key parts crafted out of Aluminium, Alloys and Steel, with a superior performing full metal gearbox.

What sets the Classic Army XM177 E2 AEGs apart from other XM177 on the market are the factory pre-upgrades, such as an improved motor, heavily reinforced internals and a high quality nylon fiber stock.

In addition this CA XM177 E2 X Series has a very convenient original M4 Sliding stock and front wired to hide the battery in the hand guard. XM177 E2 comes standard with triangle front and adjustable rear iron sights. The Classic Army full metal gearbox is built to withstand above average wear and tear and is designed to be compatible with Li-Po batteries.

The X Series also has many new realistic features that set it apart from the Classic Army AEGs of old. For example, the functional charging handle, the functional bolt catch and the real gun style magazine release. All these features and a Carbine length of the XM177 E2 X-Series Rifle (AR018M-X) make it excellent for short, medium or long range games.

FEATURES

  • Full metal upper and lower period correct style receiver
  • Injection molded polymer handguard, pistol grip and CAR-15 style adjustable stock
  • Front and rear sling points allow for use of GI style slings
  • Integrated carry handle with rear sight
  • Classic Army LiPo ready version 2 gearbox with QD spring guide and bearing piston head

SPECS:

Length: 760mm-840mm, Adjustable

FPS: 310

Colour: Gun Metal / Black
Weight: 2500g
Inner Barrel: 363mm
Thread Direction: 14mm Negative
Gearbox: Ver 2 Full Metal, 
Motor: Long Type
Fire Modes: Semi/Full-Auto, Safety
Battery: 7.4v LiPo recommended
Package Includes: Rifle, 1x Magazine, Manual

Manufacturer: Classic Army

Charging Batteries

Do not leave batteries unattended whilst charging and take off charge when they have completed charging.

When charging the batteries, we recommend charging them between 1-4 hours.
When they are charging the light/s will flash and once it is fully charged, the light/s will turn a solid red or green.

Also once you start to hear the battery getting flat, please recharge it as running it flat can damage the cells.

 Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in water from the tap for a minimum of 5-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain of any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

You can store gel balls in a bucket of water with a lid for up to 3 months before they start to go super soft. We recommend if you do this to change the water every couple of weeks.

DISCLAIMER
Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

products.title: Armoury Upgraded EMG BLITZ SPR Gold Battle Blaster
products.body_html:
This EMG BLITZ has been Armoury re tuned including gearbox re-shimming and Angle of engagement adjusted and a Deans T Plug soldered on.

The Falkor Blitz SBR from EMG starts with a metal upper and lower receiver unlike any other AEG on the market. With extensive tactical styling, this receiver is our absolute favorite, bar none.

Chrono graphing at 320fps
Running 28 rounds per second 

on eYou 11.1v battery

Upgrades pre-installed include;

-Aztech Innovations APACHE tappet less cylinder head

-Aztech CNC Adjustable T piece

-Aztech Xtreme Piston and CNC piston head

-Aztech Stainless Steel Bushes

-SHS M120 Spring

-Radius cuts to the gearbox housing for increase life and durability.

-Gears Shimmed and sorbo padded Piston for Angle of engagement set closer to 12 o'clock.

-Wired with a Deans T plug

PLEASE NOTE: this blaster has been upgraded, which means we have opened the receiver and taken it apart.  As a result you may find the take down pins, nuts bolts and screws may have some paint worn off, wear or marks 

showing on or around the receiver from handling and being worked on as a result of using tools to work on the blaster.  While we take every care we can to try and keep the blaster in as new condition, marks are inevitable when opening a blaster.

In addition to the unique styling of the Falkor, nearly every piece is ambidextrous including the magazine catch, bolt release, short throw fire selector and a Falkor Mach 15 Ambi-charging handle is also present to complete the high end look of this rifle.

A Super Dynamic 3-Gun style straight trigger gives the operator a unique and fast trigger manipulation. The Flared Magwell grip features ridges on the front for operators who prefer a magwell style grip on their rifle. It should also be noted that the upper receiver sports a unique style that will set the look apart from every other M4 variant on the market.

Moving onward you will find a flush top rail leading into FALKOR Fatty Free-Float 11.5 MLOK™ Handguard, allowing the end user to install any MLOK compatible accessories and rail segments. The furniture of the Falkor Blitz is also optimized for performance, modularity and comfort. A textured, slim profile motor grip paired with the Minimalist Stock not only completes the look of the rifle, but makes it an extremely comfortable piece to shoulder and field. 

Internally the Falkor Blitz SBR features a reinforced gearbox that has been precisely polished and inspected to ensure a low thermal and frictional coefficient. 8mm stainless ball bearings, a smooth trigger, high heat contact switch, a ball bearing spring guide and a high quality steel gear set make the internals of the Falkor Blitz SBR match the outstanding externals of this rifle. 

We all know those who like to say that any AR-15 platform rifle is just "another M4", go ahead and try to say that to the EMG Falkor Blitz SBR and you will most definitely run into some contention. 

The Big Gold Blitz comes with SDU2.0 Programmable Gear Box

Use of e-Silver Edge Gear Box SDU2.0 (Ambidextrous design)

APS SDU2.0 Electronic Gear Box, A Super Dynamic Micro Chip Unit that works together with magnet gears set, reinforced piston, quick change spring guide and micro switch trigger that gives you instant trigger response when shooting.  The circuit board of the micro-chip is replaceable and programmable. Repairing is easy and friendly. Simply pressing down the button underneath of the gear box, user can switch its fire selector modes (total 5 different modes). No external device or trigger control are needs, it is easy to program anytime and anywhere by the user.

Pre-Programmed Firing Modes: 

 

  • Mode 1 - Safe / Semi / Auto
  • Mode 2 - Safe / Semi / 3rd Burst
  • Mode 3 - Safe / 2rd Burst / Auto
  • Mode 4 - Safe / 3rd Burst / Auto
  • Mode 5 - Safe / 3rd Burst / 9rd Burst

  • Specification as follow:
      • eSilver  Edge GearBox (SDU 2.0) ECU Chips
      • Marco Trigger Switch for instant trigger response
      • Built in MOSFET on the SDU2.0 Chips to cut the power when Amp is too high.
    • 7.5mm inner barrel diameter with stainless steel inner barrel
    • Outer barrel has a M14 CCW thread
    • Weight: 2.6kgs
    • Average 320 fps
    • Ambi Matched Billet Upper/Lower Receiver
    • Ambidextrous Mirrored Bolt Release
    • Ambidextrous Mirrored Mag Release
    • Ambidextrous Mirrored Fire Selector
    • QuickSnap Dust Cover
    • Flared Magwell 
    • 11.5” MLOK™ Transition Handguard
    • Collapsible Lightweight stock
    • Blast shield Muzzle device
    • FALKOR MACH 15 Ambi-charging handle
    • Ambi Short Throw Safety Selector
    • 7.4v (2s) battery recommended (not included) 

    How to change the mode?

    Step 1) Press and hold the button. You will see a Red LED light on, hold till you see its blinking 2 times, release the button to accept the changes. Repeat Step 1 to continue your choice.

    Choice of Firing Mode:

    Mode 1 (Default)

    Safe

    Semi

    Auto

    Mode 2

    Safe

    Semi

    Three Burst

    Mode 3

    Safe

    Two Burst

    Auto

    Mode 4

    Safe

    Three Burst

    Auto

    Mode 5

    Safe

    Three Burst

    Nine Burst


    **Double click the button or unplug the battery anytime to reset the ECU back to its factory settings (Mode 1) **

products.body_html:
Introducing the Guns Modify FN Herstal SCAR L MK2 Gel Blaster GBB Rifle, a collaboration between FN Herstal and Guns Modify, licensed by Cybergun FN Herstal. With a 10-inch 2nd Generation SCAR-L body and enlarged magwell, this rifle offers a non-reciprocating angled charging handle, eliminating the risk of "SCAR bites." Upgrade your gelsoft game with this professional-grade rifle.

Featuring fully licensed trademarks and engravings from FN and Guns Modify, this rifle utilizes MWS ZET system internals and high-quality Guns Modify internals for superior performance. The proprietary bolt assembly adds to the recoil action, while the monolithic 6061 aluminum housing and polymer lower receiver make for a durable and authentic replica. Compatible with GM MWS AR Gel Blaster GBB mags, this rifle is a must-have for any gelsoft enthusiast.

Features

  • Fully Licensed by Cybergun FN Herstal 
  • 10-inch 2nd Generation SCAR-L ("Light") Mk2 Assault Rifle
  • Non-Reciprocating Angled Charging Handle version, no more SCAR bites!

products.title: APS TE Ghost Gel Blaster with Edge 2 Gear Box
products.body_html:
Description

APS Phantom Extremis MKI SDU Gel Blaster- Black

Say hello to the Phantom Extremis MK1 Gel Blaster with SDU. 

The MK1 build is based on popular American carbine styles and equipped with the ever popular modular M-Lok handguard.

A long, top RIS 22 mm rail allows for the attachment of various optical sights.

The set includes a kit of flip-up iron sights.

The MK1 is ambidextrous which is great for right and left hand play. Furthermore, the MK1 features a proprietary APS Phantom Overload pistol grip with exchangeable, anti-slip EVA panels that also features a system of absorbing the shock generated by the motor, thus improving its efficiency.

The receiver and handguard design provides the MK1 with a modern and aggressive appearance. The handguard was made in M-Lok system, which allows for the customization of the positioning of rails according to User preferences. The gel blaster also features a custom, enlarged charging handle.

The MK1 has a fixed stock with a room for a battery. The access to the storage compartment is gained after the removal of the stock pad. 

The heart of the Phantom MK1 consists of a eSilveredge SDU Gearbox. A unique technology has been used during the production process of this gearbox in order to assure the most accurate polish and finish of its elements.  The gel blaster is equipped with a Quick Spring Change System that allows the User to change the spring without having to open up the gearbox. The MK1 is hitting around 280+ FPS of Hardened Gel Balls. 

The Phantom Extremis MK1 has many amazing features and simply looks stunning! 

Features

eSilver Edge Gearbox

Quick Change Spring System
The Quick Change Spring Guide has 4 locking legs instead of 2.
Polished and Buffed housing surface.
8mm Bearing Bushings, Bearing Piston Head and Bearing Spring Guide.
Mosfet Installed

  • New Stylish Flash Hider (ICEFYRE Muzzle Break)
  • Slim and light weight KeyMod Hand Guard with Hand Stop implicit in the design, which gives your support hand a low profile anchor point in the forend. - (Phantom Dash 10 ")
  • New Phantom Low Profile Back Up Sight LP BUS 
  • The new pistol grip (phantom overload) that pre-installed with non-slip EVA plastic at the front and rear increases the comfort of holding it.
  • New version of Magazine Ambi Catch on both sides (Phantom Ambi Mags Release)
  • New Ambi trigger selector on both sides (Phantom Long / Short Throw safety selector)
  • New Ambi loading handle (Combat Ambi phantom load identifier)
  • Flat Trigger (Enhance Control and lighter perceived weight)
  • RS-1 stock installed (R Series 1 stock)

**Orange tip shown for illustration purposes**

Specs

  • Gel Type: 7-8mm
  • Inner barrel size: 7.5mm
  • Barrel Type: Polished Stainless Steel
  • Battery Source: 7.4 Li Po Battery with Mini Tamiya
  • Alloy Silver Edge Gear Box Installed
  • 8mm Metal Bushings
  • M100 Spring
  • 480 Long Shaft Motor
  • Velocity: 280+FPS
  • Fire Selector: Safe / Semi Auto / Full Auto
  • Metal Hand Guard and ABS Gen 8 Magazine 
  • Metal Gear Box, Receiver, Sliding Stock, Handguard, Outer Barrel.
  • Pistol Grip is made of a reinforced polymer. 
  • Magazine Capacity: 250 Gels
  • Suitable Hopup: DK-Gen 10 Reverse Thread Hopup 
  • Recommended Gels - Ultra Hard

** Battery, Charger & Gels not included

ESILVEREDGE GEARBOX SDU INSTRUCTIONS/SPEC

SDU2.0 is a programmable ECU chips that is being used in eSilver Edge Gear Box

Simply pressing down the button underneath the gear box, user can switch its fire selector modes (total 5 different modes). No external device or trigger control are needed, it is easy to program anytime and anywhere by the user.

First, connect your AEG with a fully charged battery (7.4V) Battery. The usual battery that you used when you play.

Second, find the switch button. The button is located underneath the gear box reachable from the magwell of the lower receiver.

How to change the mode?

Step 1) Press and hold the button. You will see a Red LED light on, hold till you see its blinking 2 times, release the button to accept the changes. Repeat Step 1 to continue your choice.

Choice of Firing Mode:

Mode 1 (Default)

Safe

Semi

Auto

Mode 2

Safe

Semi

Three Burst

Mode 3

Safe

Two Burst

Auto

Mode 4

Safe

Three Burst

Auto

Mode 5

Safe

Three Burst

Nine Burst


**Double click the button or unplug the battery anytime to reset the ECU back to its factory settings (Mode 1) **

Use of Advanced S.D.U.™ chips

The S.D.U.™ chipset that is used in the eSilver Edge Gear Box has a unique function that stops the gearbox from further damage if the electric current is too high. Simply to say, electric current / Ampere will increase if there is a malfunction inside the gearbox. For instant, bad motor, damaged gears or short circuit. When our S.D.U. detects more than 5 trigger presses in exceed Amps, the whole gearbox will shut down to prevent further damage. User has to disconnect and then reconnect the power supply to reboot the gearbox, we strongly recommended the user to check the internals immediately if mal-function happens.

Micro Switch Trigger

The eSilver Edge Gear Box standard comes with a micro switch trigger which works together with the S.D.U.™,  providing you an instant trigger response when shooting. Base on our testing, the response time of the switch is just 0.02 sec and designed for two hundred thousand presses. With the short stroke design of the trigger, it is unbelievably fast and you won’t feel any trigger delay when shooting.

products.title: APS Phantom Extremis MKI SDU Gel Blaster - Black
products.body_html:
Description

APS Phantom Extremis MKI SDU Gel Blaster- Black

Say hello to the Phantom Extremis MK1 Gel Blaster with SDU. 

The MK1 build is based on popular American carbine styles and equipped with the ever popular modular M-Lok handguard.

A long, top RIS 22 mm rail allows for the attachment of various optical sights.

The set includes a kit of flip-up iron sights.

The MK1 is ambidextrous which is great for right and left hand play. Furthermore, the MK1 features a proprietary APS Phantom Overload pistol grip with exchangeable, anti-slip EVA panels that also features a system of absorbing the shock generated by the motor, thus improving its efficiency.

The receiver and handguard design provides the MK1 with a modern and aggressive appearance. The handguard was made in M-Lok system, which allows for the customization of the positioning of rails according to User preferences. The gel blaster also features a custom, enlarged charging handle.

The MK1 has a fixed stock with a room for a battery. The access to the storage compartment is gained after the removal of the stock pad. 

The heart of the Phantom MK1 consists of a eSilveredge SDU Gearbox. A unique technology has been used during the production process of this gearbox in order to assure the most accurate polish and finish of its elements.  The gel blaster is equipped with a Quick Spring Change System that allows the User to change the spring without having to open up the gearbox. The MK1 is hitting around 280+ FPS of Hardened Gel Balls. 

The Phantom Extremis MK1 has many amazing features and simply looks stunning! 

Features

eSilver Edge Gearbox

Quick Change Spring System
The Quick Change Spring Guide has 4 locking legs instead of 2.
Polished and Buffed housing surface.
8mm Bearing Bushings, Bearing Piston Head and Bearing Spring Guide.
Mosfet Installed

  • New Stylish Flash Hider (ICEFYRE Muzzle Break)
  • Slim and light weight KeyMod Hand Guard with Hand Stop implicit in the design, which gives your support hand a low profile anchor point in the forend. - (Phantom Dash 10 ")
  • New Phantom Low Profile Back Up Sight LP BUS 
  • The new pistol grip (phantom overload) that pre-installed with non-slip EVA plastic at the front and rear increases the comfort of holding it.
  • New version of Magazine Ambi Catch on both sides (Phantom Ambi Mags Release)
  • New Ambi trigger selector on both sides (Phantom Long / Short Throw safety selector)
  • New Ambi loading handle (Combat Ambi phantom load identifier)
  • Flat Trigger (Enhance Control and lighter perceived weight)
  • RS-1 stock installed (R Series 1 stock)

**Orange tip shown for illustration purposes**

Specs

  • Inner barrel size: 7.5mm
  • Barrel Type: Polished Stainless Steel
  • Battery Source: 7.4 Li Po Battery with Mini Tamiya
  • Alloy Silver Edge Gear Box Installed
  • 8mm Metal Bushings
  • M100 Spring
  • 480 Long Shaft Motor
  • Velocity: 280+FPS
  • Fire Selector: Safe / Semi Auto / Full Auto
  • Metal Hand Guard and ABS Gen 8 Magazine 
  • Metal Gear Box, Receiver, Sliding Stock, Handguard, Outer Barrel.
  • Pistol Grip is made of a reinforced polymer. 
  • Magazine Capacity: 250 Gels
  • Suitable Hopup: DK-Gen 10 Reverse Thread Hopup 
  • Recommended Gels - Ultra Hard

** Battery, Charger & Gels not included

ESILVEREDGE GEARBOX SDU INSTRUCTIONS/SPEC

SDU2.0 is a programmable ECU chips that is being used in eSilver Edge Gear Box

Simply pressing down the button underneath the gear box, user can switch its fire selector modes (total 5 different modes). No external device or trigger control are needed, it is easy to program anytime and anywhere by the user.

First, connect your AEG with a fully charged battery (7.4V) Battery. The usual battery that you used when you play.

Second, find the switch button. The button is located underneath the gear box reachable from the magwell of the lower receiver.

How to change the mode?

Step 1) Press and hold the button. You will see a Red LED light on, hold till you see its blinking 2 times, release the button to accept the changes. Repeat Step 1 to continue your choice.

Choice of Firing Mode:

Mode 1 (Default)

Safe

Semi

Auto

Mode 2

Safe

Semi

Three Burst

Mode 3

Safe

Two Burst

Auto

Mode 4

Safe

Three Burst

Auto

Mode 5

Safe

Three Burst

Nine Burst


**Double click the button or unplug the battery anytime to reset the ECU back to its factory settings (Mode 1) **

Use of Advanced S.D.U.™ chips

The S.D.U.™ chipset that is used in the eSilver Edge Gear Box has a unique function that stops the gearbox from further damage if the electric current is too high. Simply to say, electric current / Ampere will increase if there is a malfunction inside the gearbox. For instant, bad motor, damaged gears or short circuit. When our S.D.U. detects more than 5 trigger presses in exceed Amps, the whole gearbox will shut down to prevent further damage. User has to disconnect and then reconnect the power supply to reboot the gearbox, we strongly recommended the user to check the internals immediately if mal-function happens.

Micro Switch Trigger

The eSilver Edge Gear Box standard comes with a micro switch trigger which works together with the S.D.U.™,  providing you an instant trigger response when shooting. Base on our testing, the response time of the switch is just 0.02 sec and designed for two hundred thousand presses. With the short stroke design of the trigger, it is unbelievably fast and you won’t feel any trigger delay when shooting.

products.title: APS EMG F1 Titan UDR PDW Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
The F1 Firearms PDW is a blaster unlike any other seen before. Designed and built to be as light as possible without sacrificing any of the performance. The skeletonized receiver carves away at the overall weight, all while not sacrificing any of the platforms strength and reliability. The S7M Contoured KeyMod handguard allows the shooter to add whatever accessories they deem necessary without the monumental weight of traditional railed handguards, the full length top rail provides a vast tract of space to mount optics, night vision or other accessories.

Use of Silver Edge Gear Box (Ambidextrous design)

EMG has teamed up with F1 to produce the EMG F1 PDW AEG training platform. Built to specifications provided by F1, the PDW retains all of the design and styling cues of its real firearm and airsoft big brothers, giving the user a unique and bold platform. Equally at home on the field or in a competition setting, the PDW high efficiency eSilver Edge gearbox provides superior performance in all settings. From the skeletonized receiver, to the MLok compatible S7M Contoured handguard, the EMG UDR-PDW is a faithful recreation of F1s flagship AR15 line.

  • Ambi Matched Billet Upper/Lower Receiver
  • Ambidextrous Mirrored Bolt Release
  • Ambidextrous Mirrored Mag Release
  • Ambidextrous Mirrored Fire Selector
  • QuickSnap Dust Cover in Black F1 colours
  • Flared Magwell w/Magwell Grip
  • Length: 620mm
  • Weight:  2.6kg
  • Inner Barrel: ~190mm
  • Magazine Capacity: 250rds Hi-Capacity.
  • Velocity: 300 FPS
  • Thread Direction: 14mm Negative
  • Gearbox: Silver Edge Gear Box
  • Motor: 480 long Type high torque performance motor
  • Fire Modes: Semi/Full-Auto, Safety
  • Battery: 7.4v  LiPo recommended (Wired to stock with mini tamiya connector)

Features

  • CNC finished aluminum alloy F1 skeletonized receiver copies the styling cues of the original rifle
  • CNC machined aluminum S7M Countered Mlok handguard allows for mounting of a vast variety of accessories, full length top rail accepts all common 20mm accessories
  • EMG special edition fully-upgradeable quick spring change "Ultra Smooth" gearbox
  • High Efficiency gearbox only pulls 10amps at ~290+ FPS, making this one of the most efficient gearboxes currently on the market
  • Ambidextrous fire controls allow for both right and lefty shooters
  • Noveske licensed KX3 Flash Hider
  • Anodized finish provides a vivid and long lasting finish that resists wear

 

Specification as follow:

    • Silver Edge GearBox 
    • 290+fps average velocity
    • 7.5mm inner barrel diameter with stainless steel inner barrel
    • Outer barrel has a M14 CCW thread
    • Weight: 2.6kgs
    • Ambi Matched Billet Upper/Lower Receiver
    • Ambidextrous Mirrored Bolt Release
    • Ambidextrous Mirrored Mag Release
    • Ambidextrous Mirrored Fire Selector
    • QuickSnap Dust Cover

    • Barrel: 16-inch
    • FALKOR  Free-Float 14.6” MLOK™ Transition Handguard
    • Collapsible Lightweight stock
    • VG6 Epsilon Muzzle Break
    • FALKOR MACH 15 Ambi-charging handle

    • 7.4v (2s) battery recommended (not included) 

UPGRADE OPTIONS*:

Explanation on options here; https://www.azraelsarmoury.com/blogs/7mmlife/azraels-armoury-upgrade-options-explained

Factory Retune includes;

  1. Gearbox Radius
  2. Gears re shimmed
  3. Gears correctly greased
  4. Sorbo pad add to cylinder head
  5. Angle of engagement corrected
  6. Viton O ring installed and lubricated
  7. Motor Height adjusted and loctited

Stage 1 Upgrade includes;

  1. All factory retune items plus;
  2. APACHE Tappetless cylinder head
  3. Aztech Adjustable T-Piece
  4. Aztech Speed trigger
  5. Aztech high precision shim kit

Stage 2 Upgrade includes;

  1. All Factory retune and Stage 1 upgrades plus;
  2. SHS Hardened gears

Stage 3 Upgrade includes;

  1. All previous stages plus;
  2. Warhead brushless motor
  3. Leviathan or Gate Aster optical mosfet﻿

products.body_html:
Description

The HK 416 AEG Gel Blaster is a replica of the real deal.  

Favoured by Special Forces for its Over The Beach (OTB) capability and remarkable reliability the H&K 416 is a proven platform that features all the improvements of a modern rifle coupled with the familiarity of a proven system. 

The Classic Army gearbox is a full metal Ver2 with low friction high quality steel bearings, Metal Gearbox Casing, Metal Cylinder Head & Nozzle, and quick change spring system; driving the gearbox is a high torque motor and it is shooting between 280-300 FPS -/+.

Whether you are just starting out or competition style play - our Sportline Classic Army 416 Short Gel Blaster is reliable, packs a punch and looks awesome!!!

* Package DOES NOT include gels, battery or charger. 

Features

  • Full Scale 416 Series Gelsoft Blaster
  • High Strength Nylon 416 Rail Handguard
  • High Strength Nylon 416 Upper & lower Receiver
  • Metal Gas Block w/Metal Folding Front Sight & Rear Sight 
  • Safety, Semi and Full-Automatic firing modes
  • Magazine Type: Wells M4 Magazine

  • Full Metal QD Fast Spring Change 8mm Metal Bushing Ver.2  Metal Gearbox

Charging Batteries

Do not leave batteries unattended whilst charging and take off charge when they have completed charging.

When charging the batteries, we recommend charging them between 1-4 hours.
When they are charging the light/s will flash and once it is fully charged, the light/s will turn a solid red or green.

Also once you start to hear the battery getting flat, please recharge it as running it flat can damage the cells.

 Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in water from the tap for a minimum of 5-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain of any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

You can store gel balls in a bucket of water with a lid for up to 3 months before they start to go super soft. We recommend if you do this to change the water every couple of weeks.

DISCLAIMER
Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

products.title: Warhead Industries brushless 45k Base Series 480 Short Motor
products.body_html:
HIGHLY EFFICIENT, DURABLE AND RELIABLE.

WARHAD BRUSHLESS BASE HIGH SPEED VERSION

45,000RPM at 11.1v

- CAST ALUMINIUM HIGH QUALITY CASING

-TOTAL CUSTOM IN-RUNNER DESIGN WITH MAXIMUM POWER AND TORQUE

-MACHINE WOUND HIGH TEMPERATURE RESISTANT  QUALITY COPPER WINDINGS

-HIGH QUALITY MAGNETS

-HIGH PRECISION CNC CASING BACK PLATE COVERING ESC

-BUILT IN ON-BOARD ESC WITH LOW VOLTAGE CUT-OFF AND OVER CURRENT DRAW TO -PROTECT LIPO BATTERIES FROM OVER DISCHARGE

-HIGHEST QUALITY REMOVABLE PINION GEAR FOR EASY SWITCH OUTS

-BUILT IN ACTIVE BRAKE

The constant contact of the brushes with the power terminals of a brushed motor is necessary for it to maintain its rotation. However, the friction that this creates means that a huge portion of the energy generated by the rotational motion is wasted as heat. Generally, the efficiency of brushed motors is limited within the range of 75% to 80%.

Brushed motors are notorious for having parts that get worn out after a while, requiring frequent dismantling and parts replacement. This is because the brushes of the commutator need to maintain almost constant contact with the terminals of the power source, even as the commutator rotates rapidly. When brushes get worn out and can no longer maintain contact, a brushed DC motor basically becomes useless.

This is less of a problem with brushless motors. In fact, there is essentially no contact between the rotor and stator of a brushless motor, so wear and tear are greatly reduced.

 


The accelerated wear and tear due to constant contact of the brushes and the energy generated as heat means that brushed motors are expected to break down much sooner than brushless motors. It is generally not recommended to operate a brushed motors for longer than several minutes continuously. Without a chance to cool down, heat buildup in brushed motors can easily compromise the integrity of its coils or brushes.

Although in brushless motors there is still some heat generation due to air friction, this is kept at a manageable level. Brushless motors can typically run from 30 minutes to an hour continuously with no problems.

 

WHY USE A BRUSHLESS MOTOR IN YOUR AEG?

Brushless DC motors have no brushes to get worn out, they represent a huge leap forward in technology. Brushless output significantly higher efficiency and performance, and have a lower susceptibility to mechanical wear than their brushed counterparts.

Brushless motors offer several other advantages, including;


  • Higher torque to weight ratio
  • Increased torque per watt of power input (increased efficiency)
  • Increased reliability and lower maintenance requirements
  • Reduced operational and mechanical noise
  • Longer lifespan (no brush and commutator erosion)
  • Elimination of ionizing sparks from the commutator (ESD)
  • Near-elimination of electromagnetic interference (EMI)

JUST TAKE OUT YOUR ORIGINAL MOTOR AND USE THE EXISTING CONNECTORS ON YOUR AEG TO CONNECT YOUR NEW MOTOR.

PLEASE NOTE: Mosfet users please ensure the mosfet is set to run 100% speed, dont slow the motor speed using mosfet speed control.

products.body_html:
CYMA Full Metal M-LOK AEG Rifle - BLACK

The CYMA AEG, a full-length M-Lok is now available! Unlike other standard M4 AEGs, this full metal version (upper/lower receivers, outer barrel), now comes equipped with an aluminum M-Lok handguard, full length picatinny top rail, giving you more than extensive M-Lok rail surface area for mounting a long list of tactical accessories. However, this full metal is just as impressive under the hood. A reinforced Version 2 gearbox not only makes it reliable but also a perfect platform for internal upgrades.

The CYMA blasters do come with an 11.1v battery and a USB charger.  We highly recommend not using the USB charger and buying a balance charger to charge the Lypo as the USB chargers are renowned for damaging lypo batteries and causing catastrophic failures, we would prefer if the blasters were not supplied with the charger but CYMA opted to include.

Features:

  • Full metal M-Lok handguard allows for easy addition of weapon lights, grenade launchers or other accessories

It is a development of the Remington 721 and 722 series of rifles, which were introduced in 1948. products.title: Classic Army MP5SD Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Classic Army MP5SD Gel Blaster

This Classic Army Gel Blaster version of the MP5SD is a beautiful rendition in 1 to 1 scale of a model specifically developed to meet the requirements of many Special Operations Forces around the world!

The MP5 is a submachine gun, developed by a German manufacturer in the 1960s. A typical MP5 fires 9mm Luger ammunition from a curved detachable box-type magazine. The MP5's accuracy, reliability, and wide range of accessories and variants have made it the submachine gun (SMG) of choice for military and law enforcement agencies worldwide.

The Classic Army MP5SD has a metal suppressor, cocking tube and receiver. The short barrel provides good accuracy up to medium to long range.
This model is fantastic out of the box and includes a metal magazine to get the job done, swiftly, efficiently and without fault.

FEATURES

  • High strength polymer Stock & Pistol Grip
  • Metal Dummy Suppressor and Quick Dis-assembly Metal Body
  • Version 2 Gearbox
  • High Quality Cast Steel Gears, Gearbox Shell, and a Nylon Piston
  • Movable Cocking Lever 
  • Metal barrel assembly
  • 300 FPS on 11.1v Battery Using AKA / Gelsoft Ultra Hard Gels

**Orange tip shown for illustration purposes**

SPECS

Gel Type:  AKA / Ultra Elites / Gelsoft Ultra Hard Gels Battery Source: Mini Tamiya 7.4v 1100mah 
Inner Barrel Length: 22.5cm Mosfet: No
Inner Barrel ID: 7.2mm Fire Select: Single/Semi/Full Auto
Inner Barrel Type: Alloy Blaster Body: Polymer/Metal
Gearbox Type: Metal Version 2 Gearbox Velocity: 300 FPS
Bushing/Bearing: 8mm Bushings Magazine Type: Classic Army MP5 Metal Magazine
Spring: 1.4 Spring Magazine Capacity: Approx 110 Gel Rounds
Motor Type: 480 Long Suitable Hopup: Inner Barrel Hopup (UBand/Rizer/DK16/DK13 Hopup)


** Battery and charger not included.

PACKAGE INCLUDES

1x Classic Army MP5 SD2 Gel Blaster
1x Magazine
1x Safety Glasses

Charging Batteries

Do not leave batteries unattended whilst charging and take off charge when they have completed charging.

When charging the batteries, we recommend charging them between 1-4 hours.
When they are charging the light/s will flash and once it is fully charged, the light/s will turn a solid red or green.

Also once you start to hear the battery getting flat, please recharge it as running it flat can damage the cells.

 Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in water from the tap for a minimum of 5-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain of any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

You can store gel balls in a bucket of water with a lid for up to 3 months before they start to go super soft. We recommend if you do this to change the water every couple of weeks.

DISCLAIMER
Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

products.title: KELe HT Beretta 92FS Mamba Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol – Chrome
products.body_html:
In the real world, Beretta 92FS has been setting the standards for best military, police and tactical pistol for over a quarter century. The reason is that it was designed-and has kept evolving-to be and remain the most accurate, durable and reliable semi auto handgun on the market. Easy to use, absolutely safe and delivering impressive firepower, it remains the sidearm of the US military and of allied forces the world over, as well as of countless police and law-enforcement agencies.

Unlock the ultimate replica model experience with our Beretta 92FS Manual Springer Gel Blaster. Engineered for precision and realism, this gel blaster replicates the iconic Beretta 92FS design, providing an authentic feel for enthusiasts and collectors alike.

Built with attention to detail and quality, this gel blaster boasts a durable construction that can withstand intense gameplay. The manual springer mechanism adds up to a cost-effective and low-maintenance solution for beginner gel blaster enthusiasts, the obvious differences between this and more expensive GBB Pistols being that this is a manual single shot system, powered by a spring (Hence the name “Springer”), and doesn’t have a semi auto function.

In the hand the KELe HT Beretta 92FS Mamba Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol feels suitably weighty, making it a very realistic replica of the original. The firing selection is single shot, per rack of the slide. The Blaster can also be “stripped down” just like it’s rear world counterpart, with the slide being removable from the lower.

KELe HT Beretta 92FS Mamba Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol Features:

  • Model: KELe HT Beretta 92FS Mamba Manual Springer Gel Blaster Pistol
  • Type: Manual, Mechanical, Spring-Powered (Single shot, rack the slide for each re-load)
  • Single-Shot Pull-Back Type
  • 1:1 Ratio
  • Full Metal Construction
  • Threaded outer barrel
  • Magazine Fed
  • Magazine Capacity: Approx. 15 Gel Balls
  • Uses 7-8mm Gel Balls

Performance:

  • Up to 140 Feet per Second
  • Up to 20m Firing Distance
  • 1 Shot per Pull Back of Slide

products.title: TG ARP9 CQB Translucent AEG SMG Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Introducing the TianGong Arp9 AEG Gel Blaster, a top-notch simulated firearm toy that falls within the submachine gun/CQB series of blasters, featuring a compact gun body for enhanced manoeuvrability and easy target acquisition.

Crafted in strong and light Nylon Polymer, this gel blaster boasts a stunning and intricate design, making it an ideal choice for collectors and skirmishers alike. Its gearing and spring setting ensures a decent firing speed, extended range, and reasonable precision, providing players with a remarkably realistic gaming experience.

The TianGong Arp9 offers the standard fire select shooting modes; safe, semi automatic and full auto, allowing players to adapt to different in-game scenarios. Enhanced anti-shake functionality ensures improved accuracy during dynamic battlefield situations.

Equipped with a detachable magazine and an adjustable  plastic “Iron” sights, the gel blaster provides added convenience for players to seamlessly change and fine-tune their equipment. Users can expect an outstanding shooting experience coupled with unparalleled entertainment enjoyment. The TG ARP9 also boasts a full length top picatinny rail, with small picatinny sections on the underside and sides of the handguard. The rear plastic site, when folded flat, also can act as a picatinny riser, if you want to mount sights or optics.

When comparing the XYL Arp9’s with the TG Arp9, the key distinction lies in economy levels. Both exhibit impressive performance, but the TG Arp9 stands out as a cost-effective option, offering remarkable value for money. Despite a minimal performance gap, the significant difference in price makes the TG Arp9 a highly recommended choice among Gel Blaster enthusiasts and players alike. Elevate your gaming experience with the TianGong Arp9 AEG Gel Blaster – where performance meets affordability.

TG ARP9 CQB AEG Gel Blaster Assault Riffle Features:

  • Metal Trigger and Buttstock Rails
  • Adjustable Buttstock
  • Fire Select: Safe, Semi Auto and Full Auto
  • Charging handle activates Mag Prime
  • Charging Handle Opens Bolt Chamber Dust Cover
  • Simulated Blow Back function of the Bolt within the chamber (run by the Piston reciprocating)
  • Full Length Buffer Tube (Meaning that the longer standard batteries will fit)

TG ARP9 CQB AEG Gel Blaster Assault Riffle Included in the box:

  • 1 x TG ARP9 CQB AEG Gel Blaster Assault Rifle
  • Metal gearbox and gears
  • 1 x Gel Ball Magazine
  • 1 x 14mm CCW Flash Hider
  • 1 x Pack of Flip Up sights Set (Rear sight can double as a picatinny rail riser)
  • 1 x Pack sample gels 
  • 1 x USB Charger
  • 1 x 7.4 v LiPo Battery
  • 1 x Mini crosshead screwdriver (to attach the flip up sights)
  • 2 x Allen Keys
  • 1 x Instruction manual (Chinese and English)

Ammo Size:

  • 7 – 8 mm

Remember, one Magazine is never enough. The TG ARP9 is compatible with the XYL magazines, which would make for a great way to get extra mags, ready for those full on Skirmishes. You can find those extra mags here at "XYL ARP9 Stick Magazine"

products.title: KELe Colt 1873 Peacemaker Manual Revolver – Black
products.body_html:
The Colt Single Action Army (also known as the SAA, Model P, Peacemaker, or M1873) is a single-action revolver handgun. It was designed for the U.S. government service revolver trials of 1872 by Colt’s Patent Firearms Manufacturing Company (today known as Colt’s Manufacturing Company) and was adopted as the standard-issued pistol of the U.S. Army from 1873 until 1892.

Its overall appearance has remained consistent since 1873. Colt has cancelled its production twice, but brought it back due to popular demand. The revolver was dubbed the “Peacemaker”, and is a famous piece of Americana and the American Wild West era, due to its popularity with ranchers, lawmen, and outlaws alike. Today, they are mainly bought as memorabilia by collectors and re-enactors. Its design has influenced the production of numerous other models from other companies.

The KELe Colt Peacemaker Manual Revolver pistols are next level in quality and these are no exception. A solid metal and nylon built will definitely please any collector. These shoot gels and small foam darts, so you can really get into the spirit of gun slinging and target shooting. The The KELe Colt Peacemaker Manual Revolver pistols are a single action trigger, meaning the hammer has to be cocked back, for each shot.

KELe Colt Peacemaker Manual Revolver Features:

  • Metal and Nylon body
  • Realistic Single Action Revolver
  • Spring Powered
  • Smooth Cylinder Cycling

IN THE BOX

1 x KELe Colt SAA Peacemaker Manual Blaster – Black

6 x Shells

10 x soft darts

Items you need to make the blaster work (that are NOT included).
