products.title: A&K Cybergun FN SP SYSTEM MK46 GEL BLASTER LMG BATTLEWORN VERSION
products.body_html:
The MK46 is a variant of the base M249 or Minimi seen and used by many militaries around the world. The MK46 in particular is a variant used by the United States military forces and can easily be differentiated from the baseline M249. The two key differences are the addition of Picatinny rails on the upper receiver for the mounting of optics and the railed handguard up front.

This MK46 replica is T8's attempt to modernize the aging A&K MK46 machine gun gel blaster. Externally, other than the nice and authentic battle-worn finish, this machine gun gel blaster carries all the nice bits from the original A&K MK46, featuring a quick detach barrel and adjustable rear sights with Picatinny railed top cover, and handguard for accessories. The lower receiver has been updated to be of CNC construction and the buffer tube is of M4 / AR15 spec with a stock that is made for M4 / AR 15 giving it arguably better ergonomics.

Internally, this machine gun has an updated gearbox with a high-torque motor and CNC gear set, 8mm bearings, a piston with steel teeth, and also a quick detachable spring system allowing for quick spring change for different FPS, allowing users to tune this  machine gun gel blaster to your favorite field's requirements with ease.

Includes:

  • x1 T8 X A&K SP System MK46 MOD0 LMG AEG Battleworn Version gel blaster - BK
  • x1 Drum Magazine
  • x1 Fore Grip
  • FN gun case

products.title: LDT - SCAR-H DMR GEL BLASTER
products.body_html:
Just like the real thing, the LDT SCAR-H Gel blaster is an adaptable weapon platform, with a multitude of practical features. The stock is ergonomically designed, being both length and cheek height adjustable. The length of the stock can be adjusted through numerous positions, and the cheek pad can be raised or lowered, allowing you to comfortable shoulder and aim the SCAR-H. The ironsights are fully adjustable for windage and elevation and can be flipped up/down when required, and the rear ironsight can be removed. The SCAR-H makes use of a monolithic upper receiver meaning that the top 20mm RIS rail is a single piece running uninterrupted along the receiver and handguard top, allowing you to attach any optics or scopes that you require. The handguard features 20mm RIS rails on the side and lower faces, providing ample space to mount attachments such as foregrips, flashlights and lasers. LDT in conjunction with ARES has successfully recreated the SCAR-H’s ambidextrous controls, allowing both right and left-handed Gel Ballers to easily use the fire selector, magazine release and sling mounts.

Features:

  • CNC machined 6063 alloy upper receiver
  • LDX Standard split gearbox
  • Ambidextrous magazine release
  • Ambidextrous fire selector
  • Functional dummy bolt
  • Folding, 4 Position stock
  • Rubber butt plate
  • Adjustable cheek rest
  • Monolithic receiver
  • Full length top rail for optics
  • Two short side mount
  • Bottom rail
  • Folding ironsights
  • Removable rear ironsight
  • Quick change barrel system
  • MREX Handguard with extended barrel

Package Includes:

  1. SCAR-H DMR
  2. Magazine

products.title: LDT - FN SCAR-H MK17 GEL BLASTER
products.body_html:
Just like the real thing, the LDT SCAR-H Gel blaster is an adaptable weapon platform, with a multitude of practical features. The stock is ergonomically designed, being both length and cheek height adjustable. The length of the stock can be adjusted through numerous positions, and the cheek pad can be raised or lowered, allowing you to comfortable shoulder and aim the SCAR-H. The ironsights are fully adjustable for windage and elevation and can be flipped up/down when required, and the rear ironsight can be removed. The SCAR-H makes use of a monolithic upper receiver meaning that the top 20mm RIS rail is a single piece running uninterrupted along the receiver and handguard top, allowing you to attach any optics or scopes that you require. The handguard features 20mm RIS rails on the side and lower faces, providing ample space to mount attachments such as foregrips, flashlights and lasers. LDT in conjunction with ARES has successfully recreated the SCAR-H’s ambidextrous controls, allowing both right and left-handed Gel Ballers to easily use the fire selector, magazine release and sling mounts.

Features:

CNC machined 6063 alloy upper receiver
LDX Standard split gearbox
Ambidextrous magazine release
Ambidextrous fire selector
Functional dummy bolt
Folding, 4 Position stock
Rubber butt plate
Adjustable cheek rest
Monolithic receiver
Full length top rail for optics
Two short side mount
Bottom rail
Folding ironsights
Removable rear ironsight
Quick change barrel system

products.title: Salient Arms DS 4.3" 2011 Gas Blow Back Gel Blaster Pistol - Silver (FULL AUTO)
products.body_html:
Features

  • Machined aluminum alloy frame and slide provides rugged reliability without sacrificing weight
  • Officially licensed Salient Arms International trademarks
  • Front and rear combat style sights with integrated forward fiber optic
  • Machined anti-glare slide top, 2011 SAI Grip panels, ambidextrous safety and squared trigger
  • Titanium nitride style SAI barrel and on-frame integrated accessory rail
  • Powered by both Green gas magazine by AW Custom
  • Deep engraving w/ realistic external finish, look, and feel
  • Full auto select fire w/ superior performance, 1:1 scale, and realistic blowback

There are a plethora of 2011 style competition pistols on the market. Many of them are fine competition guns, but they lack the rugged durability and dependability of a solid, reliable duty or personal defense weapon. Seeing this gap in the market, and already well known for making high performance, rugged weapon systems, Salient Arms set to work producing a double stack 1911 that could clean up at the competition range and defend your home or protect your life in the field. The end result of years of research was the Salient Arms DS 2011 pistol. Precision machined with a form follows function attitude the SAI DS was manufactured for no other purpose in mind then to fill the needs of the hardcore shooting enthusiast. Equipped with aggressive front and rear slide serrations, milled lightening cuts on both side of the slide and aggressive competition style sights the SAI DS clearly is a pistol designed for shooters by shooters. As with all of their products, Salient Arms rewrote the rules of 2011 style pistols when they manufactured the DS, forging a new trail and leaving old conventions behind, the end result is a pistol that functions in the harshest conditions, under the heaviest of stresses and provides service you can stake your life on.

EMG has extended their collaboration with the Salient Arms and is proud to release the Salient Arms x EMG DS 2011 collaboration Training pistol gel blaster. Manufactured with an eye to detail the EMG SAI DS 2011 is CNC machined from aluminum alloy and features all of the trademarks of a Salient Arms pistol, incuding: a titanium nitride style barrel, competition style sights with fiber optic front insert, ambidextrous safety and, of course, stamped Salient Arms International rollmarks. Utilizing the Tokyo Marui Hi-Capa gas system, the Salient Arms / EMG DS pistol can be upgraded from a wide pool of available parts and components, ensuring easy repair and maintenance and years of reliable service.

Dimensions: 205mm x 150mm
Gas Type: Green Gas
Firing Mode: Semi/Full Automatic, Safety
System: Gas Blowback
Package Includes: Gun, Magazine
Manufacturer: EMG / Licensed by Salient Arms International.

products.title: SAI INNOVATIONS™ / EMG -BLU TIER ONE COMPETITION GEL BLASTER GOLD & BLACK
products.body_html:
FEATURES

  • Lightweight, rugged injection molded polymer frame, with interchangeable backstraps and "stippled" texture for positive grip surface, designed off of the original SAI specifications for optimized ergonomics
  • Frame integrated 20mm accessory rail is ideal for mounting weapon lights and other accessories
  • Fiber optic front sight and SAI rear sight, designed specifically for single handed manipulation (compatible with all TM spec sights)
  • SAI brass color removable backstrap and magazine release for added weight to enhance balance while shooting
  • Precision CNC machined, weather-resistant black anodized finish aluminum alloy slide with licensed deep engraved SAI logos and trademarks
  • Slide lightening cuts and facets provide an overall improved recycle rate
  • Steel front and rear sights; front sight includes fiber optic rod
  • Threaded, fluted SAI style outer barrel with gold finish to emulate the real SAI TiN coating

Designed, manufactured and marketed, entirely in house by Salient Arms, the SAI BLU is the first production handgun from SAI. Using feedback from real world users, Salient Arms developed the SAI BLU to fill the void between M&P ergonomics and Glock reliability. With aggressive cocking serrations, ergonomically designed grip and trigger guard and interchangeable backstraps the SAI BLU is designed to perform under the most rigorous and austere of conditions, no matter what the shooter requires of it.

The Salient Arms International Tier One line of lides from EMG are a great way to give your SAI BLU a unique and aggressive look! Not only do they look cool, they also preserve the performance of your EMG SAI BLU. Each slide is CNC machined from aluminum, preserving that crisp, snappy blowback action from the original BLU slide. All slides feature deep-engraved SAI trademarks. The gold barrel features deep-engraved SAI trademarks, along with internal threading for use with compatible threaded adapters. Gold barrels are coated in a TiN color finish, giving them an authentic, realistic look.

The Swiss Army P226 is a renowned semi-automatic pistol designed by SIG Sauer. It is widely used by military, law enforcement, and special forces units around the world. The P226 is chambered in 9mm Parabellum, though it is also available in .40 S&W and .357 SIG. Known for its accuracy, durability, and reliability, the P226 has a double/single action system and is equipped with a stainless-steel slide, making it resistant to corrosion. Its ergonomic design, coupled with advanced safety features, has made it a popular choice for military forces, including the Swiss Army.

The Canik TP9 is a Turkish-made semi-automatic pistol introduced in 2009 by Canik Arms, a subsidiary of the Turkish company MKEK. Originally designed for military and law enforcement use, the TP9 became popular in civilian markets due to its affordability, reliability, and performance. It is chambered in 9mm NATO, a widely used caliber known for its balanced performance, providing a good mix of stopping power and manageable recoil. The TP9 features a striker-firedmechanism, with various models offering different configurations such as the TP9 Elite SC and TP9 SFX. Known for its ergonomic design, high capacity magazines, and accuracy, the TP9 is a popular choice among gun enthusiasts and professionals alike.

*GBB 101: It is a good idea to let your magazine return to regular temperature before using it again for optimized performance. We recommend spare magazines for best performance on all GBB's.

About AW Custom

While the world around us has moved to less demanding production techniques, AW Custom has stayed true to its original values based on craftsmanship and quality, that is why AW Custom products are able to last a lifetime. We are the keepers of a culture's ancient craft, a symbol of the gel blaster maker's desire to stay true to tradition. Each stage of the process: from manufacturing to finishing, is a specialized skill that takes time and careful attention.

You can feel the incredibly tight tolerances on fit and finish with this pistol in every shot you take.

products.title: Noveske Gen4 10.5" Shorty Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
This fully licensed gel blaster has all the inscription coming from the original Noveske rifle. The trademarked Noveske logo can be clearly seen on the body receiver. The body receiver is using Gen 4 where its fire selector, mag release and bolt release button are all ambidextrous.

The Hand Guard is dedicate to Noveske NSR-9.75 M-Lok Rail System, the pistol grip is designed exclusively to EMG brand with EMG trademark on it.

For its Inner barrel, it is made of Chromium Molybdenum (Cr-Mo) Steel Alloy, same material that is being used in Automotive camshaft roller. Through unique machining process and heat treatment, the inner barrel grinding not only get the close tolerance but also increase lifetime of the barrel. Compare to other metals, Cr-Mo Alloy produce less vibration when shooting, thus improve overall accuracy when shooting gels.

When it comes to body receiver and hand guard, all the metal parts are CNC refined, we make sure every metal joint seen on this gun are “seamless” like a real firearms..

Join the Gel Blaster Revolution: Don’t miss out on the excitement! Elevate your gel blaster experience with the King Arms TWS SBR (Short-Barrelled Rifle) GBBR Gel Blaster. products.title: Wolverine INFERNO Gen 2 for AEG Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
The INFERNO Gen 2 features a revolutionary single solenoid, independent poppet and nozzle design that sets a new standard for a drop in kit. Particularly, it is designed to solve the “open bolt problem”. It is a hybrid design which keeps the advantages of an open bolt system: easy tuning, no first round dry fire, efficiency, etc… and adds the simplicity of easier hop up tuning that closed bolt systems have traditionally offered. In addition, it further improves the efficiency over our previous systems by an estimated 10-15%. 

Our kits include choice of our Spartan Electronics board or Gen 2 Premium FCU and everything you need to install the INFERNO Gen 2 in your gun platform.

products.title: Gate Blu Link
products.body_html:
Blu-Link allows for wireless management of your GATE ETU via GCS app for iOS, Android and later this year, also Windows / macOS. You can use iPhone, Android smartphone or a computer to control ASTER or TITAN and connect them with other compatible GATE devices, such as STATUS Gun-mounted Computer. Blu-Link perfectly expands GATE ETUs possibilities by equipping them with Bluetooth® 5.0 technology.

It also acts as an additional fuse and multifunctional wattmeter allowing for, e.g., reading telemetry data, which enables you to constantly monitor the blasters condition.

Key features

  • Bluetooth® adapter – adds Bluetooth® function to TITAN and ASTER
  • Wireless connection between GATE ETU and compatible GATE devices – enables connecting ASTER or TITAN with other elements of GATE ecosystem (e.g., future GATE STATUS)
  • Compatibility with GCS app for iOS, Android and later this year, also Windows/macOS
  • Option to switch between data transfer and firing mode from the app level
  • Additional configurable smart fuse (UVP, SCP, OCP, OTP) – protects the battery in case of short circuiting wires between Blu-Link and TITAN or ASTER or other system failure. It provides under voltage, over current and over temperature protection
  • Multifunctional wattmeter allowing for, e.g., reading telemetry data
  • Conformal coating (Military Specification MIL-V-173C)

 

Advantages

  • Designed to consume very little power
  • Full mobility – no cables needed to connect with the GCS app and forthcoming STATUS
  • In the data transfer mode, it allows for programming, changing settings and updating TITAN and ASTER firmware via GCS app
  • Can be plugged between the ETU and the battery through entire skirmish – no need to detach the battery for configuration or checking the Statistics (contrary to the USB-Link)

 

If you want to connect with GATE Control Station via USB, use GATE USB-Link.

GATE Control Station™ app

Together with the GCS, you can adjust TITAN or ASTER settings and update or upgrade their firmware from devices with Android, iOS and since fall 2020, also Windows or macOS. The GCS offers you the option to:

  • control your airsoft gun
  • simply adjust GATE ETU settings
  • update and upgrade firmware
  • see the BB counters and measurements statistics
  • perform diagnostics and send reports

 

GATE Control Station download page

products.body_html:
Description

5” Python 357 Gelsoft Revolver

This Gel Blaster has a great weight and awesome feel when you pick it up.

With functioning Cylinder and plastic shells, it is a great toy to muck around with. 

Features

  • The hammer pulls back and locks into place and the Cylinder rotates with every pull of the trigger. 
  • Solid Metal / Nylon Body
  • Performance is about 5-10 meters and 85 - 90 FPS out of the box.
  • The Python gel blaster makes a great prop for cosplay.

products.title: Thompson M1A1 Gel blaster Simulated DARK “WOOD”
products.body_html:
The Thompson submachine gun is an American submachine gun first invented by John T. Thompson in 1918 during World War I and became infamous during the Prohibition era, being a signature weapon of various organized crime syndicates in the United States. It was a common sight in the media of the time, being used by both law enforcement officers and criminals.  The Thompson submachine gun was also known informally as the “Tommy Gun”, “Street Sweeper”, “Annihilator”, “Chicago Typewriter”, “Trench Broom”, “Chicago Submachine”, “Chicago Piano”, “Chicago Style”, “Chicago Organ Grinder”, “Drum Gun”, “the Chopper”, “the Tommy Boy” or simply “the Thompson”.

The Thompson was favored by soldiers, criminals, police, the FBI, and civilians alike for its fully automatic fire, while still being relatively lightweight, portable and easy to use. It has since gained popularity among civilian collectors for its historical significance. It has considerable significance in popular culture, especially in works about the Prohibition era and World War II, and is one of the most well known and recognized firearms in history. The original fully automatic Thompsons are no longer produced, but numerous semi-automatic civilian versions are still being manufactured by Auto-Ordnance. These retain a similar appearance to the original models, but they have various modifications in order to comply with modern firearm laws.

This Thompson gel blaster is truly a first for the gel blaster industry.

It comes with:

  • proprietary Thompson gearbox
  • Stick mag

Construction is of nylon with some metal parts.

Gel blasters are toys only and are NOT weapons or firearms.

Always use the appropriate eye wear and take all reasonable safety precautions when using our products.

NOTE: Please note, gels included with blasters are generally of low quality and can often cause feeding issues, we highly recommend you purchase our high quality harden gels for the best performance.( X-Force Black Label gels)

DESCRIPTION

Type: Gel blaster

Material: Nylon/Metal

Uses: 7-8 mm gels

The M1 and M1A1 had a barrel without cooling fins, a simplified rear sight, provisions only for box magazines, employed a straight blowback action and the charging handle was on the side of the receiver.

Over 1.5 million military Thompson submachine guns were produced during World War 2.

products.title: Scylla by Jefftron – V2 optical Mosfet Electronic Trigger Unit
products.body_html:
Specifications

Introducing the Scylla by Jefftron – V2 optical Mosfet Electronic Trigger Unit

A cutting-edge performance upgrade for your Gel Blaster or AEG, designed to enhance trigger responsiveness, firing modes, and overall reliability. This state-of-the-art unit is packed with advanced features and provides seamless control through the Leviathan & Scylla app.

The Scylla – V2 optical is one of the most advanced ETU (electronic trigger unit) on the market

It combines optical and magnetic sensors for better handling and durability

Built-in wireless communication for quick setup using iOS or Android smartphones!

An adapter with magnet, is attached on the trigger, so you can adjust its sensitivity conveniently from the app

The Scylla offers everything you would expect from a processor unit:

  • Binary trigger
  • Burst fire
  • Trigger sensitivity
  • Rate of fire reduction
  • Piston pre-cocking
  • Li-Po alarm
  • statistics and much more

Real time response for any change in the settings – immediately feel the results

Easy to instal into the gearbox (fully integrated inside the gearbox instead of the original trigger contacts)

New functions are for free for every user via online update

The Scylla – V2 provides everything that’s important for your blaster!

Scylla by Jefftron – V2 optical Mosfet Electronic Trigger Unit Key Features:

  • Adjustable Trigger Sensitivity: Fine-tune trigger response using the magnet adapter, which can be easily used on standard V2 triggers or Jefftron-specific triggers.
  • Customizable Fire Modes: Configure and assign fire modes to your firing switch, including:
    • SAFE: No response to trigger pulls.
    • Semi: Single shot per trigger pull.
    • Binary Trigger: One shot on pull, another on release.
    • Burst: Fires a burst with each pull.
    • Burst/Full-Auto: Short press for burst, long press for full-auto.
    • Full-Auto: Continuous fire until trigger release.
  • Rate of Fire Reduction: Adjust your RoF between 40%-100% via the app, ideal for optimizing performance or diagnosing issues.
  • Active Brake System: Solve double-burst issues with weak springs by braking the motor after each shot, fully adjustable in the app from 0-100%.
  • Piston Pre-cocking: Enhance trigger response by pre-cocking the piston in semi mode, adjustable up to 80% for ultra-quick shots.
  • Electronic Fuse Protection: Built-in protection against short circuits ensures the safety of your device.
  • Li-Po Battery Alarm: Automatically detects and alerts you when battery voltage is low, preserving the longevity of your gear.
  • Advanced Stats: Access real-time data such as RoF, shot count, cycle time, motor temperature, and battery voltage to optimize performance.
  • Compatible with Brushless Motors: Easily integrate with brushless motors such as Warhead, with full app support.

Built to Last:

The Scylla V2 is protected against water damage with a durable lacquer coating. Installation is a breeze, with support for a mechanical trigger stop (optional).

Included in the Package:

  • Scylla V2 electronic module with wiring to stock and T-plug connector
  • Magnet adapter for standard trigger
  • Securing screw, wire holders, and stickers
  • Dog Tag keychain
  • Online manual for easy setup

The Scylla by Jefftron takes your gameplay to the next level, offering precise control and unmatched reliability in the heat of battle. Perfect for Gel Blaster enthusiasts and Airsoft players looking to elevate their tactical experience.

products.title: Aztech Innovations Hyperion TSG (Triple Sector Gear) and Rack
products.body_html:
Aztech Innovations Triple Sector Gear (TSG) and rack! For unbelievable trigger response and rate of fire, you cannot get any faster than a triple sector gear. This new design is like no other TSG on the market. It is much stronger than any other gear on the market and giving ample time for piston reset to ensure no PME issues.

Made of hardened SCM440 steel makes it an extremely durable gear. This sector gear is designed to be paired with an SHS gear set (18:1 for example). This gear is designed to be used with the APACHE as this gear does not have lugs for a tappet plate.

We are making this with 1 extra teeth (6 teeth total on each sector) so that;

  1. You get more volume (longer barrels etc)
  2. Higher fps
  3. Must use with optical leviathan, regular Leviathan, Gate Aster or switch block (for cycle detection)

Expect 265fps with a 10cm barrel and M190 spring at 85 rounds per second.

Always use the appropriate eye wear and take all reasonable safety precautions when using our products.
 
Soaking & Storage of Gels
When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in water from the tap for a minimum of 5-6 hours. Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator. When you are ready to use them just drain of any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly. You can store gel balls in a bucket of water with a lid for up to 3 months before they start to go super soft. We recommend if you do this to change the water every couple of weeks.

DISCLAIMER
Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

The Tracer Gel Blaster pistol is one of the funkiest Gel Blasters on the market. This Gel Blasters, have an impressive rate of fire and light up to really set the mood.  With the choice of using either the sleek colour matched hopper, or the simple bottle hopper, the configuration is up to you.

The Sleek space age hopper gives you the maximum Gel capacity but need the blaster to be held fairly flat for gels to feed freely. Whereas using the bottle as the hopper, gives you the most consistent feed for the gels.

Seeing over 100 years of service, John Browning's self-loading semi-automatic pistol design is arguably the most popular sidearm amongst Military, Law Enforcement, and Civilian circles. There is good reason why the 1911 is the longest running Military sidearm in the world; even today some of Americas most elite fighting units still choose to carry the venerable 1911 by their side. Its simple design made the sidearm easy to use and maintain making it a very rugged and reliable weapon. The success of the weapon has prompted many firearms manufacturers to borrow from the 1911 design; to this day the 1911 is still widely used as a benchmark when comparing sidearms.

products.title: Aztech Innovations FusionX ARP9 HPA Receiver - tank grip version
products.body_html:
Yet again we are redefining the extreme lightweight HPA receiver market!

Tank in grip version in ARP9 format 

For fully built variant, this will include Polarstar Jack HPA Engine, MR2 regulator and labour to install and test.

The Aztech Innovations Chimera HPA Gel Blaster Receiver is a game-changer for competitive players. Crafted from durable polymer with a carbon fiber guard, this receiver is built to withstand intense gameplay while remaining incredibly lightweight at just 650 grams when fully equipped with running gear.

Designed to accommodate Polarstar HPA systems, the Chimera features a 0-degree grip with textured rubber panels for superior control and comfort. Its ultra-quick, tool-less assembly allows for seamless setup and maintenance, letting you access the battery and FCU in under 5 seconds—an essential feature for serious players.

Engineered for peak performance, the Chimera HPA receiver boasts a streamlined design with no middle part of the receiver, allowing for direct trigger board mounting behind the trigger. The custom magazine release and trigger system provide versatility and precision, making it an ideal choice for left or right-handed players.

The receiver supports buffer tube installation and includes a rear blanking plate for those seeking an even lighter configuration. Available in a range of colors including Black, Translucent, Translucent Blue, Green, Red, and Purple, the Chimera HPA receiver not only performs exceptionally but also looks striking on the field.

Elevate your game with the Aztech Innovations Chimera HPA Gel Blaster Receiver—where cutting-edge design meets uncompromised performance.

  • Mode selector switch for quick mode changes
  • Aztech Innovations Adjustable T-Piece
  • Aztech Innovations 12.5cm stainless steel barrel
  • Aztech Innovations Adjustable Hopup
  • Carbon fibre guard tube
  • Included trigger
  • 0 Degree grip with textured rubber grip panels
  • Weight: 310gm
  • Suits Polarstar HPA running gear
  • Suits XYL ARP9 magazines

The E&C 2011 TTI HI-Capa GBB Pistol Gel Blaster is built for players seeking performance and precision in fast-paced gameplay. products.title: Polarstar Jack HPA Engine
products.body_html:
Code Name "Simple Jack"

The JACK™ was designed to answer the demand for an affordable, high performance HPA (High Pressure Air) conversion for AEG's. The system is a drop-in cylinder replacement that is universally compatible with a wide range of gearbox versions that have center-line nozzles.

Similar to its sister products, the JACK™ replaces the original gearbox components with a programmable pneumatic system allowing for higher performance and greater reliability over a gear driven system. Although economically priced, the JACK™ still retains the same performance and quality you have come to expect from PolarStar products.

The JACK™ has only one moving part, the nozzle, which acts as its own poppet valve. Similar to the Fusion Engine™ and F2™ poppet, the nozzle is only piloted by the solenoid to open air flow through the poppet with none of the firing air coming from the solenoid itself. This design lets the JACK™ send a higher flow of air down the barrel than systems that only use a solenoid as the firing valve.

products.title: Gate X-ASR Mosfet
products.body_html:
X-ASR is the world’s first 4th generation MOSFET protected against reverse polarity. It saves space, time and money because additional regular fuse is no longer needed. Acting as an electronic guard, X-ASR improves your blaster’s safety and durability through conformal coating and self-test with 2 LEDs. Although designed for up to M120 springs, in case of high torque motor and gears you can use stronger spring.

 

What makes X-ASR so special?

  • No additional fuse required in blaster installation
  • Automatic resettable protection against reverse polarity – protects motor and the MOSFET itself in the event of reverse polarity. Reverse connection will not damage the MOSFET or motor; the blaster will work again once you connect the battery in the right way.
  • Smart fuse – protects MOSFET in case of motor jam. It prevents from overheating, overloading and overcurrenting. The MOSFET is protected against short circuit of signal and motor wires. In case of too strong blaster configuration, the smart fuse will turn off the MOSFET in order to prevent overheating.
  • Built-in self-test – 2 LEDs allow for quick troubleshooting
  • Conformal coating – Military Specification MIL-V-173C provides resistance to difficult atmospheric conditions

 

What are X-ASR's biggest assets?

  • Mosfet – targets energy from the battery directly to the motor, bypassing the mechanical trigger contacts. As a result, your rifle gains higher rate of fire as well as faster trigger response. Moreover, trigger contacts are protected against burnout.
  • Debouncing – provides full compatibility with micro-switches and ensures complete resistance to contact bounce (vibration). Your blaster gains higher ROF, faster trigger response and your MOSFET is less prone to overheating.

 

What is your blaster protected from when having X-ASR?

  • Simple motor jam consequences – after a motor jam, the MOSFET will not be damaged due to too high current or overheating
  • Damage resulting from battery reverse polarity – since R/C mini-tamiya connector has different polarity than the airsoft one, lack of experience or precaution while connecting the battery will cause no damage to it
  • Consequences of using weak NiCd/NiMH batteries – the MOSFET will not be damaged due to too low voltage
  • Damage to insulation of blaster installation and short circuit
  • Harms caused by poor weather conditions


Behind the lines 

Considering its functions, X-ASR is an improved version of NanoASR MOSFET. However, when designing X-ASR, we focused even more on its reliability.

The most important assumption was that it must be installed without any additional fuse. All the other MOSFETs we offer require supplementary fuse in blaster installation. To eliminate such necessity, we implemented the smart fuse and protection against reverse polarity in X-ASR.

 

Get ready for these amazing functions:

SMART FUSE

We have developed an electronic fuse with an accurate current sensor. A combination of current, voltage and temperature measurements makes your blaster installation highly reliable. It protects the MOSFET against overheating, overloading and short-circuiting. If your blaster becomes jammed, the function protects the motor and battery against damage.
 

MOSFET

Do you want to achieve a higher ROF and faster trigger response? Are you planning a power upgrade of your blaster? In that case, you need a MOSFET.

It targets the energy from the battery directly to the motor, bypassing the mechanical trigger contacts. As a result, you gain a higher ROF of the blaster and a faster trigger response.
 

DEBOUNCING

This provides full compatibility with the micro-switches. It ensures full resistance to contact bounce (vibration). You gain a bigger ROF, a faster trigger response and your MOSFET is less prone to overheating.
 

BUILT-IN SELF-TEST

This allows you to quickly check whether the device is working properly. It helps to locate where the problem lies when anything goes wrong.
 

COATING

Thanks to its special conformal coating, our product is resistant to atmospheric conditions (Military Specification MIL-V-173C).

products.title: Aztech HellFire V2 polymer Hop Up
products.body_html:
Hellfire!!!!!!  Muzzle brake styling to enhance your blaster both visually and performance wise.

This version has many enhancements including inner barrel stabilisation and 180 degree of hopup level adjustments.

Using the same internal design and technology as our long proven Muzzletek hop up that changed the face of gelball accuracy and range capabilities.  

 

Now with the outstanding appearance to match the performance.

The Hellfire side ports disperse gases and vapor just like the real thing.  The Hellfire has Tool-less adjustment by turning the front face of the housing to apply more or less hop through a a now improved 180 degree adjustment rotation.

Universal fit for 14mm Counter clock wise thread for gel blaster rifle outer barrels and inner barrel maximum 12mm longer than the outer.

(Please note the 12mm, any more than 12mm and the inner barrel will make contact with the inner tongue of the hop unit and will either break the inner or push it out of its seat, we would recommend 10mm or 11mm maximum OR don't turn the hellfire all the way onto your outer barrel to ensure it doesn't make contact.)

This gel blasters hop up is polymer tough and will add that much needed distance to your new M4 and AK variant rifle.

 

Fitment Instructions:

  • Thread the Hellfire in a reverse direct until threaded all the way on(maximum of 12mm) making sure to be careful that the inner barrel doesn't make contact with the rear of the internal tongue. If it does make contact, unwind the hop until it has clearance.
  • It more than likely will not have perfect rotation alignment to set the hop ramp at 12 o'clock
  • Rotate to set the alignment correctly then use the side grub screws to hold the Hellfire firmly in the correct position
  • To adjust the hop up, Turn the slotted end cap to lower the hop ramp, the cap rotates just 90 degrees offering 8 settings
  • If a permanent fixture we would recommend using a low strength loctite to hold the side grub screws in place and if you wish a small amount on the main thread from hop to out barrel.

Designed, made and hand assembled in Australia! 

Thread of main hop up: M14 CCW

Adjustment: Tool-less, rotate the front face for adjustment 

Fitment: 1.5mm Allen key for the 2x side locating grub screws.

To replace the inner assembly of the adjustable tongue, remove the front adjuster cap, ensure to use substantial amount of heat to release the loctite holding the stainless grub screw for the adjuster cap.  If you don't you may strip the 1.5mm Allen head grub screw. If you strip the stainless steel grub screw then there is a high chance of ruining the outer to get it out.

products.title: NWell Beretta M92 Co2 GBB Magazines
products.body_html:
The NWell Beretta M92 Co2 GBB Magazines, are crafted exclusively for the NWell M92 Beretta gel blaster pistol. Engineered with precision and performance in mind, these magazines offer unparalleled reliability and functionality to enhance your gel blaster experience.

Designed to meet the demands of serious gel blaster enthusiasts or for those seeking maximum power and performance. The Co2 magazine delivers an unparalleled experience. With the NWell Berretta stronger recoil spring designed specifically for Co2 usage, you'll notice a significant difference in blowback intensity, offering a truly immersive shooting experience.

Please note that the NWell Beretta M92 is optimised for use with Co2, and with the Berettas reinforced internal springs and parts are designed to work efficiently on Co2.

As this pistol is designed specifically far use with Co2 as the power source we’ve found green gas quite inefficient and it struggles to cycle the slide after each shot fired. herefore, the green gas magazine’s effectiveness may vary compared to the Co2 counterpart.

We Tech Magazine for G17/G18/G34/APS Series

Are you wanting more play time with your We Tech Gel Blaster? Sick of reloading magazines?

Tactical Edge Hobbies has the right mag to suit your Gelsoft needs!

This Magazine is designed for the WE G17/G18/G34/APS Series Gel Blasters

Thank you for choosing Tactical Edge Hobbies, Australia's largest range of Gel Blasters and accessories. 

FEATURES

  • Suited for: WE17, WE18. WE34 Gel Blasters & APS GBB Pistols
  • Capacity: Approx 17 Gel Balls 7-8mm
  • Outer body: metal
  • Height: 120 mm approx.
  • Weight of empty magazine: 278 g
  • Mechanism: compression (with compression spring)

Always use the appropriate eye wear and take all reasonable safety precautions when using our products.

Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in warm water from the tap for a minimum of 4-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain off any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

 

DISCLAIMER

Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery

products.title: Cybergun FN Herstal-Licensed SCAR-SC Compact AEG Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Licensed gel blaster replica of the well-known Belgian subcompact carbine FN SCAR-SC, produced by Fabrique Nationale de Herstal. The SCAR-SC is one of the most recognizable and iconic firearm models manufactured by FN Herstal. Its distinctive design and compact size make it ideal for use by special forces and counter-terrorism units in hostage rescue operations and Close-quarters combat (CQC).

The CYMA replica of the SCAR-SC, licensed by CYBERGUN, is an exact reproduction of the original model. The collaboration between these two companies has resulted in a licensed model that offers good-quality craftsmanship at an affordable price. This allows both gel blaster enthusiasts and collectors to enjoy owning this renowned replica, whether they engage in gelsoft sports or simply appreciate unique replicas.

Similar to the original SCAR, the replica is primarily made of aluminium and polymer. The upper receiver, barrel, stock, rail systems, and other smaller components are made of aluminium and other metal alloys, while the lower receiver, pistol grip, and stock pad are made of polymer, just like the real thing. The FN SCAR CQC rifle was designed as an ambidextrous weapon to meet the requirements of special forces and provide reliability and mobility during military operations. The gel blaster SCAR-SC follows suit, featuring an ambidextrous fire selector lever, an ambi magazine release, sling attachment points, and a reversible charging handle. 

  • Fully licensed replica of the FN Herstal SCAR-SC Compact PDW
  • High quality full metal upper receiver and polymer lower receiver, just like the real rifle
  • Realistic recoil feedback from the Patent Pending BRSS system. Internal full-metal gearbox is compatible with standard version 2 parts
  • Compared to its bigger brothers, the compact PDW size of the SCAR-SC makes it a perfect option for CQB, vehicle ops, or any other situation where you need as small as rifle as possible
  • Ambidextrous 3-position selectors and magazine releases are easy to use both right- and left-handed
  • Monolithic 12 o'clock rail and additional rails at 3, 6, and 9 o'clock positions for attaching optics, grips, lights, lasers, and other standard 20mm RIS accessories
  • Special 3-position adjustable PDW stock collapses down far further than a standard buffer tube stock and features a wide rubberized buttpad for comfort
  • Functioning mock bolt lock
  • Sling mount rings built into the upper receiver on both sides
  • Includes flip-up front and rear iron sights

Present on the market since 2018, the FN SCAR-SC benefits from a great versatility in its use. Available for different calibers such as 5.56x45mm NATO (.223) or 7.62x35mm (.300BLK), its compactness and maneuverability make it a precious ally for special operations, especially in urban environments. Its assets have already convinced various specialized units and special forces, particularly in Belgium and France.

After two years of development in close collaboration with FN Herstal, Cybergun is pleased to present an accurate replica, offering the quality expectations set up by its "Research and Development" department and FN Herstal.

Manufacturer: Cybergun / BOLT (Licensed by FN Herstal)

FPS Range: 300-330

Specifications:

Weight: 3080g

products.title: Laser Sight (Red) - Suitable for Gel Blaster Pistols and Rifles with Picatinny Rail Mount
products.body_html:
This laser sight has integrated optics and electronics providing a wide field of view. They are very suitable for fast aiming and shooting at stationary and moving targets.

Operation

Fix the laser sight onto your gel blaster rifle or pistol

Make elevation adjustments by turning the 2 small grub screws in the body of the sight with the smaller allen key, turning it until the laser is aligned to your preference.

To install and change the batteries, unscrew and open the back cover of the body, then install the batteries (3 x LR44 button cell). Finally, replace the back cover.

To operate the laser, press the switch.

Safety Precautions

Never look directly into the laser beam.

Never point a laser beam at a person.

Do not aim the laser at reflective surfaces.

Never view a laser pointer using an optical instrument, such as binocular or a microscope.

Do not allow children to use laser pointers unless under the supervision of an adult.

Package Includes

1 x laser sight scope

1 x Allen key wrench

3 x button batteries

products.title: Polarstar 42" Braided Air Line
Aztech Innovations Perfect Pinion
products.body_html:
Aztech Innovations have done it again! Designing this pinion from the ground up to improve it in every way. The tooth design is designed to make it as efficient, super strong and quiet as possible. The increase diameter of the shaft enables it to use a much larger M3 size grub screw meaning you will be able to make sure it is tightened harder on the motor shaft and not strip those tiny allen keys all the time. It also means there is more contact area for loctite to hold. The grub screw will be the torx type meaning extra ability for tightening and come with the torx key to suit.

The bevelled area on the larger shaft also means that for assembly, you adjust the motor up all the way till the bevel hits the bevel gear (while not running) then back it off one turn for the perfect alignment.

Made of SCM440, then quenched, tempered and then nitride treatment means this pinion is the strongest pinion on the market bar none!

Cold weather, sweating and heavy breathing all cause misting of goggles, visors, scopes and other equipment. This leads to loss of vision which can make shooting harder, as well as becoming a safety hazard.

Abbey Anti Fog Spray keeps visors, goggles and scopes clear of misting.

Benefits:

  • Non-soapy solution reduces chances of smearing
  • Breaks down surface tension which allows misting to form on cold surfaces
  • One application will keep equipment mist free all weekend
  • Anti-bacterial additives ensure all equipment is clean and germ free

Note:  Do not wipe or wash the lens once apply as it will reduce the effect.

Presenting the revolutionary Aztech Scythe Magnetech Split Gearbox, a masterpiece of engineering that redefines maintenance convenience and performance. This innovative split gearbox design features a detachable upper unit, comprising the piston and spring, which can be easily separated from the lower unit by simply removing the rear receiver pin. This functionality facilitates effortless servicing and upgrades, ensuring your gearbox is always in peak condition.

Constructed from aerospace-grade CNC 7075 aluminum, the Scythe Magnetech Split is a testament to Aztech's commitment to quality and durability. It is offered in a variety of finishes: the sleek raw CNC aluminum and the sophisticated anodized black.

It's important to note that these gearboxes are now designed with the compatibility for a tappet plate. They are also perfectly compatible with High Pressure Air (HPA) systems or can be used with an APACHE for unmatched performance.

Key Features:

  • Made from a single block of 7075 aluminium and CNC machined to perfection
  • Included Magnetic, roller bearing trigger that is incredibly smooth that uses the power of magnets for feedback
  • V2 receiver compatibility ensures a seamless fit with popular models.
  • Engineered for use with Aztech's robust 8mm anti-rotation bushes, though compatible with other 8mm bushes as well.

These unique markings underscore the gearbox's emphasis on function over form, without compromising on design or performance. Choose the Aztech Scythe Magnetech Split Gearbox for an unbeatable combination of efficiency, reliability, and high-end aesthetics.

products.title: Warhead Industries brushless 27k Base Series 480 Short Motor
products.body_html:
HIGHLY EFFICIENT, DURABLE AND RELIABLE.

WARHAD BRUSHLESS BASE LOW SPEED VERSION

 27,000RPM at 11.1v

- CAST ALUMINIUM HIGH QUALITY CASING

-TOTAL CUSTOM IN-RUNNER DESIGN WITH MAXIMUM POWER AND TORQUE

-MACHINE WOUND HIGH TEMPERATURE RESISTANT  QUALITY COPPER WINDINGS

-HIGH QUALITY MAGNETS

-HIGH PRECISION CNC CASING BACK PLATE COVERING ESC

-BUILT IN ON-BOARD ESC WITH LOW VOLTAGE CUT-OFF AND OVER CURRENT DRAW TO -PROTECT LIPO BATTERIES FROM OVER DISCHARGE

-HIGHEST QUALITY REMOVABLE PINION GEAR FOR EASY SWITCH OUTS

-BUILT IN ACTIVE BRAKE

The constant contact of the brushes with the power terminals of a brushed motor is necessary for it to maintain its rotation. However, the friction that this creates means that a huge portion of the energy generated by the rotational motion is wasted as heat. Generally, the efficiency of brushed motors is limited within the range of 75% to 80%.

Brushed motors are notorious for having parts that get worn out after a while, requiring frequent dismantling and parts replacement. This is because the brushes of the commutator need to maintain almost constant contact with the terminals of the power source, even as the commutator rotates rapidly. When brushes get worn out and can no longer maintain contact, a brushed DC motor basically becomes useless.

This is less of a problem with brushless motors. In fact, there is essentially no contact between the rotor and stator of a brushless motor, so wear and tear are greatly reduced.



The accelerated wear and tear due to constant contact of the brushes and the energy generated as heat means that brushed motors are expected to break down much sooner than brushless motors. It is generally not recommended to operate a brushed motors for longer than several minutes continuously. Without a chance to cool down, heat buildup in brushed motors can easily compromise the integrity of its coils or brushes.

Although in brushless motors there is still some heat generation due to air friction, this is kept at a manageable level. Brushless motors can typically run from 30 minutes to an hour continuously with no problems.


WHY USE A BRUSHLESS MOTOR IN YOUR AEG?

Brushless DC motors have no brushes to get worn out, they represent a huge leap forward in technology. Brushless output significantly higher efficiency and performance, and have a lower susceptibility to mechanical wear than their brushed counterparts.

Brushless motors offer several other advantages, including;


  • Higher torque to weight ratio
  • Increased torque per watt of power input (increased efficiency)
  • Increased reliability and lower maintenance requirements
  • Reduced operational and mechanical noise
  • Longer lifespan (no brush and commutator erosion)
  • Elimination of ionizing sparks from the commutator (ESD)
  • Near-elimination of electromagnetic interference (EMI)

JUST TAKE OUT YOUR ORIGINAL MOTOR AND USE THE EXISTING CONNECTORS ON YOUR AEG TO CONNECT YOUR NEW MOTOR.

PLEASE NOTE: Mosfet users please ensure the mosfet is set to run 100% speed, dont slow the motor speed using mosfet speed control.

We Tech Magazine for G19/G23 Series

You can never have too many mags.

FEATURES

  • Weight of empty magazine: 243 g approx
  • Mechanism: compression (with compression spring)


Always use the appropriate eye wear and take all reasonable safety precautions when using our products.

 

Soaking & Storage of Gels

When soaking the gels, they need to be soaked fully submerged in warm water from the tap for a minimum of 4-6 hours.

Once they have fully grown you can leave them in the water and keep them in or out of the refrigerator.

When you are ready to use them just drain off any excess water with a strainer before you feed them into the mag but do not dry them as they need to be lubricated to work properly.

 

DISCLAIMER

Do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Upgrades refer to pulling any of the blaster apart or opening it up, changing springs or upgrading the battery from 7.4v to an 11.v battery.

  4. Boasts an ultra-strong polymer case and chrome silicone spring to resist rust, ensuring long-lasting functionality.
  5. Extremely rugged design ensures resilience against drops and impacts, delivering unwavering performance.
  6. Compatible with various M4 types, offering flexibility for different blaster models through removable top ring and mag release spacer.
  7. Suitable for HPA blasters, eliminating the need for special harnesses for mag terminals.
  8. Compatible with adaptors that typically require shaker magazines, offering enhanced versatility.
  9. Operates reliably in sideways or upside-down orientations, providing unmatched adaptability on the battlefield.
  10. Capable of holding approximately 280 gels, ensuring sustained firepower during intense gameplay.
  11. Versatile design accommodates all M4 variants, thanks to the removable top ring and mag release spacer.

Experience the ultimate in magazine innovation with the A-Mag by Aztech Innovations. Whether you're seeking unparalleled reliability, versatility, or rugged performance, the A-Mag stands ready to exceed your expectations, ensuring you're always prepared for the challenges of the battlefield.

products.title: Aztech Innovations APACHE Prime Black Tappetless cylinder head
products.body_html:
Introducing the latest PATENTED Apache Prime, the pinnacle of gel blaster technology! Engineered to redefine your playing experience, the Apache Prime Black sets a new standard for performance and reliability in the world of gel blasters. This cutting-edge product represents a leap forward in design and functionality, offering an array of features that place it at the forefront of the industry.

We have made quite a few changes to the design including moving the access panel to the front and redesigned nozzle guides.

 

With the Apache Prime Black, say farewell to the hassle of timing issues and the need for a tappet plate and return spring. Its revolutionary design significantly improves air flow consistency, ensuring that each shot delivers unparalleled precision and power. Whether you're in semi-auto or full-auto mode, the Apache Prime maintains a consistent feet per second (fps) without any discernible difference, granting you the confidence to engage your opponents with unyielding accuracy and control.

In addition to its exceptional performance, the Apache Prime Black boasts a unique and commanding sound that sets it apart from traditional gel blasters. Its distinctive, loud sound creates an authentic and immersive experience, making it feel less like a toy and more like a real weapon, adding a new level of intensity to your battles.

Installation of the Apache Prime is a breeze, offering unparalleled simplicity and ease of use. When paired with our adjustable t-piece, the Apache Prime reaches its full potential, maximizing accuracy and enhancing your overall experience. Crafted from high-grade 7075 aluminum, this precision-engineered masterpiece is designed to perfection, ensuring unmatched durability and performance that will stand the test of time.

Elevate your gameplay to new heights with the Apache Prime. Whether you're a seasoned enthusiast or a newcomer to gel blasters, the Apache Prime will empower you to dominate the field with its exceptional reliability, high performance, and unmatched consistency. Enter the arena with confidence, knowing that the Apache Prime is on your side, ready to deliver unrivaled precision and power.

Extended nozzle is 6mm longer to suit builds that require a longer nozzles like AK's, PPSH, etc.

products.title: Gel Blaster Service
products.body_html:
For maximum reliability every AEG gearbox should be serviced regularly.

This includes:

  1. Gears correctly greased
  2. Viton O ring installed and lubricated
  3. Motor Height adjusted and loctited if required
  4. Compression spring changed if required
  5. Replace rubber nozzle
  6. APACHE service if required
  7. General inspection of all parts and QC Check
  8. Testing

products.title: Apex Tracer Sci-Fi Gel Blaster Pistol
products.body_html:
The Apex Tracer Gel Blaster pistol is one of the funkiest Gel Blasters on the market. The Apex Gel Blasters, have an impressive rate of fire and light up to really set the mood.  With the choice of using either the sleek colour matched hopper, or the simple bottle hopper, the configuration is up to you.

The Sleek space age hopper gives you the maximum Gel capacity but need the blaster to be held fairly flat for gels to feed freely. Whereas using the bottle as the hopper, gives you the most consistent feed for the gels.

Apex Tracer Sci-Fi Gel Blaster Pistol Features:

  • Light weight and portable
  • USB charging
  • Shooting distance of up to 15-20 meters
  • The bullets are made of water polymer, easy to break, biodegradable and nontoxic
  • Averaging approx. 125 Fps

What’s in the box: 

  • 1 x Apex Sci-Fi Gel Blaster
  • 1 x Protective Glasses
  • 1 x Packet Cool Blue Gel Balls
  • 1 x Sleek space-age looking feed hopper (blue plastic with the Blue option, smoked plastic with the red option)
  • 1 x Storage Bottle/Hopper bottle with adaptor to attach to the Blaster
  • 1 x Battery
  • USB Charging Cable

All stock held in our QLD warehouse and we post Australia wide.

products.title: CosmoX Sirius Sci-Fi Gel Blaster – Purple and Amethyst
products.body_html:
Unlock the ultimate cosmic firepower with the CosmoX Toys SIRIUS Galaxy Gel Rifle. Designed to propel you into interstellar battles, this high-performance gel blaster is a force to be reckoned with. Equipped with advanced features and a sleek design, the SIRIUS delivers unmatched accuracy and rapid-fire capabilities. Dominate the gel blaster arena like a true “star warrior” and experience the thrill of intergalactic warfare. Don’t miss out on the CosmoX Toys SIRIUS Galaxy Gel Rifle – Order now and embark on an epic journey across the cosmos!

Amazing looking, Safe coloured, well balanced Blaster. Which won’t attract negative attention and is safe the the kids. The colour combination makes it fun and allows for team play.

Featuring an all-round performance experience, the wild and gentle Gel Ball Blaster is ideal for playing at the field or backyard with the family.

Each SIRIUS gel ball blaster has a high-capacity 1500-round quick-swap magazine for maximum blasting and extended playtime. The battery is a quality 7.4v battery which will give you hours of fun and has a built in chip to keep you blaster safe. Battery in SIRIUS gel ball blasters supports blasting at least 6,000 times (4 Magazines worth) after fully charging in 2.5 hours.

  • High Speed: The CosmoX Toys SIRIUS Galaxy Gel Rifle features a fully automatic design that allows for a firing rate of 13 shots per second and a velocity of 220fps, providing a high-performance gaming experience
  • Large Capacity:  With a capacity of 1500 gel pellets, you can play for longer without worrying about reloading.
  • Battery: B0BHNY47VR
  • Durable Construction: Our SIRIUS Series gel toy blaster is built to last, with a product lifetime of at least 150,000 shots
  • Replaceable & Rechargeable Battery: The 7.4V 1800mAh battery is both replaceable and rechargeable, making it easy to keep your blaster ready for action.
  • Complete Kit: This gel toy blaster kit includes 10000 gels, eye protection, and a USB charging cable, providing everything you need for a full day of gaming.
  • The recommended age for use is 14+

Included: 

  • CosmoX Sirius Gel Blaster Rifle
  • Removeable Buttstock
  • 2 x 50000pc Orange Gel Balls
  • Drum Magazine
  • Good Quality Eye Protection
  • Battery
  • USB Charging Cable

All Aussie stock and we can post Australia wide.

products.title: Thanos Infinity Glove Gel Blaster Kid’s Toy – Gold
products.body_html:
Want to be the coolest kid on the block. Why not have Gel Ball fights anywhere, with your besties, with the super cool new Thanos Infinity Glove Gel Blaster.

This blaster operates using a trigger button, on the handle, inside the rear half of the glove.

It has two modes;

  • Fingers only, where each press of the trigger flexes the finger and thumb mechanically. As though the glove is trying to grip something. (Power switch in “Off” position)
  • Finger, Gels and Flashing LEDs, where each press of the trigger flexes the fingers, lights up the infinity stones and shoots a Gel Ball from between the middle fingers. (Power switch in the “On” position)

This Marvel Sci-Fi inspired Gel Blaster will be hours of fun for the young ones. Having running battles in the street with mates from your neighbourhood.

Although rated for ages 14+, it would be suitable for slightly younger users, provided they are under constant adult supervision. Regardless of age though, eye protection must always be used, when playing with Gel Blasters.

Thanos Infinity Glove Gel Blaster Kid Toy – Gold Features:

  • Bright LEDs that light up the infinity stones when the blaster is fired.
  • Cool finger movement when the trigger button is pressed
  • The ability to shoot, non toxic, biodegradable Gel Ball from between the middle fingers.
  • Safe to play with, providing eye protection is always used.

What’s in the box?

  • 1 x Thanos Infinity Glove Gel Blaster
  • 1 x Safety Goggles
  • 1 x 7.4v Li-ion Batter
  • 1 x USB Charger
  • 5 x Packets of Blue coloured Water Gel Balls
  • 1 x Gel growing Bottle
  • 1 x screw driver to open that battery compartment of the Gel Blaster.

Please note, to use the gels, they first need to be soaked in clean cold water for approximately 4 hours, for them to grow to size.

products.title: MP7 Gas Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
The MP7 is a new Gas Blowback .  It has a selector switch which allows safe, semi automatic, or fully automatic fire.   Load up the magazine, insert it into the rifle, pull the charging handle and you’re ready to rock.  Every time you pull the trigger, the gun will fire and cycle the bolt, accurately replicating the real firearm.  On the last round, the bolt will lock back, letting you know it’s time to insert another magazine.

Externally the MP7 is packed full of features.  It has a telescoping stock which can fully collapse to allow the gun to be used like a pistol.  There is a single picatinny rail on top of the gun that runs the entire length.  Mounted on the rail are detachable iron sights that can be used as a low profile sight when folded down, or flipped up for a higher sight that is designed to pair with a red dot sight.  There are also 4 sling mount points allowing for single point or 2 point slings for left or right handed shooters.

As with all gas blowback guns, they do need regular cleaning and basic maintenance to keep them in top notch firing condition.  It’s essential that you clean your barrel and clean and lubricate the critical components as described in your owners manual.  We recommend using Slip 2000 Airsoft Lubricant to maintain your rifle.  When you are done using the gun for the day, make sure your magazine has a slight amount of gas inside the magazine – this will keep just enough pressure to keep the seals snug.  Always follow the manufacturer’s recommendation for storing your rifle in a cool dry place that is out of direct sunlight.

What’s Included in the Box:

  • HK MP7 Gas Blowback
  • 1 x Green Gas Magazine
  • Green Gas Sold Separately. 

Quick Overview

  • Realistic Blowback Action
  • Bolt Lockout Accurately Replicates the Real Rifle
  • Telescoping Stock
  • Multiple Sling Attachment Points
  • Green Gas Powered

Technical Specifications

  • Color:  Black
  • Operation: Gas Blowback
  • Power Source: Green Gas
  • Barrel Length: 7.5 inches
  • Fully Function Bolt Lockout
  • Body: High Grade Polymer
  • Outer Barrel: Steel
  • Sling Mounts: Multiple
  • Sights – Low Profile or High Profile Flip Up Removeable and Adjustable
  • Compatible Sling Types: 2 Point, 1 Point

products.title: Action Army AAP-01 Assassin Ruger GBB Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Although the AAP-01 Ruger Assassin is Action Army’s own design, its rather unique looks are based largely on the Ruger Mark IV, a 22 caliber target pistol known for its vintage shape and competition-level accuracy.   Unlike the Mark IV, however, Action army has cut various grooves and channels into the AAP-01’s frame and outer barrel, making it a little easier to grip when racking and gives it a little bit more of an angular look.   The gun itself is a little shorter and, being made of polymer rather than metal, is considerably more lightweight  but good use of metal internally in the bolt, barrel and magazine giving it decent weight but not making it too heavy.

This gel blaster pistol has been highly anticipated by many players for it’s light yet fast blowback action and loads of upgrade accessories.  It also has the ability to shoot in semi auto or full auto with the click of a switch and since it uses standard Glock -series magazines you should be able to easily find higher capacity extended mags or at least extra mags when needed.

Please note this product is a Toy.
Before purchasing a Gas blowback pistol please be advised that a certain amount of maintenance is required.

products.title: SLR ION 6.7” Lite SBR Gel Blaster - Multicam
products.body_html:
The ION Lite Series of Dytac's SLR family of AEG Gelsoft Rifles offers affordability and quality in one robust unit coupled with reliable internals that will lower your jaw to the floor. 

Licensed by SLR Rifleworks - Dytac have made one of the best gel blasters of 2021. The receiver, handguard and outer barrel are made from metal and the stock and pistol grip are made from a high quality Nylon Fibre. 

This rifle is also available in multiple colour ways - Black, Two Tone, Dark Earth & Licensed Multicam. 

The ION Lite is highly customisable, supporting a wide range of aftermarket external parts and accessories thanks to its MLOK handguard and its huge full-length top rail. The top rail is the full length of the gel blaster and gives you plenty of space to build the optics setups leaving plenty of room for large scopes, as well as holographic and magnifier setups.

The rail is 20mm RIS / RAS, the most common type in gelsoft, meaning that most sights and scopes will quickly and easily attach with no fuss. The handguard of the blaster measures 6.7 inches making the blaster short yet effective.  The rear of the gel blaster features an EMG Mini style stock, built from high-quality polymer, with a rubber butt plate.

The stock is great for CQB environments and locks securely into place. The stock is easy to adjust by simply pressing the catch release button and adjusting it to one of four positions.

Internally the ION Lite features everything people have come to expect and love from a V2 with a quick change spring system, quality internal parts, plenty of options for upgrades and plenty of aftermarket part support should something go wrong.

The gelsoft blaster features a standard V2 gearbox, commonly found in majority of M4 styles, meaning that there is a vast selection of upgrade parts available for this replica, even if it doesn't really need them out the box.

This gel blaster is perfect for those Gelsoft Players who are looking for an extremely solid base from which to start them on their way as a Skirmisher or even a solid base for HPA builds. 

The Dytac SLR range of rifles are the hot go-to replicas of this year and are recommended to new players and more seasoned veterans for their high quality and performance. If you're looking for a CQB that performs great both indoors and out, this is the blaster  for you.

Features

Metal Handguard & Receiver V2 Dytac/CYMA Cast Gearbox

6.7" Lite MLOK Hand Guard

 Ambidextrous Fire Select

 Comes in 4 Colour Variations

products.title: WE Galaxy Hi-Capa 5.1 Type A GBB Pistol - Silver Slide K Frame
products.body_html:
The WE Galaxy Hi-Capa GBB gel blaster pistol is kind of a hybrid gelsoft gun.

Its claim to fame is its ability to change out the lower frame of the pistol to a platform more suitable to the shooter. Of the three styles, this particular one is based on the WE Hi-Capa lower. This way the Galaxy functions much in the same way regular Hi-Capa gel blaster pistols work.

The WE Galaxy features snappy recoil, unlike the G Series Galaxy Pistol, this gelsoft pistol can only fire in Semi Auto. The pistol comes with a top and bottom picatinny rail for the mounting of accessories directly to the pistol without the need for alternative mounting plates.

FEATURES :
  • Unique Design 
  • Easily Swappable Upper and Lower 
  • Semi Auto Only 
  • Threaded Barrel 
  • Snappy Recoil 
  • Compatible with Standard Hi-Capa Series Gas Magazines 

SPECS :

  • Material : Aluminium Alloy / Fiber reinforced polymer
  • Colour : Silver
  • Magazine Capacity : 15+1
  • Length (mm): 250
  • Barrel Length (mm): 
  • Weight (w/magazine and rail ) (g): 1060g
  • System : Gas Blowback
  • Fire Mode : Semi / Safety
  • Muzzle Velocity (fps) tbc

IN THE BOX :

  • x1 WE Galaxy Hi-Capa 5.1 Type A GBB Pistol - Silver Slide K Frame
  • x1 Magazine 
  • x1 User Manuals

products.title: Polarstar UGS Type2 Co2 Stock
products.body_html:
With the PolarStar UGS (Universal Gas Stock) you can now get the performance advantage of a HPA system without needing to be tethered to a remote air rig and still retain the likeness and function of a traditional adjustable AR-15 stock. It can be used with any of the PolarStar cylinder conversion kits such as the F2™, F1™, JACK™ or Kythera™ and is compact enough that it can also be used with other similar HPA cylinder systems on the market.

Its integral regulator shares the same internal design as PolarStar's other compact regulators and delivers performance on par with systems twice its size. This regulator has an output pressure range of 40-130psi which is easily adjusted using a 3/32 allen key but can be locked out using a standard chrono zip tie which blocks the adjustment screw. Additionally, if you want to get a little more "omph" out of the regulator, you can install the High Pressure Spring which boots the maximum output pressure to approximately 200psi.


The CO2 configuration comes with a different rail that allows it to accept our 12g or 33g CO2 Inserts which makes it possible to use traditional Milspec buttstocks. Your choice of a 12g or 33g CO2 insert is included with the CO2 models. The 33g CO2 models accept threaded CO2 cartridges while the 12g CO2 models use the standard 12g cartridges commonly used for Gelsoft and Air Guns. One can configure the same UGS for the use of either the 2.000" HPA tanks or Milspec CO2 inserts by purchasing the different UGS Stock Rails separately. 


The HPA configuration includes G&P R3 buttstock pictured.

The CO2 configuration includes your choice of 12g or 33g CO2 inserts.

The Type 2 is designed for use with traditional TM Spec M4 series AEG receives. This is where the buffer tube slides onto a stock tail on the back of the receiver and is secured by a bolt. (Modification of the receiver and gearbox is required)

  • The UGS regulator can accept up to 900psi allowing for the use of either standard output HPA tanks as well as SLP (SLP recommended).
  • Compatible with all standard 2.000" diameter HPA tanks and most 2.000" tank stocks used in paintball applications.
  • Simple zip-tie lockout/tournament lock.
  • Adjustable length of pull.
  • Same internal design as the other compact PolarStar regulators (Micro Reg GEN2, CGS) with cross compatibility between parts.
  • The UGS™ regulator uses only 2 o-rings, promoting reliability and ease of maintenance.
  • Not compatible with Fusion Engine™.
  • *HPA Tank, CO2 Cartridges & HP Spring Not Included

 

Min Output Pressure 40 PSI
Max Output Pressure 130 PSI 
Max Input Pressure 900 PSI
Outputs Interfaces w/ Airline (6mm OD x 4mm ID)
Warranty Information 1 Year Limited Warranty

products.title: Polarstar MR Gen2 Regulator with 42" Line
products.body_html:
When the original Micro Regulator™ came out it was an instant hit since it was ultra compact yet offered the performance of regulators twice its size. With the introduction of the second generation of this regulator, we've simplified manufacturing and ease of maintenance while retaining its compact footprint. With the regulator body coming it at just 0.006" taller than the original, the Micro Reg™ GEN2 stands a hair over 2.25" tall which makes the entire regulator more compact than a traditional UFA. Thanks to this streamline, low-profile design it allows tanks to fit more easily into compact packs popular with minimalist loadouts. This is all done without sacrificing performance as well since this tiny regulator has a lightning fast recharge rate that is on par with its larger brother the MRS™.

The Micro Reg™ GEN2 now shares the exact same internal components as the UGS™ and CGS™ and only has a total of two o-rings in its entire assembly which further promote reliability. Additionally, the GEN2 now has a two piece body similar to the large MRS™ making it much easier to maintain.

  • Adjustable output pressure from 40psi to 130psi (standard configuration).
  • Optional High Pressure Spring boots maximum pressure to ~200psi.
  • Integral tournament lock can be secured with a standard zip-tie.
  • Compatible with standard HPA as well as SLP tanks.
  • HP Spring Not Included*


Min Output Pressure 40 PSI
Max Output Pressure 130 PSI  (~200 PSI with HP Spring, p/n 10000692)*
Max Input Pressure 900 PSI
Outputs 2x 1/8 NPT
Warranty Information 1 Year Limited Warranty

products.title: Gladiatair U48 with 4.5k Regulator
products.body_html:
Gladiatair U48: 48 ci Carbon Fibre HPA cylinder

The first building block in any complete airsoft HPA package is the airtank, and the Gladiatair U48 is the perfect entry into the world of composite HPA airsoft tanks.

Built with an aluminum core and tough carbon fibre outer wrap, the U48 HPA cylinder is both smaller and lighter than an A48 ci aluminum HPA airsoft cylinder. The U48 also runs a higher operating pressure of 4500 psi, meaning it holds 50% more air!  

Gladiatair Warriair Regulator

The next piece in your complete HPA airsoft package is the Gladiatair WarriAir regulator. This regulator is necessary to bring the high pressure air inside the tank down to about 800 psi before it goes into the low pressure regulator. If the pressure is higher than this, there is a risk of breaking the low pressure airsoft regulator.

products.title: CosmoX Aquanaut Sci-Fi Gel Blaster Pistol – Purple with Glitter
products.body_html:
Unlock the ultimate cosmic firepower with the CosmoX Toys AQUANAUT Galaxy Gel Pistol. Designed to propel you into interstellar battles, this high-performance gel blaster is a force to be reckoned with. Equipped with advanced features and a sleek design, the AQUANAUT delivers unmatched accuracy and rapid-fire capabilities. Dominate the gel blaster arena like a true “star warrior” and experience the thrill of intergalactic warfare. Don’t miss out on the CosmoX Toys AQUANAUT Galaxy Gel Pistol – Order now and embark on an epic journey across the cosmos!

Amazing looking, Safe coloured, well balanced Blaster. Which won’t attract negative attention and is safe the the kids. The colour combination makes it fun and allows for team play.

Featuring an all-round performance experience, this wild and gentle Gel Ball Blaster is ideal for playing at the field or backyard with the family.

Each AQUANAUT gel ball blaster has a high-capacity hopper for maximum blasting and extended playtime. The battery is a quality 7.4v battery which will give you hours of fun and has a built in chip to keep you blaster safe.

One of the coolest features of this blaster, is the ability to customise it’s look. With a few simple plastic bolt, the coloured skins of the blaster can be removed, and swapped for a different colour. We currently stock the Purple and the Blue variations. So if you have 2 kids and you get one of each colour, they can either be blue team or purple, or swap the facias and then be a mix of blue one side, purple the other.

Included: 

  • CosmoX Aquanaut Gel Blaster Pistol
  • Removeable Muzzle Flare
  • 2 x 50000pc Coloured Gel Balls
  • Good Quality Eye Protection
  • Battery (internal)
  • USB Charging Cable

products.body_html:
Cyberpunk 2077 with the DR-12 Quasar magazine, why not add a spare, so you never run out on the skirmish.

The Cyberpunk 2077 DR12 Quasar Gel Blaster is the ultimate toy for fans of the popular video game franchise Cyberpunk 2077. The Quasar is a semi-automatic repeating revolver with an automatic secondary option. The Quasar’s unique design is characteristically common of the Darra Polytechnic Corporation’s marketing niche of being impressively appealing to the eye, thus BingFeng have taken this popular blaster and made it of high-quality sturdy nylon, making it durable and lightweight for easy handling, for those that love electric powered gel blasters this is a must have. This magazine is the exact OEM product that is supplied with the Quasar, and will work seamlessly with you blaster.

products.body_html:

products.title: Aztech Innovations Chimera 2 CNC Receiver
products.body_html:
Yet again we are redefining the extreme lightweight CNC receivers capability!

The Aztech Chimera receiver is constructed from a single block alloy for maximum strength while remaining lightweight. This is no ordinary CNC receiver. It is a modular receiver that allows the lower front to be interchanged with other front end's that will allow different mags to be used such as ARP9 and AK47 style magazines. The rear buffer connector can be changed to suit whichever type you require. 

This receiver also sport a true pivot upper so with the quick release take-down pin removed, you can pivot the upper receiver just like the real one!

The mode selector takes 90 degrees of rotation to switch from safe to full auto instead of the usual 180 degrees.

  • Modular design allowing other mag types
  • Interchangeable rear connector
  • CNC mode selector with 90 degree rotation
  • Weight: 310gm
  • Suits V2 gearbox
