products.title: Warhead Industries brushless 52k Black Series 480 Short Shaft Motor
products.body_html:
Exclusive to Azraels

  RUN WITH EXTREME CAUTION.  Please note these 52k motors are no joke, on a high discharge 11.1v battery these motors are capable of ridiculous speeds, far higher than most gear boxes can handle. We would only recommend these motors on a gearbox that is full upgraded and with a max gear ratio of 16:1.

HIGHLY EFFICIENT, DURABLE AND RELIABLE.

ULTRA HIGH SPEED VERSION

35,000 RPM at 7.4v  -  52,000 RPM at 11.1v

-7075 ALUMINIUM HIGH QUALITY CASING

-TOTAL CUSTOM IN-RUNNER DESIGN WITH MAXIMUM POWER AND TORQUE

-HIGH TEMPERATURE RESISTANT  QUALITY COPPER WINDINGS

-HIGH QUALITY MAGNETS

-HIGH PRECISION CNC CASING BACK PLATE COVERING ESC

-BUILT IN ON-BOARD ESC WITH LOW VOLTAGE CUT-OFF AND OVER CURRENT DRAW TO -PROTECT LIPO BATTERIES FROM OVER DISCHARGE

-HIGHEST QUALITY REMOVABLE PINION GEAR FOR EASY SWITCH OUTS

-BUILT IN ACTIVE BRAKE (Disable on external on Mosfet if you can)

The constant contact of the brushes with the power terminals of a brushed motor is necessary for it to maintain its rotation. However, the friction that this creates means that a huge portion of the energy generated by the rotational motion is wasted as heat. Generally, the efficiency of brushed motors is limited within the range of 75% to 80%.

Brushed motors are notorious for having parts that get worn out after a while, requiring frequent dismantling and parts replacement. This is because the brushes of the commutator need to maintain almost constant contact with the terminals of the power source, even as the commutator rotates rapidly. When brushes get worn out and can no longer maintain contact, a brushed DC motor basically becomes useless.

This is less of a problem with brushless motors. In fact, there is essentially no contact between the rotor and stator of a brushless motor, so wear and tear are greatly reduced.


THREE DIFFERENT SPEED VARIANTS AVAILABLE ULTRA FAST, HIGH SPEED AND LOW SPEED. LONGER LIFE EXPECTANCY


The accelerated wear and tear due to constant contact of the brushes and the energy generated as heat means that brushed motors are expected to break down much sooner than brushless motors. It is generally not recommended to operate a brushed motors for longer than several minutes continuously. Without a chance to cool down, heat buildup in brushed motors can easily compromise the integrity of its coils or brushes.

Although in brushless motors there is still some heat generation due to air friction, this is kept at a manageable level. Brushless motors can typically run from 30 minutes to an hour continuously with no problems.

 

WHY USE A BRUSHLESS MOTOR IN YOUR AEG?

Brushless DC motors have no brushes to get worn out, they represent a huge leap forward in technology. Brushless output significantly higher efficiency and performance, and have a lower susceptibility to mechanical wear than their brushed counterparts.

Brushless motors offer several other advantages, including;


  • Higher torque to weight ratio
  • Increased torque per watt of power input (increased efficiency)
  • Increased reliability and lower maintenance requirements
  • Reduced operational and mechanical noise
  • Longer lifespan (no brush and commutator erosion)
  • Elimination of ionizing sparks from the commutator (ESD)
  • Near-elimination of electromagnetic interference (EMI)

JUST TAKE OUT YOUR ORIGINAL MOTOR AND USE THE EXISTING CONNECTORS ON YOUR AEG TO CONNECT YOUR NEW MOTOR.


PLEASE NOTE: Mosfet users turn active brake off if you can, as the motor has active break built in, running AB on the mosfet as well will shorten the life of the motor and only run the mosfet at 100% speed, do not slow it down, it will fight the motor esc

products.body_html:
The Aztech Innovations rear blank is the perfect addition to your Chimera Receiver if you are looking to make it as short as possible along the lines of a machine pistol.

  • Polymer construction
  • Weight: 20gm

Receiver, guard and grip not included. For demonstration purposes only.

products.title: The Aztech Bushing - Anti Rotation 8mm Low Profile Bushes
products.body_html:
Custom made CNC anti rotation bushes by Aztech Innovations. 

Manufactured from 440 grade stainless steel with rock well hardness of 60HRC

Machined to 8mm (8.02mm ) to within 0.001mm tolerances. These are made .02 of a mm oversize to ensure a snug fit with out warping the gearbox from over tension. 

We recommend a light press or bearing tool for installation. Do not Impact with a hammer or blunt force tooling to ensure no damage is caused to the gearbox.  We highly recommend using a JB Weld Original epoxy as an adhesive to bond the bushes into place to ensure they can not move or come loose in the gearbox.

Suits next generation gearboxes that accept "The Aztech Bushing" V2 and V3 style gearbox's - gel ball and airsoft compatible.  May be too shallow for some nylon gearboxes to be securely retained.
These do not suit Singularity 13 Gen 8 Gearboxes.

Includes 6x Bushes

Stainless bushes must be lubricated with a high quality bearing and gear grease.  We highly recommend Nulon Xtreme Performance Grease with PTFE (L80) which is a blend of Polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) fluorocarbon particles in a specially prepared lithium-based, water-repellent grease. 

PTFE L80 keeps water and dust out while a plating of PTFE is applied to the mating surfaces under working conditions. Seal performance is improved and operating temperature reduced, resulting in less grease "throw". L80 is the perfect grease for our CNC bushes and gears.

L80 has a continuous temperature operating range of -9°C to 150°C

products.title: Upgraded APS M4 DSG 305FPS - 45RPS Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
FULL CUSTOM APS M4 is the complete package 


     SCYTHE - DSG - WARHEAD - APACHE - LEVI


    Custom Custom Custom.   

    This is the one of the most extreme builds we have ever put to the market.  That's it- nothing more to Say!!!

    Setup for absolutely insane trigger response and cycle rate, on full auto it runs over 45 rps.  YEP.. 45 on our eYou 11.1v batteries.

    APS M4 -Light weight, Super fast response, 305 fps running 9:1 Dual Sector Gear!!!

    PLEASE do not adjust the settings. It may effect the performance and reliability of the build.

    This is the ultimate combo of the highest tech and best parts currently on the market worldwide- built for incredible trigger response and aimed at the speedball competition player!

    Upgrades pre installed include:

    -Aztech Scythe 7075 CNC gearbox- custom anodized in Black

    -Aztech APACHE Tappet less cylinder head

    -Warhead 30k Brushless motor

    -Aztech Piston & CNC head with Viton O'Ring

    -Aztech Glacier hopup

    -Leviathan Optical Mosfet

    -Aztech Xtreme Adjustable CNC T Piece

    -SHS 18:1 Ratio main gears.

    -SHS 9:1 DSG Sector Gear

    -Stainless cylinder

    -Aztech 440c stainless Bushes

    -Aztech V2 Spring kit

    -Aztech Tight bore 7.25mm barrel

    -SHS M170 spring

    -Deans T Plug

    -M16 shorty stock

    -Gears Shimmed and Piston Angle of engagement set closer to 12 o'clock.

    WARNING This is a high maintenance build.  If you run this on auto a lot you will wear springs and seals out fast and require regular servicing.  The blaster will be shipped with the Leviathan mosfet settings tuned to suit the build. 

    PLEASE NOTE: This blaster has been upgraded, which means we have opened the receiver and taken it apart.  As a result you may find the take down pins, nuts bolts and screws may have some paint worn off, wear or marks showing on or around the receiver from handling and being worked on as a result of using tools to work on the blaster.  While we take every care we can to try and keep the blaster in as new condition, marks are inevitable when opening a blaster 

    Unlike other standard M4 AEGs, this full metal version (upper/lower receivers, outer barrel), now comes equipped with an aluminum M-Lok handguard, full length picatinny top rail, giving you more than extensive M-Lok rail surface area for mounting a long list of tactical accessories. 

    This requires a high discharge rate lipo battery like our eYou 11.1v battery (not included) and balance charger.

     Features

      • Full metal M-Lok handguard allows for easy addition of weapon lights, grenade launchers or other accessories
      • Durable injection molded metal receiver
      • Metal M-Lok handguard compatible with most accessories M-Lok  mounts
      • Flat top railed receiver is perfect for mounting optics
      • 1 x M4 magazine
      • Magazine prime function via trigger in safe mode
      • Crane type adjustable stock allows for multiple battery use
      • Gel Type: 7-8mm
      • Battery Source: 11.1v Li Po Battery with Deans connector (not included)
      • 2 Piece Metal Receiver
      • Velocity: 305Fps
      • Fire Selector: Safe / Semi Auto / Full Auto
      • Metal Gear Box, Receiver,  Handguard, Outer Barrel, Magazine.
      • Pistol Grip is made of nylon. 
      • Magazine Capacity: 260 Gels
      • Magazine Type: CYMA M4 Magazines
      • Length: 800mmm
      • Weight: 3000g

products.title: AKA Ultra Hard Frosty Gels
products.body_html:
These gels from Alpha King are one of the best and most consistent gels on the market!

These will give you outstanding distance and accuracy and are proven to work well over 300fps, we have tested these to over 400fps with amazing results.

These are usable in some CO2 and green gas pistols. But may not be hard enough for pistols that are harsh on gels.

These are in AKA black packaging with multicolored tenacity coloring as pictured but DO NOT have the AKA logo in the top left corner which is the only way to identify these gels as the hardest offering from AKA.

These gels average around 7.2 - 7.4mm in size which means barrel from 7.25-7.5mm is ideal for accuracy and performance. 
Being super hard these gels dont compress or perform well in blasters with a tight bore 7.0-7.2 mm barrel if running less than 320fps. Over 300fps these can work well in a tight barrel if tuned to suit results will vary based on a combination of things, 

Optimum growth time is around is around 3 hours although these AKA gels are ok in water for an extended period of time, the will eventually soften and loose hardness that is needed in high powered blasters

The Overwatch Tracer Pulse pistol is the cool gel blaster that lets the player became your favorite Overwatch agent, Tracer and show off your skills with the Pulse pistol.  These Pulse Gel Blasters have a fast rate of fire and light up to really set the mood.  With it’s bottle hopper, you also get a large ammo capacity and so you can keep on shooting and easily see when close to being empty.

products.title: SHS Gearbox shim kit
products.body_html: High quality shim kits with shims varying in thickness from .01mm to 0.5mm

products.title: Aztech CNC Adjustable AOE Piston Head
products.body_html:
Revolutionize your airsoft gun's performance with Aztech Innovations' meticulously engineered CNC Adjustable AOE Piston Head. Crafted from premium 6061 aluminium, this piston head features a precision CNC ported design complemented by stackable AOE correction plates. These innovative plates offer the flexibility to fine-tune the Angle of Engagement (AOE) from 0 to +3mm, ensuring a flawless interaction between your piston and the sector gear for enhanced durability and efficiency.

The piston head boasts a chamfered 8 port configuration, optimized for maximum airflow and O-ring compression, paired with a specially designed back-cut O-ring groove. This unique feature accelerates O-ring release, effectively preventing vacuum effects that can hinder performance.

Each set includes a CNC-machined aluminium bearing plate retainer, a robust thrust ball bearing housing with plates, a securing screw, and one of Aztech's superior Viton O-rings for unmatched reliability and resilience.

For ultimate performance stability, we strongly advise the application of a medium-grade Loctite on the center screw. This extra step ensures the piston head remains securely fastened to the piston body, maintaining peak performance throughout its use. Elevate your airsoft experience with Aztech Innovations' Adjustable AOE Piston Head, where precision meets durability.

products.title: HPA connector
products.body_html: 1/8NPT to 6mm hose connector for HPA regulators.

products.title: Aztech Innovations Taranis Bolt Gearbox Upgrade
products.body_html:
UPGRADE OPTION FOR ANY V2 STYLE BLASTER

Includes:

  1. Taranis Complete assembled and tested bolt gearbox
  2. N52 High Torque Motor
  3. Stainless steel barrel
  4. Labour to build and test

True innovation at its finest! This is the TARANIS recoil gearbox. It is much more than just a gearbox that provides recoil, this has a fully functioning bolt that is not there for looks but for functionality. In simple terms, we have inverted the gearbox meaning the piston is stationary and the cylinder (bolt) moves which has an internal face. The air travels through the piston and into the APACHE activating the nozzle and pushing the gel out. The average FPS is 320FPS in semi and full auto modes.

 

The bolt assembly weighs in at a whopping 130 grams and is made of 440C hardened stainless steel. The Rack is easily replaced and also made of 440C stainless steel which has proven to be ultra hard! The gearbox shell as always is made of 7075 alloy as is all other alloy internal parts. 

The recoil of this gearbox is unparalleled!

 Full auto test;

featured_image.alt: Aztech Innovations Taranis Bolt Gearbox Upgrade - Azraels Armoury

products.title: Aztech Xtreme Adjustable T-Piece for MK47
products.body_html:
How does an adjustable t-piece that allows micrometer length tuning sound?

Well here it is.
Aztech have designed the t piece to be adjustable allowing adjustments by thousandths of millimetre by adjusting the black adjuster ring.  Adjusting the t piece longer brings the feed tube of the t piece away from the gearbox.

Depending on the outer barrel adaptor used, the wings on the t piece may need modifying to suit universal setups no different to any other universal product.

This 6061 billet CNC T piece is the ideal t-piece for tuning the Aztech APACHE, HPA nozzles and gear box conversions to different receivers including ARP type receivers.

Internally these suit Aztech rubber tips and other tips similar sized, including Kublai and War Interest.

Once set, tested and happy with the position, we recommend using a red low strength Loctite or 4 layers of thread tape to set the adjustable face into position so it does not self adjust and move in use affecting performance.

This t piece may not suit all applications, we have used these in most receiver types, makes and models with great success. But being a universal product we can not grantee any fitment on non specific combinations.

These are a direct fit for APS receivers using APS and Scythe gearboxes.
These require minor dremel work to the side locator wings for ARP and Wells receiver/outer barrel

products.title: XYL ARP9 Stick Magazine
products.body_html:
Need some spare mags for your XYL ARP9 or Chimera ARP9 blaster?

This stick magazine was made for XYL by Small Moon who are the manufacturer of the XYL ARP9. This is the genuine magazine. This stick magazine is very sturdy.

products.title: XYL ARP9 Gel Blaster Drum Magazine
products.body_html:
Need some spare mags for your XYL ARP9 or Chimera ARP9 blaster?

This Drum magazine was made for XYL by Small Moon who are the manufacturer of the XYL ARP9. This is the genuine drum magazine. It holds up to 520 x 7-8mm gels 

The drum magazine is very sturdy, and unique with the rotation system, which is a plate on the front of the drum. 

The drum rotates as follows:

Magazine prime: rotates fully

Semi automatic: rotates gradually per shot fired

Automatic: the drum rotates constantly whilst the trigger is engaged.

products.title: Aztech Innovations Taranis Bolt Gearbox
products.body_html:
True innovation at its finest! This is the TARANIS recoil gearbox. It is much more than just a gearbox that provides recoil, this has a fully functioning bolt that is not there for looks but for functionality. In simple terms, we have inverted the gearbox meaning the piston is stationary and the cylinder (bolt) moves which has an internal face. The air travels through the piston and into the APACHE activating the nozzle and pushing the gel out. The average FPS is 320FPS in semi and full auto modes.

The bolt assembly weighs in at a whopping 130 grams and is made of 440C hardened stainless steel. The Rack is easily replaced and also made of 440C stainless steel which has proven to be ultra hard! The gearbox shell as always is made of 7075 alloy as is all other alloy internal parts. 


Includes:

7075 alloy gearbox shell including in the kit;

    1. Custom APACHE Tappetless system (7075 alloy)
    2. Integrated t-piece
    3. Piston Assembly (7075 alloy)
    4. Bolt and rack (Cylinder) (440C Stainless steel)
    5. Spring Retainer (stainless steel)
    6. Main spring (Chrome Silicone)
    7. Mag contact block and springs
  • Suits V2 style receiver.
  • May require some dremelling to the upper receiver for fitment.
  • This is a simulation style gearbox made for realistic rate of fire ~ 18 rounds per second
  • Requires high torque motor

Typically for comparison a gearbox would cost;

  • $240 for a Scythe gearbox
  • $69 for the APACHE
  • $45 for the adjustable t-piece
  • $35 for the piston
  • $12 for the cylinder
  • $25 for the spring retainer
  • $18 for the spring

So in total a normal gearbox with the same components would cost $499. For the same price you get a world first innovation of an inverted gearbox system with a stationary piston and moving cylinder with significant recoil and the visual pleasing moving bolt just like the real thing!

For complete gearbox

Includes;

  1. Taranis Gearbox
  2. Aztech Hardened Bushes
  3. SHS 18:1 Gears
  4. Leviathan Optical Mosfet
  5. Aztech Shims
  6. Aztech Hardened Anti reverse latch
  7. Labour to build and test

 

To upgrade any of our V2 style gel blasters to include the Taranis Bolt Gearbox, add the below product link to your cart along with the gel blaster of your choice;

https://www.azraelsarmoury.com/products/aztech-innovations-taranis-bolt-gearbox-upgrade

The recoil of this gearbox is unparalleled!

 Full auto test;


 

Installation Notes;

  • Use with a high torque motor
  • Requires red loctite on all screws including gear screws, mosfet screws, etc.
  • Must short stroke 2 teeth off sector gear
  • Must grease up bolt rail with PTFE grease
  • Must grease up bolt bearings (4 of)
  • Epoxy barrel into barrel collar

products.title: Armoury Factory Re-Tuning
products.body_html:
For maximum reliability every AEG gearbox should be tuned.

Unfortunately factory assembly staff are not able to perfectly tune gears for correct alignment and meshing, pistons are not set to the correct angle of engagement (AOE) with the gear.

This includes:

-Gearbox Radius
-Gears re-shimmed
-Gears correctly greased
-Sorbo pad add to cylinder head
-Angle of engagement corrected
-Viton O ring installed and lubricated
-Motor Height adjusted and loctited

Please note there is 3 different options to choose from, APS V2, CYMA V2 and APS V3. 

All parts used are the same, but variances occur which means some are better than other from the factory. 

This service pays for our technicians to open the gearbox, re shim the gears, add a sorbo pad and correct AOE of the piston, plus we will radius the front internal corners of the cylinder housing to great extend the life span of the cast metal gearbox. 

Radius cuts are a vital part of any cast metal gearbox build.  Rounding off a sharp 90 degree inner apex of a corner removes the fracture point that is a vital part of engineering design and massively reduces the chance of cracking.

This service does not cover a comprehensive gearbox build that may take a few hours to complete.  This is a tune up of factory parts for massively improving reliability from standard. 

If you would like further parts installed please contact us prior to 11am to ensure work is complete

This service will add up 3 days to the picking and packing of your order as our technicians will need to complete the work prior to shipping.

PLEASE NOTE: this service means our technicians have opened the receiver and taken it apart.  As a result you may find the take down pins, nuts bolts and screws may have some paint worn off, wear or marks showing on or around the receiver from handling and being worked on as a result of using tools to work on the blaster.  While we take every care we can to try and keep the blaster in as new condition, marks are inevitable when opening a blaster.

  4. The Aztech high precision shim kit enables you to shim the gears to perfection meaning your gears will last longer and your blaster will also sound better with less mechanical gear noise.

  6. The Aztech piston is a lightweight and more durable polymer piston body with very large air ports on the piston head to ensure a perfect seal

Your batteries will last much longer and the torque of this motor means you will have a much faster shot response from each trigger pull.

products.title: Warhead Industries brushless 36k Black Series 480 Short Shaft Motor
products.body_html:
Exclusive to Azraels

HIGHLY EFFICIENT, DURABLE AND RELIABLE.

HIGH SPEED VERSION

25,000 RPM at 7.4v  -  36K RPM at 11.1v

-7075 ALUMINIUM HIGH QUALITY CASING

-TOTAL CUSTOM IN-RUNNER DESIGN WITH MAXIMUM POWER AND TORQUE

-HIGH TEMPERATURE RESISTANT  QUALITY COPPER WINDINGS

-HIGH QUALITY MAGNETS

-HIGH PRECISION CNC CASING BACK PLATE COVERING ESC

-BUILT IN ON-BOARD ESC WITH LOW VOLTAGE CUT-OFF AND OVER CURRENT DRAW TO -PROTECT LIPO BATTERIES FROM OVER DISCHARGE

-HIGHEST QUALITY REMOVABLE PINION GEAR FOR EASY SWITCH OUTS

-BUILT IN ACTIVE BRAKE (Disable on external on Mosfet if you can)

The constant contact of the brushes with the power terminals of a brushed motor is necessary for it to maintain its rotation. However, the friction that this creates means that a huge portion of the energy generated by the rotational motion is wasted as heat. Generally, the efficiency of brushed motors is limited within the range of 75% to 80%.

Brushed motors are notorious for having parts that get worn out after a while, requiring frequent dismantling and parts replacement. This is because the brushes of the commutator need to maintain almost constant contact with the terminals of the power source, even as the commutator rotates rapidly. When brushes get worn out and can no longer maintain contact, a brushed DC motor basically becomes useless.

This is less of a problem with brushless motors. In fact, there is essentially no contact between the rotor and stator of a brushless motor, so wear and tear are greatly reduced.


THREE DIFFERENT SPEED VARIANTS AVAILABLE ULTRA FAST, HIGH SPEED AND LOW SPEED. LONGER LIFE EXPECTANCY


The accelerated wear and tear due to constant contact of the brushes and the energy generated as heat means that brushed motors are expected to break down much sooner than brushless motors. It is generally not recommended to operate a brushed motors for longer than several minutes continuously. Without a chance to cool down, heat buildup in brushed motors can easily compromise the integrity of its coils or brushes.

Although in brushless motors there is still some heat generation due to air friction, this is kept at a manageable level. Brushless motors can typically run from 30 minutes to an hour continuously with no problems.

 

WHY USE A BRUSHLESS MOTOR IN YOUR AEG?

Brushless DC motors have no brushes to get worn out, they represent a huge leap forward in technology. Brushless output significantly higher efficiency and performance, and have a lower susceptibility to mechanical wear than their brushed counterparts.

Brushless motors offer several other advantages, including;


  • Higher torque to weight ratio
  • Increased torque per watt of power input (increased efficiency)
  • Increased reliability and lower maintenance requirements
  • Reduced operational and mechanical noise
  • Longer lifespan (no brush and commutator erosion)
  • Elimination of ionizing sparks from the commutator (ESD)
  • Near-elimination of electromagnetic interference (EMI)

JUST TAKE OUT YOUR ORIGINAL MOTOR AND USE THE EXISTING CONNECTORS ON YOUR AEG TO CONNECT YOUR NEW MOTOR.

PLEASE NOTE: Mosfet users turn active brake off if you can, as the motor has active break built in, running AB on the mosfet as well will shorten the life of the motor and only run the mosfet at 100% speed, do not slow it down, it will fight the motor esc

products.title: Aztech CNC Range Warrior Barrel Fit Hop Up
products.body_html:
Discover the pinnacle of gel blaster performance with Aztech Innovations' Range Warrior Hopup. This cutting-edge hopup leverages the renowned and highly efficient Muzzletek internal design, now reimagined in a sleek, barrel-mounted form factor. Engineered to fit all gel blasters equipped with metal inner barrels, the Range Warrior sets a new standard in precision and compatibility.

Constructed from precision-machined CNC aluminium, its outer casing delivers unmatched strength and durability, ensuring a secure, tight fit. The unique, proprietary multi-claw barrel mounting system guarantees a perfectly centered, stable installation without rotation or movement, slim enough to be concealed within a suppressor cover if desired. For an optimal fit, minor sanding of your outer barrel's exterior may be necessary.

Aztech offers two distinct designs: a straightforward, non-ported option and a visually striking, CNC-ported variant for enhanced aesthetics and finish.

The internal hop unit, made from high-quality injection-moulded ABS, mirrors the innovative design of the acclaimed Muzzletek hopup, with the Range Warrior introducing a completely tool-less, manual adjustment feature. This hopup is universally compatible with all metal inner barrels boasting outer diameters between 9mm and 9.7mm, making it a versatile choice for enthusiasts.

This hopup is a game-changer in the world of gel blasters, designed to significantly increase the range and accuracy of your M4 and AK variant rifles. Proudly designed, manufactured, and assembled in Australia, the Range Warrior Hopup embodies local craftsmanship and quality.

Available in six variations, you can choose between three colors (Gold, Black, and Red) in either CNC-ported or sleek non-ported designs.

  • Hopup Material: Injection-moulded ABS
  • Adaptor Material: CNC alloy
  • Compatibility: Metal inner barrels 9-9.7mm
  • Adjustment: Tool-less, manual adjustment

Elevate your gel blaster's performance with the Range Warrior Hopup by Aztech Innovations, where advanced design meets effortless adjustment.

products.title: eYou 11.1v (3S) 2000mah 65C Brick Battery
products.body_html:
This battery is an absolute weapon.  Like nothing ever available for gel blasters.  A real 2000mah, with an incredible power deliver of 130c burst and constant delivery of 65c.  This is enough power to run the most modified of AEG blasters with out batting an eye lid. 
Azrael staff have been running these in our tech room and on the field with insane blasters for months now and can not make the battery fault.  They are outstanding quality and house absolute brute power!!!

Being a "brick" shaped battery it will NOT fit in a blaster buffer tube or most battery compartments, it might fit inside a solid M16 type or other style of paddle stock with a large capacity hollow inside.  These do fit up under the APS CRS type stock on full extension with minor mods.

Comes with Red Dean T plug

Measurements are 105x 35 x 201mm

Colour may vary from either Black or Blue

Remember to charge these using a certified charger and charge them in a safe place. Also store them in a lipo bag and charge in a safe place far away from ignitable items, like on a cement floor away from everything.

products.title: Aztech 4 Lug Spring Retainer
products.body_html:
Aztech Steel Spring retainer are designed to work in all Aztech Scythe gearbox variants with the 4 lug locking tab.

Hollow through the centre to allow adjustment of the Aztech Accu-Port piston head.

A 2 piece design to allow installation of the stainless steel thrust bearing and plates.  Much more stable than 2 lug design during spring compressions. The 2 parts are threaded together and assembled with a Loctite 222 compound so it can be removed when needed.

Quad locking lug for maximum strength and positive position lock to eliminate torque and twist.

Features:

  • CNC machined 303 grade high strength stainless steel
  • Hollow design for Accu-Port adjustment
  • Internally threaded for butstock bolt
  • Ball bearing spring guide for optimized performance.
  • Rotating guide shaft to prevent spring binding.
  • Corrosion resistant

Suits:

-APS V2 Silveredge Gearbox
-Aztech Scythe CNC V2

products.title: Aztech HARDENED Hybrid Anti-Reverse latch
products.body_html:
Elevate the reliability of your gearbox with Aztech Innovations' pioneering Hybrid Anti-Reverse Latch. The Achilles' heel of traditional anti-reverse latches is the spring - a conventional torsion spring that, despite its critical role, is doomed to fail over time due to stress and wear.

Aztech Innovations has revolutionized this component by integrating a traditional compression coil spring, renowned for its significantly longer lifespan and enhanced spring rate. This innovation ensures an improved locking mechanism, setting a new benchmark in gearbox performance.

Crafted through precision CNC milling from SS440 steel and subsequently hardened, this hybrid latch is built to last. Its design features a custom compression spring securely bonded into the latch's rear, ensuring unparalleled durability and function.

The latch boasts a wider contact surface, providing increased engagement with the bevel gear's lock surface. This enhancement not only improves longevity but also bolsters reliability, ensuring your gearbox operates smoothly under any condition. Installation is a breeze, thanks to a flat head cut on the pin, allowing for straightforward installation with just a flat head screwdriver.

Please note, however, that the Hybrid Anti-Reverse Latch is not compatible with Retro Arms gearboxes due to a mismatch in the pole size required for the spring seating.

With Aztech Innovations' Hybrid Anti-Reverse Latch, you're not just replacing a part; you're upgrading to a new era of gearbox reliability and performance.

products.title: Fire Mode Selector
products.body_html: Replace your fire mode selector with an all alloy one!

products.title: Aztech Accu-Port CNC Piston Head
products.body_html:
Introducing the Accu-Port Piston Head from Aztech Innovations, a game-changer in airsoft precision and performance. This adjustable piston head is designed to enhance your airsoft gun's accuracy and minimize grouping spread through its innovative port adjustment feature.

This unique system functions like a tunable cylinder port, releasing pressure to allow for infinite adjustment levels. Tailor your setup to achieve unparalleled accuracy by fine-tuning the piston head to perfectly complement your barrel, ideal for correcting over volumed or improperly ported cylinders.Crafted from high-quality CNC 7075 Aluminium, the Accu-Port Piston Head is built for durability and performance.

It comes equipped with a thrust bearing and a pre-fitted silicone rubber O-ring, plus an additional upgrade Viton O-ring for superior resilience and sealing. The piston head's anodized finish not only adds to its aesthetic appeal but also enhances its corrosion resistance.The design incorporates the possibility to add Angle of Engagement (AOE) spacers between the piston body and head, allowing for further customization. Additionally, the slotted internal base ensures ease of piston assembly, making installation a breeze.

Designed to maximize FPS and overall performance, the Accu-Port Piston Head sets a new standard in the Aztech piston head lineup. It is compatible with Airsoft V2 and V3 gearboxes. For optimal tuning and the correct length in Aztech or APS gearboxes, we recommend pairing it with the Aztech Spring retainer, ensuring it does not intrude more than 40mm.Elevate your airsoft game with the Accu-Port Piston Head by Aztech Innovations, where precision engineering meets unmatched performance.

  • https://www.azraelsarmoury.com/collections/aztech-innovations/products/aztech-4-lug-spring-retainer

Please note Low strength Loctite should be used on the thread from piston to head.

  1. A long 3mm Allen key is used to adjust the Accu-Port.
  2. From new the port will be adjusted to the closed /off position which will not allow any air through.
  3. Releasing the Allen key will release air and allow tuning of the volume.
  4. Best performance is most likely to be within the range of 3-5 full turns from the off position.
  5. Once tuned and set, a low strength Loctite should be used on the adjuster thread to ensure it doesn’t self adjust when firing.

*Piston body not included, colour may vary from pictured

products.title: Aztech Xtreme Aster Adjustable Speed Trigger
products.body_html:
Aztech Xtreme Aster specific trigger make the most sought after mosfet in the world even better!!!
Our CNC Aluminum Speed Trigger designed in house to work specifically with the Gate Aster optical mosfet to increase trigger response  performance with adjustable angle, pre-travel and over travel, the Aster specific top half of the trigger doubles the Gate Aster tuning options and eliminates light caused errors for the optical mosfet.

Our 4th gen adjustable Speed Trigger has multiple grub screw adjustment points to adjust pre-travel, over-travel and angle of the trigger it self.  

The Aster top is the reduced errors that can occur when used in bright out door areas caused by an error on an optical mosfet if the optical sensor is tripped by light sneaking into the gearbox through a open type receiver. With the Gate supplied sticker applied to the inside of the gearbox housing mate with the Aster specific Aztech trigger, the sensitivity is just insane.

The Aster Top can be used with gen 3 Xtreme triggers sold prior to September 2021

Our 2 piece design trigger is CNC machined out of a solid block of 6061 Aluminum. The CNC construction makes this trigger very light and durable. The machine work is finished raw or anodized, the trigger is carefully finished with chamfered edges and textured flat face. 

The adjustment is via 2 set grub screws, a 1.3mm Allen key is supplied to set pre travel and to adjust the trigger angle which allows you to tune the pre travel.  Once set in position you will need to remove and apply a medium grade lock tight to ensure the screws do not self adjust and come loose.

Available anodized in black, silver, shimmery red and metallic gold.

products.title: Aztech Xtreme Adjustable T-Piece - Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
How does an adjustable t-piece that allows micrometer length tuning sound?

Well here it is. The PATENT PENDING Aztech Innovations Adjustable T-Piece!


Aztech have designed the t piece to be adjustable allowing adjustments by thousandths of millimetre by adjusting the black adjuster ring.  Adjusting the t piece longer brings the feed tube of the t piece away from the gearbox. Now it comes with a grub screw lockable collar!

Depending on the outer barrel adaptor used, the wings on the t piece may need modifying to suit universal setups no different to any other universal product.

This 6061 billet CNC T piece is the ideal t-piece for tuning the Aztech APACHE, HPA nozzles and gear box conversions to different receivers including ARP type receivers.

Internally these suit Aztech rubber tips and other tips similar sized, including Kublai and War Interest.

Once set, tested and happy with the position, tighten the grub screw and set using a low strength loctite.

 

or 4 layers of thread tape to set the adjustable face into position so it does not self adjust and move in use affecting performance.

This t piece may not suit all applications, we have used these in most receiver types, makes and models with great success. But being a universal product we can not grantee any fitment on non specific combinations.

These are a direct fit for APS receivers using APS and Scythe gearboxes.
These require minor dremel work to the side locator wings for ARP and Wells receiver/outer barrel

products.title: Aztech Xtreme Nylon Polymer Piston Body
products.body_html:
This piston body literally ticks every single box for the ultimate AEG Piston.

This item listing does not include piston head.

Custom made Fiber reinforced PA66 Polyamide (Nylon) Lightweight Piston, hardened 

Cr12MoV rack, strengthened and weight reduced with large windows in the low stress areas, this is DSG and high rate of fire ready out of the box.

Our strengthened and reinforced, lightweight and over engineered piston features:

-Lightweight ported and reinforced ultra strong PA66 Polymide  Piston
-

Cr12MoV hardened 14 tooth rack

We have over engineered the piston as much as physically possible.  nearly doubling the amount of material to the highest stress point at the back of the piston bridge to increase support for the pick up tooth with 80% more material than every other piston we have measured and tested. We opted for 

Cr12MoV hardened steel as it is the strongest metal we could use to ensure maximum life and outright breaking strength.  

Main properties of PA 66 Nylon include:

  • High strength and stiffness at high temperature
  • Extreme light weight out of the box.
  • Good impact strength, even at low temperature
  • Good abrasion and wear resistance
  • Excellent oil and solvent resistance
  • Good fatigue resistance

It is highly recommended to bond the steel rack to the body of the piston for high performance builds.  
We recommend a using JB Weld Original Steel reinforced Epoxy for the highest strength bond available Or at very least high strength Gorilla Grip 2 part araldite epoxy.

products.title: Aztech V2 Gearbox Spring Set
products.body_html:
Aztech Custom made chrome Silicon steel wire springs specially designed for maximum life and minimum stress. 

The set includes 1x lightweight trigger Spring, 1x strong tappet return spring and 1x long life anti reverse latch spring.

The trigger spring offers pre-loading reduced by 45 degrees to ensure the faster trigger possible with reliable reset.

The tappet return spring offers Increased tappet return speed and Extreme long life in comparison to any other spring we have tested.

The Anti reverse latch spring also offers a massive increase in life span over others on the market.

Chrome Silicon is the ultimate wire for these springs as it has incredible resistance to high repetition, high impact, high shock load and moderately high temperature applications.  Chrome silicon can be used at temperatures up to 50 degrees F higher than chrome vanadium with out distortion.   The presence of chromium in the alloy increases the hardness of the material and improves its tensile strength. It meets ASTM A 401 standards.

These are specially designed and made by Aztech Innovations for V2 style gearboxes.

Images are for illustration purposes only, set includes 1 of each spring only.

products.title: Aztech 8mm Low Profile Bushes 440 Stainless V2 Gearbox for Gelball and Airsoft
products.body_html:
Custom made CNC bushes by Aztech Innovations

Manufactured from 440 grade stainless steel with rock well hardness of 60HRC

Machined to 8mm (8.02mm ) to within 0.001mm tolerances. These are made .02 of a mm oversize to ensure a snug fit with out warping the gearbox from over tension. 

We recommend a light press or bearing tool for installation. Do not Impact with a hammer or blunt force tooling to ensure no damage is caused to the gearbox.  We highly recommend using a JB Weld Original epoxy as an adhesive to bond the bushes into place to ensure they can not move or come loose in the gearbox.

Suits V2 and V3 style gearbox's - gel ball and airsoft compatible.  May be too shallow for some nylon gearboxes to be securely retained.
These do not suit Singularity 13 Gen 8 Gearboxes.

Includes 6x Bushes

Stainless bushes must be lubricated with a high quality bearing and gear grease.  We highly recommend Nulon Xtreme Performance Grease with PTFE (L80) which is a blend of Polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) fluorocarbon particles in a specially prepared lithium-based, water-repellent grease. 

PTFE L80 keeps water and dust out while a plating of PTFE is applied to the mating surfaces under working conditions. Seal performance is improved and operating temperature reduced, resulting in less grease "throw". L80 is the perfect grease for our CNC bushes and gears.

L80 has a continuous temperature operating range of -9°C to 150°C

products.title: Gate Pico SSR 3 Mosfet
products.body_html:
PicoSSR 3 is the world's smallest MOSFET for AEG. Even though its dimensions are merely 4x6x21 mm, PicoSSR 3 is very powerful. It has great electrical and mechanical parameters and fits replicas with little space for MOSFET.

Additionally, it is fully resistant to water immersion (after heatshrink tube fitting). It can work with the strongest AEG replicas - maximum battery rated voltage is 12.8V.

Key functions

MOSFET

Do you want to achieve a higher rate of fire and faster trigger response? Are you planning a power upgrade of your rifle? In that case, you need a MOSFET.
It targets the energy from the battery directly to the motor, bypassing the mechanical trigger contacts. As a result, you gain a higher rate of fire of the rifle and a faster trigger response, and the contacts are protected against burn out.

PicoSSR 3 is not compatible with micro-switches! 

Included in the kit:

  • PicoSSR 3
  • 2 x single signal wire for trigger contacts, each 60cm long
  • 3 x heat shrink tube

products.title: QM Single Mag Holder
products.body_html:
Quantum Mechanics ™ Lockable Magazine Pouch

With the success of Quick Holster launched in early 2017, Quantum Mechanics further develop its holster and made a tactical magazine pouch that comes with the following features:

Spring controlled magazine release plate

This pouch comes with a magazine release plate controlled by a tension spring. The plate acts as a lock to secure the magazine from being dropped by movement like jumping and running. A magazine release design used in a magazine pouch is barely found in the market. To draw the magazine out, user can simply touch down the plate by his index finger or middle finger to release the lock. The smooth low friction interior surface allows for a fast magazine removal and easy one-handed insertion of the magazine.

Heavy duty injection moulded polymer construction

products.title: Imax B6AC Charger
products.body_html:
IMAX B6AC is the ultimate RC hobby intelligent multifunction charger which can charge and discharge for Li-ion /Polymer batteries, Ni-MH/Cd batteries, even Pb batteries. It's all-powerful at an extremely well known model to enthusiasts in the RC and model hobby industry. In comparison with similar products currently available in the market, the IMAX B6AC has special features as follows:

Optimized Operating Software

B6AC features an AUTO function that sets the feed current during the process of charging or discharging. Especially for Lithium batteries, it can prevent the overcharging which may lead to an explosion. It can disconnect form the circuit automatically and sound an alarm if any malfunction is detected. All the programs of this product are controlled through two way linkage and communication buttons to achieve maximum safety and minimise setting confusion.

Balancing Individual Cells While Battery Discharging

During the process of discharging, the B6AC can monitor and balance each cell of the battery individually. An Error message will be displayed and the process will be ended automatically if the voltage of any single one cell is abnormal.

Adaptable to Various Types of Lithium Battery

The B6AC is adaptable to various types of Lithium batteries, such as Li-ion, LiPo and the new LiFe series of batteries.

Fast and Storage Mode Charging of Lithium Batteries

These functions allow Lithium batteries to be fast charged to greatly reduce total duration of charging time, whereas store state can control the final voltage of your battery to allow safe storage over long periods of time.

Maximum Safety

Delta-peak sensitivity: Automatic charge termination program based on the principle of Delta-peak voltage detection. When the battery's voltage exceeds the threshold, the process will be terminated automatically.

Automatic Charging Current Limit

You can set up the upper limit of the charging current when charging your NiCd or NiMH battery which useful when charging a NiMH battery of low impedance and capacity in the 'AUTO' charging mode.

Capacity limit

The charging capacity is calculated as the charging current multiplied by time. If the charging capacity exceeds the limit, the process will be terminated automatically when you set the maximum value.

Temperature threshold*

The battery's internal chemical reaction will cause the temperature of the battery to rise. If the temperature limit is reached, the process will be terminated. * This function is available by connecting optional temperature probe, which is not included in our package.

Processing Time Limit

You can also limit the maximum process time to avoid any possible possible problems.

Input Power Monitoring

If using a car battery as a DC input power source the B6AC constantly monitors the battery for low voltage. If the voltage drops below the lower limit, the process will be ended automatically.

Data Store/Load

A maximum of five batteries data can be stored for user convenience. You can store the data pertaining each batteries' program setting of their continuous charging or discharging. Users can recall this data at any time without any special program setting.

Cyclic Charging/Discharging

1 to 5 cyclic and continuous process of charge/discharge or discharge/charge is selectable for battery refreshing and Balancing to help optimise the performance of your battery.

Specifications:

 

  • AC input: 100-240Volt
  • DC input: 11-18Volt
  • Comes with Mini-tamiya connector set
  • Circuit power: Max.charge power 50W
  • Max.discharge power 5W
  • Charge current range: 0.1-6.0A
  • Discharge current range: 0.1-2.0A
  • Current drain for balancing Li-po: 200mA/cell
  • NiCd/NiMH battery cell count: 1-15cells
  • Li-ion/Polymer cell count: 1-6cells
  • Pb battery voltage: 2-20V
  • Net weight: 575g
  • Dimension: 135x144x36mm

    •

products.title: QM Double Mag Holder
products.body_html:
Quantum Mechanics ™ Lockable Magazine Pouch

With the success of Quick Holster launched in early 2017, Quantum Mechanics further develop its holster and made a tactical magazine pouch that comes with the following features:

Spring controlled magazine release plate

This pouch comes with a magazine release plate controlled by a tension spring. The plate acts as a lock to secure the magazine from being dropped by movement like jumping and running. A magazine release design used in a magazine pouch is barely found in the market. To draw the magazine out, user can simply touch down the plate by his index finger or middle finger to release the lock. The smooth low friction interior surface allows for a fast magazine removal and easy one-handed insertion of the magazine.

Heavy duty injection moulded polymer construction

The pouch is made by polymer in military grade. It will provide you with a lifetime of performance. The polymer holds up in extreme heat and doesn’t become fragile in low temperatures.  It will not bend or stretch over time and is impervious to sweat and solvents

Curve Shape Belt loop and MOLLE compatible.

This pouch comes with a curve shape belt loop. It is designed to be worn outside the waistband hooked to a belt in a very comfortable, very easy to access method of carrying additional magazines. It standard comes with adjustable belt loop system accommodates belts of various sizes. The belt clip is designed for MOLLE use so you can mount this pouch on any MOLLE gears too.

 

Suits XTP, Shark, Hornet and Dragonfly mags and Glock mags

The 579 also features an innovative technology that automatically secures the blaster when holstered and releases it upon application of the middle finger with a standard shooting grip for a more intuitive and safer release. The holster body is constructed with a lightweight, state-of-the-art nylon blend and is completely non-abrasive to a blaster’s finish, tolerant of extreme high and low temperatures, and easy to maintain. This holster features belt clip which easily detaches from belt and fits up to 2.25" belt widths.
